Rucksack - The U.S. military rucksacks uses rucksacks because they are awesome. Our version is awesome too. 





Made of 12 oz. organic canvas and cotton webbing


Internal pocket with YKK zipper


3-snap closure


Adjustable top closure strap


Adjustable shoulder straps


Reinforced stitching for improved durability


Made in the U.S.A. by homeless veterans

22" tall x 14" wide x 7" long



Rewards



Budget
This is the breakdown of costs for our $30,000 goal:





Timeline
This idea was born in 2014 when we decided to fight veteran homelessness through by providing homeless veterans with long-term employment.
Production will begin in late-January of 2016 and we hope to have all perks delivered by the summer of 2016. Everyone who supports our campaign will receive an e-thank you and a certificate to give as a gift for the holidays.
After we raise $30,000, our goal is to reinvest some of these funds into making our business more sustainable and thus hire more homeless veterans. Any extra pair of hands we can employ to produce these bags is one homeless veteran less in the street.
Currently our start-up timeline looks like this:






More about LOGOS

PRODUCTS WITH MEANING
Our name: Logos is Greek for “meaning” which is referenced in Viktor Frankl’s famous book Man’s Search for Meaning. The term lends itself to logotherapy, which is a psychological theory developed by Dr. Frankl. In this book, he writes “logotherapy focuses on the meaning of human existence as well as on man’s search for such a meaning” and that this search for meaning “is the primary motivational force in man.” The ideas of logotherapy inspired not only the name of our company, but the entire premise of our operations. We aim to provide a work environment that allows each employee to find meaning in his or her life.
Our mission (again): To create high-quality products made by homeless veterans in a positive work environment.
Our vision: To lead the fight towards ending veteran homelessness through long-term employment.
Our values: People, our planet, transparency and growth:



People: Take care of our employees by creating a positive and supportive workplace.


Planet: Maximize sustainability whenever possible.

Transparency: so that our supporters know they follow our operations and the impact we’re having on veteran homelessness. We don’t want to be another brand who claims to make a difference. We will make a difference and think it’s everyone's right to see proof.
Growth: Use profits to help grow, which will increase the impact we have fighting veteran homelessness.



Our Team:

Justin Groza, Founder. A 10-year U.S. Army veteran, which is where he developed an interest in helping veterans. A graduate of Baldwin-Wallace University ('04) he served two tours in Afghanistan with the Army and one as a DoD civilian employee. While earning his MBA at Corvinus University of Budapest he developed and refined the concept for Logos. After graduating, he moved to Los Angeles to join the fight against veteran homelessness (in a sustainable way).

Cici Ly, Designer. Born in Cambodia but raised in Seattle, Washington. She’s been working in the creative realm for most of her life, splitting time as an artist and designer at some of the biggest brands in America. She is also an advocate for nature, animals, and social justice for everyone.

Our Partners:
LOGOS will seek out employees from the following organizations who provide care to homeless veterans in the Greater Los Angeles area.

West Los Angeles Veterans Health Administration (VA)



The Salvation Army’s – The Haven
Risks and Challenges
Helping people reintegrate into the workforce isn’t easy. It takes time, patience, understanding and compassion. Each employee is a different person with different needs. Thankfully these are skills our team has acquired through their past experiences in the military and fashion industry and we feel fully prepared to take on any challenge that may arise.
You might also, be wondering what we will do if we don’t meet our goal. Well, (obviously) we hope this won’t happen, but if it does, we will move forward with our plan and hire as many homeless veterans as possible to fulfill the demand from our campaign. In this case, production may be slower than anticipated but we will still be employing homeless veterans to make great products for all of our supporters.

Other Ways to Make a Difference
Please, tell your friends about us and share our campaign on social media! Social media is the fuel for our fundraising engine. By promoting our cause you will allow us to reach thousands of people we couldn’t reach on our own. Sharing our campaign will get us closer to reaching our goal and make it possible to start our work supporting homeless veterans.
Just copy and paste something like this to your Facebook or Twitter:
"I support #Logosproducts, a new brand employing homeless #veterans. Check out their bags and support the cause! http://bit.ly/1jW5JWa"

story:
ABOUT ME

Hello everyone! My name is Jennifer Somoza, I’m a fashion designer and architect from Venezuela. 6 Years ago I moved to Rome, Italy to study fashion design, I thought it was the time to follow my dreams and I chose a country with lots of history about haute couture and craftsmanship. You got to love made in Italy!

I come from a family of hard workers, who believe that anything could be possible if you have faith, if you make and follow a plan and if you work to achieve your goals! I’m passionate of what I do, and my particularity is that I’m not just devoted to womenswear fashion but I also do all kind of accessories, architecture designs, graphics and illustrations.

 Versatility and freedom of creativity are the fundamentals of my life and my brand! Jennifer Somoza, created as the alter ego of an artist, and everything this artist is capable to do, that's the idea, spread some hope, that we can make our dreams come true if we work for it!....My purpose is to register my brand and spread it all over the world, creating a business where fashion, design and architecture could hold hands and walk through a path of resolving cultural needs. It's a very ambitious plan but I'm confident I will make it!

THE PROJECT

Since I finished my fashion academy I’ve had the opportunity to collaborate with photographers and stylists, I’ve participated to many events and contests, thanks to them, I’ve had the chance to showcase my fashion pieces in Bratislava, Shanghai, Milan, Berlin, New York and obviously Venezuela.

Today I feel thrill because I’ve been contacted by the organization of Vancouver fashion week to invite me to participate as an emerging designer and showcase my collection in the runway in March 2016. I can't miss this incredible opportunity, and I think this would be an excellent moment to successfully launch my brand!

THE CONCEPT

Based on the luxury bags I recently designed, the pagoda bags will give the input for this new collection! Pagoda talks about how Society tries so hard to compress us, to classify us into categories, to make us follow a rigid pattern. “This is the story of a regular box, house of our souls, our own prison! And this is the moment when we all start to evolve, deforming the walls that keeps us lock, losing its symmetry, moving them around. Transform that square shape and make it your own, to be what you want in your own way! the way how walls deform itself represents nothing but our hunger for rebellion!”

I will need to sew 12 different outfits that would represent this pagoda rebel woman that I will showcase together with my 6 already handmade Pagoda. Fortunately the academy where I studied is going to help me with some of the fabrics I will use for the making of the collection. So, basically I will need to raise 9500€ that will go to: 

WHAT I NEED

-Vancouver Fashion Week participation fee

-Airfare to Vancouver

-Accommodations in Vancouver

-Food and transportation in Vancouver

-Additional fabrics and materials to produce the Collection

-Legal Registration of my brand, VAT number and taxes here in Italy

WHAT COMES NEXT

After I raised the necessary for Vancouver fashion week I will occupied myself for the legal registration of the brand and the VAT number needed to offer my fashion pieces to buyers in the industry and for the participation of trade fairs, as well as the creation of an online store, marketing management, public relations and commercial representatives, I think this is a great opportunity to realize my dream as a fashion designer, to rock with a strong concept proposal at Vancouver fashion week, getting in contact with buyers, bloggers and media, to start spreading the word about my brand worldwide and finally start my business, a business that not only have fashion in mind but the future cohesion between it and the arts.

REWARDS

I would be honnor if you can have handmade piece designed by myself...

Orange monique earings by Jennifer Somoza. Check the rest of the collection at www.wix.com/jennifersomoza/j-life

Orange monique Necklace by Jennifer Somoza. Check the rest of the collection at www.wix.com/jennifersomoza/j-life

Blook handmade Notebook. Check the rest of the collection at www.wix.com/jennifersomoza/j-life

Rug bags Collection by jennifer Somoza. Check the rest of the collection at www.wix.com/jennifersomoza/j-life


Le soir avec les champignons Exclusive Collection of leather handbags by Jennifer Somoza. Check the rest of the collection at www.wix.com/jennifersomoza/j-life ( available also in different colors)

Kimono Dress by Jennifer Somoza. Check the rest of the collection at www.wix.com/jennifersomoza/j-life

Jennifer Somoza Pagoda Handmade Luxury leather bags, high quality materials, made in italy, 100% craftmanship tradition. Check the rest of the collection at www.wix.com/jennifersomoza/j-life



OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

You can help me sharing my campaign, getting the word out about it, showing it to family or friends, using the indigogo share tools! You can like my facebook page and other social networks, I would like you to be part of this!

www.wix.com/jennifersomoza/j-life

www.facebook.com/jennifersomozadesigns

story:
Hello!

My name is Alex Cartwright, founder of Xtreme Xcursions (Thats me on the fly board for fleet week!).  My team and I are bringing some serious adrenaline-producing activities to the Bay Area and beyond.  

With a huge extreme sport culture in northern California, we see the need for a central place where you can get your Xtreme fix!  Our international team has traveled the world over experiencing Xtreme activities from South Island New Zealand to the jungles of Cambodia.  Now we want to you to experience these activities in our own beautiful backyard.  

So channel your inner Iron Man and come fly with us!  Right now we are offering up to %50 off some of our services and the chance to get you in front of the crowds in exchange for some contributions.  

We are launching in the Spring of 2016. By then we hope to be in a position to offer many more activities from one central waterfront location.  Here’s what we have going already:

·  Fly-boarding – making your Iron Man fantasies come to life.

·  Water Zorbing – Yes, like a hamster rolling around on the Bay in a giant ball! Fun for the whole family!

·  Kite Boarding – Learn to harness the power of the wind in one of the world most premier kiting locations.

·  Jet Ski Tours – The Bay offers so many areas up for exploration, and the back of a Jet Ski allows up close action.

.  Sail Boat Tour Packages - Tour the Bay and beyond on a racing Yacht and be able to experience kiting, jet skiing, and fly boarding anywhere you want with hot showers and a fire-pit on board.

. Motorized Surfboards - No waves... No problem. Our motorized surf boards have plenty of juice to get your heart pumping.


Here is what's in the pipeline for spring:

· Skyscraper Zip Lining – the ultimate way to see SF and to beat the traffic!

·  Bungee Jumping – Dare you take the leap? Perhaps a little push is in order!

·  Spear Fishing Tours – experience the thrill of spearing your own dinner from the back of a 48ft sail boat.

·  Shark Diving – We will give you Shark Week every week (White Shark season permitting)

·  Our Waterfront location will also stand as a community event space – holding concerts, indie film showings, events for the local Xtreme community, a visual space for local artists etc…

We are seeking funding of $250,000, with these funds we plan to secure the lease on a waterfront location so we can have a central hub and build a community for Xtreme adrenaline seekers in the Bay Area. We anticipate this location being not only a major tourist destination, but also a place where locals can come and experience something new in their City.  In addition, part of the funds will go toward purchasing the highest quality equipment with the latest safety standards for our activities.

In exchange for your support we are offering an array of amazing perks!  We have something for everyone.  Now is the time to secure for yourself, or treat a friend to some heavily discounted tickets good for a few of our activities. Or perhaps you want to try everything and bring your friends – in that case we have the ultimate package for you!  

Stay tuned for progress updates and please pass this on to your friends, your family, your neighbors, your Uber driver, your Eaze driver, your SpoonRocket driver,  your Airbnb guests, that rich guy your parents know, pass it on to everyone you know!  Also join our facebook page for exclusive news.   Xtreme Xcursions will sell itself, but we need your help bringing adventure sports in the San Francisco Bay to the next level! 

Thanks so much for your support!!

Alex & Team

story:
Now that the campaign is over,
visit our site to get your custom skirt!



HOW TO GET YOUR OWN CUSTOM SKIRT?

1)  Select a PERK. 

2)  We'll send you an email with an easy tutorial to take your measurements.  

3)  We’ll send you a look book with the skirt and fabric selections.

4)  We make you a one of a kind custom fit skirt.


Check out the latest press coverage on Rita and Phill!









HELP A GIRL IN NEED WITH EVERY DONATION


LIN CENTER FOR COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

We met Dana, the founder of LIN, 5 years ago, and have been impressed by the growth and impact that she’s been able to make on the local community.  When we started Rita and Phill, we knew we wanted to be a part of the support network that she was building.

The LIN Center supports local non-profit organizations by providing them with training, access to grants and providing skilled volunteers.  The center plays an integral role in the local community; it serves as the crucial link between local non-profits that are understaffed and international resources that are looking for organizations to help.

LIN has over 176 partner organizations that range in focus, from women's empowerment to protection of children to LGBT advocacy.


BRIGHTER PATH PROGRAM

The latest PERK we are adding to the campaign is the Caring is Sharing package.  We are working with the VinaCapital Foundation’s Brighter Path Program – for every Caring is Sharing package you select, you will also be donating one professional outfit to a girl in the program.

The Brighter Path Program provides impoverished ethnic minority girls with mentoring and scholarships while they attend high school and university. Each student receives a seven-year scholarship (three years of high school and four years of university) that includes support for books, food, housing and uniforms or clothing.  Before receiving the scholarship, the families must commit to support their daughter’s education through the duration of the scholarship.

When you opt for a Caring is Sharing perk with us, you will receive a custom-fit skirt in the style and fabric of your choice.  In addition, you will also donate a custom-fit skirt and blouse for an underprivileged young woman in the Brighter Path Program.  The professional attire will help these young women when they interview for internships and jobs.


THE RITA AND PHILL DIFFERENCE

What makes Rita and Phill different is that we've created a unique pattern system that is personalized for each body type.  We've worked with women of many shapes and sizes and have learned from those experiences.  This means that we don’t just change the measurements on each skirt.  We also use a different cut, to make sure the skirt not only fits you, but that it also flatters your specific body type.

We use classic hand-stitched techniques found only at the most exclusive designer brands. From the fabric selection to the construction and stitching, our techniques have been meticulously selected to give you the perfect combination of fashion, comfort and fit.


Our in-house production allows us to provide the highest quality control over every skirt. There are no assembly lines; instead, all our skirts are hand-made with care and attention to detail. 


----- Samples from our collection -----

Signature Skirt

The unique shape of this tulip skirt has made it a perennial favorite. The long lines and form hugging silhouette accent your curves while also slimming and shaping.

Fabric : Cotton blend with slight stretch.


Classic Skirt

The classic pencil skirt updated with a modern curve-enhancing fit. The waistline hits at your natural waist, giving you a longer legline. The hips and thighs are cut using our unique pattern system, creating a feminine silhouette while still maintaining a professional look.

Fabric: Cotton blend with slight stretch


Enhancer Cut Skirts

Our Enhancer skirts are made with a special stitch line along the back center seam that is measured to boost and lift your specific butt. We promise you will see a noticeable difference in the curvature of your side profile!

Fabric: Cotton blend with slight stretch


Minimizer Cut Skirts

The Minimizer skirts are made with additional detailing and seam lines to create a slimmer waistline while maintaining your feminine silhouette. The tighter-blended fabric hugs your butt, helping to minimize and tone your look.

Fabric: Wool/cotton blend with slight stretch



HOW DOES IT WORK?


We just need 3 simple measurements from you: your waist, hips and thighs.  We plug those numbers into our design system, along with your height, and we create a custom pattern just for your body.  Yes, every skirt undergoes its own analysis, and a separate pattern is made for every single different skirt we make.  Your skirt will receive the TLC it deserves in order to make you look great!

We then manufacture everything in our in-house studio.  And we ship it directly to you.  We cut out all the middlemen and pass along the savings to you.



WHY VIETNAM?

Custom fashion is a long-standing tradition in Vietnam.  While other developing countries, such as China and Bangladesh, are known for their mass production capabilities, Vietnam has earned a reputation for high-quality workmanship and attention to detail.

The passion that drives Rita and Phill is the desire by one American family hoping to make a small difference in this developing country.  Over the 7 years that we’ve lived in Vietnam, we have become fluent in the language and immersed in the culture.  We’ve shared with our local team the business skills and insights we’ve learned from growing up and working in the US.

We want to share a little piece of Vietnam with women in the US.  We want to make it easy for the average American woman to get couture clothes at affordable prices.  It seems like an easy goal, but there have been a lot of steps and many details to work out.  We’ve spent the past 2 years developing the processes to make this happen.  We’re now ready to share this unique experience with you, and we hope you enjoy it!




WHO ARE WE?

At Rita and Phill, we’re a small team of women working to change the clothes shopping experience.  We believe that every woman should have a closet full of clothes that not only fit your every curve, but also have the quality of designer brands at the price of regular stores.  

Most importantly, you should love the way your clothes make you feel. We want you to stand a bit taller and speak a bit louder because you know you look your best when you wear our skirts.


WHO ARE RITA AND PHILL?

The name Rita and Phill is inspired by the main characters in “Groundhog Day”. In the movie, Phil is stuck in a loop that repeats the same day over and over. The only way he could get out of this time trap and win Rita's heart, was to improve himself and to help those around him.

That's how we view the state of women’s fashion. Every day, women around the world open their closets and look at the same clothes, over and over.  And we generally always feel like we have nothing to wear!

A closet full of clothes and we have nothing to wear.  Why is that?  It's usually because what we mean is: "I have nothing that I'm excited to wear."  Maybe the clothes don't fit as well as they used to, or maybe they never fit to begin with and we bought them in the hopes that we would fit them one day.

Why do we accept this endless loop of wearing clothes that don’t really fit us? Because all the stores sell clothes that are made for "average" sizes.  Who are these "average" sizes anyway?

At Rita and Phill, we've found a way to break that cycle by improving on the fit of your clothes, giving you items that you actually want to wear because it makes you look your best.


-----  Perks ----- 





ADDITIONAL INFO


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Even if you feel you cannot contribute financially, you can still help this campaign succeed:


  • Share it verbally and by email with your friends, family and co-workers
  • Share and like us on the following social media platforms: Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE

We will contact you via email to finalize the fabric selection and to double check your measurements.  For special requests on your order, please email us at indiegogo@ritaandphill.com.

The skirts will be made on a first come, first served basis.  Our goal is to ship all items by the end of January 2016, with the latest deadline of March 31, 2016.


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

International Shipping

We provide free shipping to all orders in the United States and Canada. For international shipping, please include $20 to help us offset the shipping charges.

Duty / VAT Charges / Customs

If you live outside the United States, you will be responsible for any applicable duty / VAT charges.

Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't help them get through the customs process any faster.


FAQ

1. When do I send you my measurements?

We'll send you an email as soon as we receive your generous donation.  The email will include an easy tutorial to show you how to take your measurements – the measurements process should take about 10 minutes.  Or if you prefer, we can set up a Skype video call for us to help you with this.  The call can take anywhere from 10 to 20 minutes, depending on how much we chit chat  :)


2.  How do I choose the color of my skirt?

Based on your measurements, we will send you an email with the fabric options that will work best with your body shape and with the skirt design that you selected.


3. When will my skirts and store credit vouchers be delivered?

We will send out the store credit vouchers immediately at the end of the campaign.  All the skirts and purses will be delivered between January and March 2016.


4. Why will the delivery window take from 1 month to 3 months?

We are still a small studio and the delivery time will depend on how many orders we receive.  Our focus will be on giving each skirt the care and attention that we promised to you, which could mean a slightly longer wait time.  If we surpass our fundraising goal, we will use the additional funds to expand our production team in order to decrease the production time.


5.  How long do I have to redeem my store credit vouchers?

The store credit vouchers have no expiration date.  You may use them at anytime in the future. 


6.  When can I start redeeming my store credit vouchers?

We will begin redeeming store credit vouchers after the Indiegogo campaign has closed.


7.  Will there be tax added onto the price when I redeem the store credit?

Yes, when you redeem a store credit voucher, your purchase will be taxed at the standard local tax rate. Please keep in mind that this money goes straight to the government, resulting in no gained revenue from our end.


8.  Can I buy a skirt as a gift?

Yes, you can purchase a package with just 1 skirt, and when we email you, just let us know the name and email address of the person who is receiving the skirt as a gift. 

The other option is to buy a package that offers multiple skirts and let us know the name and email address of the people who are receiving the skirts as a gift. 

We will notify her directly to get her measurements and fabric selection.


9.  I have more questions and some comments/suggestions, how do I contact you?

We’ve created a dedicated email address for this campaign.  Please email us at indiegogo@ritaandphill.com. 

We are happy to answer your questions, and would especially love any feedback or suggestions you may have about the campaign, the packages, and/or our products.
story_txt:
Now that the campaign is over, visit our site to get your custom skirt!







HOW TO GET YOUR OWN CUSTOM SKIRT?


1) 
Select a PERK. 
2) 
We'll send you an email with an easy tutorial to take your
measurements.  
3) 
We’ll send you a look book with the skirt and
fabric selections.
4) 
We make you a one of a kind custom fit skirt.Check out the latest press coverage on Rita and Phill!


HELP A GIRL IN NEED WITH EVERY DONATION
LIN CENTER FOR COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
We met Dana, the founder of LIN, 5 years ago, and have been impressed by the growth and impact that she’s been able to make on the local community.  When we started Rita and Phill, we knew we wanted to be a part of the support network that she was building.
The LIN Center supports local non-profit organizations by providing them with training, access to grants and providing skilled volunteers.  The center plays an integral role in the local community; it serves as the crucial link between local non-profits that are understaffed and international resources that are looking for organizations to help.


LIN has over 176 partner organizations that range in focus, from women's empowerment to protection of children to LGBT advocacy.

BRIGHTER PATH PROGRAM

The latest PERK we are adding to the campaign is the Caring is Sharing package.  We are working with the VinaCapital Foundation’s Brighter Path Program – for every Caring is Sharing package you select, you will also be donating one professional outfit to a girl in the program.The Brighter Path Program provides impoverished ethnic minority girls with mentoring and scholarships while they attend high school and university. Each student receives a seven-year scholarship (three years of high school and four years of university) that includes support for books, food, housing and uniforms or clothing.  Before receiving the scholarship, the families must commit to support their daughter’s education through the duration of the scholarship.
When you opt for a Caring is Sharing perk with us, you will receive a custom-fit skirt in the style and fabric of your choice.  In addition, you will also donate a custom-fit skirt and blouse for an underprivileged young woman in the Brighter Path Program.  The professional attire will help these young women when they interview for internships and jobs.
THE RITA AND PHILL DIFFERENCE
 
What makes Rita and Phill different is that we've created a unique pattern system that is personalized for each body type.  We've worked with women of many shapes and sizes and have learned from those experiences.  This means that we don’t just change the measurements on each skirt.  We also use a different cut, to make sure the skirt not only fits you, but that it also flatters your specific body type.
We use classic hand-stitched techniques found only at the most exclusive designer brands. From the fabric selection to the construction and stitching, our techniques have been meticulously selected to give you the perfect combination of fashion, comfort and fit.


Our in-house production allows us to provide the highest quality control over every skirt. There are no assembly lines; instead, all our skirts are hand-made with care and attention to detail. 


----- Samples from our collection -----Signature Skirt
The unique shape of this tulip skirt has made it a perennial favorite. The long lines and form hugging silhouette accent your curves while also slimming and shaping.
Fabric : Cotton blend with slight stretch.



Classic Skirt
The classic pencil skirt updated with a modern curve-enhancing fit.  The waistline hits at your natural waist, giving you a longer legline.  The hips and thighs are cut using our unique pattern system, creating a feminine silhouette while still maintaining a professional look.
Fabric: Cotton blend with slight stretch



Enhancer Cut Skirts
Our Enhancer skirts are made with a special stitch line along the back center seam that is measured to boost and lift your specific butt.  We promise you will see a noticeable difference in the curvature of your side profile!
Fabric: Cotton blend with slight stretch



Minimizer Cut Skirts
The Minimizer skirts are made with additional detailing and seam lines to create a slimmer waistline while maintaining your feminine silhouette. The tighter-blended fabric hugs your butt, helping to minimize and tone your look.
Fabric: Wool/cotton blend with slight stretch





 HOW DOES IT WORK?


We just need 3 simple measurements from you: your waist, hips and thighs.  We plug those numbers into our design system, along with your height, and we create a custom pattern just for your body.  Yes, every skirt undergoes its own analysis, and a separate pattern is made for every single different skirt we make.  Your skirt will receive the TLC it deserves in order to make you look great!
We then manufacture everything in our in-house studio.  And we ship it directly to you.  We cut out all the middlemen and pass along the savings to you.





 WHY VIETNAM? 

Custom fashion is a long-standing tradition in Vietnam.  While other developing countries, such as China and Bangladesh, are known for their mass production capabilities, Vietnam has earned a reputation for high-quality workmanship and attention to detail.
The passion that drives Rita and Phill is the desire by one American family hoping to make a small difference in this developing country.  Over the 7 years that we’ve lived in Vietnam, we have become fluent in the language and immersed in the culture.  We’ve shared with our local team the business skills and insights we’ve learned from growing up and working in the US.


We want to share a little piece of Vietnam with women in the US.  We want to make it easy for the average American woman to get couture clothes at affordable prices.  It seems like an easy goal, but there have been a lot of steps and many details to work out.  We’ve spent the past 2 years developing the processes to make this happen.  We’re now ready to share this unique experience with you, and we hope you enjoy it!




 WHO ARE WE? 

At Rita and Phill, we’re a small team of women working to change the clothes shopping experience.  We believe that every woman should have a closet full of clothes that not only fit your every curve, but also have the quality of designer brands at the price of regular stores.  
Most importantly, you should love the way your clothes make you feel. We want you to stand a bit taller and speak a bit louder because you know you look your best when you wear our skirts.



WHO ARE RITA AND PHILL?

The name Rita and Phill is inspired by the main characters in “Groundhog Day”. In the movie, Phil is stuck in a loop that repeats the same day over and over. The only way he could get out of this time trap and win Rita's heart, was to improve himself and to help those around him.
That's how we view the state of women’s fashion. Every day, women around the world open their closets and look at the same clothes, over and over.  And we generally always feel like we have nothing to wear!

A closet full of clothes and we have nothing to wear.  Why is that?  It's usually because what we mean is: "I have nothing that I'm excited to wear."  Maybe the clothes don't fit as well as they used to, or maybe they never fit to begin with and we bought them in the hopes that we would fit them one day.




Why do we accept this endless loop of wearing clothes that don’t really fit us? Because all the stores sell clothes that are made for "average" sizes.  Who are these "average" sizes anyway?
At Rita and Phill, we've found a way to break that cycle by improving on the fit of your clothes, giving you items that you actually want to wear because it makes you look your best.

-----  Perks ----- 







ADDITIONAL INFO

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Even if you feel you cannot contribute financially, you can still help this campaign succeed:


Share it verbally and by email with your friends, family and co-workers
Share and like us on the following social media platforms: Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook


PRODUCTION SCHEDULE
We will contact you via email to
finalize the fabric selection and to double check your measurements.  For special requests on your order, please
email us at indiegogo@ritaandphill.com.
The skirts will be made on a first
come, first served basis.  Our goal is to
ship all items by the end of January 2016, with the latest deadline of March
31, 2016. 

RISKS AND
CHALLENGES
International
Shipping
We provide free shipping to all orders in the United States and
Canada. For international shipping, please include $20 to help us offset the
shipping charges.
Duty / VAT Charges
/ Customs
If you live outside the United States, you will be responsible
for any applicable duty / VAT charges.
Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and
you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't help them get
through the customs process any faster.

FAQ
1. When do I send you my
     measurements?
We'll send you an email as soon as we receive your generous
donation.  The email will include an easy
tutorial to show you how to take your measurements – the measurements process
should take about 10 minutes.  Or if you
prefer, we can set up a Skype video call for us to help you with this.  The call can take anywhere from 10 to 20
minutes, depending on how much we chit chat  :)

2. 
How do I choose the color of my skirt? 
Based on your measurements, we will send you an email with the
fabric options that will work best with your body shape and with the skirt design
that you selected.

3. When will my skirts and
     store credit vouchers be delivered?
We will send out the store credit vouchers immediately at the end
of the campaign.  All the skirts and
purses will be delivered between January and March 2016.

4. Why will the delivery window
     take from 1 month to 3 months?
We are still a small studio and the delivery time will depend on how many
orders we receive.  Our focus will be on
giving each skirt the care and attention that we promised to you, which could
mean a slightly longer wait time.  If we
surpass our fundraising goal, we will use the additional funds to expand our
production team in order to decrease the production time.

5.  How long do I
have to redeem my store credit vouchers?
The store credit vouchers have no
expiration date.  You may use them at
anytime in the future.  

6.  When can I
start redeeming my store credit vouchers?
We will begin redeeming store
credit vouchers after the Indiegogo campaign has closed.

7.  Will there be
tax added onto the price when I redeem the store credit?
Yes, when you redeem a store
credit voucher, your purchase will be taxed at the standard local tax rate. Please
keep in mind that this money goes straight to the government, resulting in no
gained revenue from our end.

8.  Can I buy a
skirt as a gift?
Yes, you can purchase a package
with just 1 skirt, and when we email you, just let us know the name and email
address of the person who is receiving the skirt as a gift.  
The other option is to buy a
package that offers multiple skirts and let us know the name and email address
of the people who are receiving the skirts as a gift.  
We will notify her directly to
get her measurements and fabric selection.

9.  I have more
questions and some comments/suggestions, how do I contact you?
We’ve created a dedicated email
address for this campaign.  Please email
us at indiegogo@ritaandphill.com.  
We are happy to answer your
questions, and would especially love any feedback or suggestions you may have
about the campaign, the packages, and/or our products.

story:
VIABL ATHLETICS™

Established by Athletes — Designed for Everyone

VIABL ATHLETICS™ is a fitness and lifestyle brand that will offer high-quality clothing, personalized exercise and diet plans, and athletic accessories to individuals who are looking to look better, feel better, and live better!

When the concept for this company was born, the focus was to build a brand that represented hard work, the importance of time and effort, and most of all, that anything is possible! Time and time again, we hear that we "can not do it," that we "will not succeed," that we "might as well give up," but we do not need to listen to those people! — You can do it — You can be successful — You are VIABL™ — 

The mission of this brand is to accentuate the fact that no matter who you are, no matter what people say about you, you can achieve your goals! — Your dreams are possible —  Your success is VIABL™ — 


— What is needed —

In order to make this a VIABL™ company (pun intended), we need more start-up funding! Start-up costs accumulate quickly and deplete bank accounts like quicksand, but we still want to provide you with the highest quality products on the market in the shortest amount of time, and you can help make that a reality!
We have a portfolio full of exciting clothing designs that will stand out amongst the rest, no matter where you are! However, we need capital in order to manufacture the clothing, and that is where your generous donations will help ascend VIABL ATHLETICS™ to unbelievable heights!
This campaign offers a wide array of perks that you can claim when you donate funds! For snapback hats and water bottles, when you donate funds and claim a one of those perks, VIABL ATHLETICS™ will place a bulk order with our manufacturers and once the orders arrive, your products will be shipped to you! Essentially, your donations will be considered a "pre-order payment"!  In regards to the personalized exercise and diet plans, you will receive yours via email!

— Together, we can make VIABL ATHLETICS™ viable! — 

As of right now, VIABL ATHLETICS™ is a growing brand. However, with your generous contributions, this brand has the potential to quickly transform in to a symbol for hard work, time and effort, and possibility!

As a brand, we here at VIABL ATHLETICS™ want to provide you with clothing that screams "it is possible!" There will always be a time in your life when you feel as though you can't change your lifestyle, but you can! We want our clothing designs to inspire you and make you feel confident in who you are! You are VIABL™! 


— Overcoming Adversity — 

As the owner of VIABL ATHLETICS™, Eric Ranson was once an NCAA Division 1 baseball player in the USA, and while he worked hard to earn a scholarship and play baseball at the highest collegiate level, there were coaches and individuals that were close to him who told him that he wouldn't make it; that he wouldn't be able to earn a college scholarship. However, Eric chose to not listen and worked hard to prove all of the doubters wrong! He had a dream and a goal to earn a scholarship and play baseball at a high level, and he made sure that nothing, or no one, would stand in his way! 

That motivation is what this company was derived from! No matter who you are, no matter what you do, no matter what you believe… Your dreams are VIABL™!


— Other Ways You Can Help — 

We understand that not everyone can donate funds to this campaign, but that does not mean that we don't value your time and effort! Even if you choose to not donate funds to VIABL ATHLETICS™, you are still able to help by sharing this campaign with your friends and family on your social media platforms, and by spreading the word via emails, text messages, phone calls, or face to face conversations! You can even utilize the Indiegogo share tools in order to spread the word about VIABL ATHLETICS™!



— Thank you all very much for taking the time to view our campaign and contribute to building this company! We appreciate every single one of you, as you are who will help build this brand! —

story:
When the whole world came to a standstill, we measured up, pulled up our socks, and came up with a solution. Here’s presenting one such heroic effort, that represents ‘Faith Over Fear’.

Conceptualized during the pandemic, One Air Plus is an ultra-modern mask designed to provide maximum comfort and protection for a better tomorrow.

That is why a single One Air Plus mask would cost you about US $33, much lower than most of our contemporaries. And yes, did we tell you that it includes Shipping Cost as well?

Also, you could get a single mask for as little as $13.33 if you buy a pack of 24 One Air Plus Masks. Check out the perks for more information. And yes, if you think this is only about the price, see the comparison below!
 
 
 
We have ticked all the boxes that matter when designing a mask, and have taken the liberty to create a few of our own. One Air Plus Masks have been designed ground-up by our team to suit all your needs and fit almost all facial profiles.
 

The extended front grill ensures better airflow, providing maximum breathability. The adjustable strap guarantees an ergonomic fit. Plus, the superior seal all along the edges of our mask ensures an airtight fit providing extra protection. Not just that, the mask is embedded with organic fragrances to give a calming effect and keep you rejuvenated throughout.

From keeping you rejuvenated to maintaining your cool, select from our range of fragrances - 

 

 
 
 
 

 

 

Yes, we mean No! Don’t join it.

Because unlike our contemporaries, we are PRODUCTION READY! Our Large sized masks are up and ready to be shipped.

Don't believe us? Look at the production-proof images below!

 

 

But we aren’t stopping here, we are coming up with many more variants with Medium and Small-sized masks respectively. And we need you on-board for that!

The funds raised through this campaign would enable us to further manufacture masks of different sizes for women, teenagers, and children.

Let us help you further. After all, it’s all about having faith over fear!

Here is the size chart of the One Air Plus Masks -

 

A majority of the OA+ employees working in the factory are tribal women belonging to a remote village in India. But just like any other multinational company, we offer the facility to our women to bring their kids along with them over. Also, we have special games for them to develop their mental skills.

 

 

 

We understand the pandemic's been really tough and some of us may not be able to contribute because of that. But hey, that shouldn't stop you from helping us.

All you could do is get the word out and make some noise about our campaign because, at One Air Plus, we aim to get that mask delivered at your doorstep!

Love & Light!

story:
Hit the pink BACK IT button to get early access to the top bag for warrior moms on the go.

We are excited to announce the launch of our first two military-grade products designed for moms on the go. Check out the two products you’ll get below and all the High-Performance tech included. For a limited time only during our Indiegogo campaign, you’ll get both the Mommy GoBag and the Evac Pac for only $100 + $20 shipping. That’s a $40 discount for being one of our early backers.

Your backing will go toward supporting a woman owned company created with a mission of inspiring moms to pursue their passions while keeping their kids protected. Read more about company founder, Jillian Coburn, and her story below.

$20 shipping cost is included in special pre-sale price of $100 + $20 total for both items (Gobag and Evac Pack)

 

MOMMY GOBAG

  • Merges military-inspired, functional and fashionable
  • For on-the-go parents
  • Made for even the most difficult emergency situations with your kids
  • Constructed with Ventile High Performance Fabric, the world’s most effective, natural, all-weather cotton textile
  • Padded inside pocket for laptop (designed specifically with working moms in mind)
  • Roll top opening with Velcro closures, so bag can open at a moments notice
  • Pocket for dirty or clean shirt
  • Outside pocket for wet wipes pull
  • Outside pocket for mobile device or water bottle
  • Backpack straps that tuck away when not in use
  • Roll top for easy bag expansion
  • Diaper pad pocket on bottom of bag
  • Inside pocket for our kid emergency preparedness kits (Evac Pack, sold separately)

Dimensions:

H: 21” x W: 14” x D: 5.5”

Shoulder Strap: 31”

Handle Drop: 2”

Weight: 1.55 lbs

 

EVAC PACK (sold separately)

  • Semi soft outside shell
  • Mollee stitching system inside
  • Elastic on front, for easy carrying
  • Thin PVC clear pocket that holds scent inside
  • Refillable, with spaces for Essentials like:
  • a large clear pocket for large wet wipes
  • stain remover wipes 
  • PediaLyte Powder Packs
  • Pepto Kids Chewables
  • throw-up bag rolls
  • mints
  • hand sanitizer
  • chewable aspirin
  • fabric freshener
  • Benadryl
  • throwaway bag for dirty t-shirt

 

Our Story

Jillian Coburn and her husband founded Mommy GoBag after discovering a need for having a stylish, military-grade bag for moms (and dads) on the go. After constantly traveling with her 30-year Army veteran husband, Lonnie, and their children, for the military, she came up with the Mommy GoBag solution while at an airport dealing with her youngest child coming down with motion sickness. She wanted to give other moms the ability to be ready for any situation and look stylish at the same time while traveling.

About The Founders Jillian and Lonnie Coburn

Coburn is an entrepreneur, inventor, writer, outdoorswoman, and mother of three who is passionately committed to supporting and elevating women who have nowhere to turn and living under the shadows of domestic violence. As a survivor, she assists women living with abuse by empowering and teaching them how to get out, heal and build a life they’ve always imagined.

She is also the co-owner of NOLA Prestige Electric, a women/minority based contracting company. She founded the apparel line, Reel Housewives of the Deep South, in 2014, producing one-of-a-kind American-made designs for Southern women who love the outdoors and choose “catfishing over catfighting!”

Lonnie Coburn joined the Army at age 17 and retired September, 19th 2020 as a Captain. He served several tours of duty in his long military career.

Lonnie Coburn is an Operations Manager and Master Electrician at Nola Prestige Electrical and works in the United States Army Reserve as a Commissioned Engineer Officer. He graduated with an MBA from Western International University, and with a Bachelor of Business Administration in Operations Management and Supervision. 

Jillian and her husband Lonnie both live and work in Lago Vista, Texas with their three children.

 Our StoryJillian Coburn and her husband founded Mommy GoBag after discovering a need for having a stylish, military-grade bag for moms (and dads) on the go. After constantly traveling with her 30-year Army veteran husband, Lonnie, and their children, for the military, she came up with the Mommy GoBag solution while at an airport dealing with her youngest child coming down with motion sickness. She wanted to give other moms the ability to be ready for any situation and look stylish at the same time while traveling.About The Founders Jillian and Lonnie CoburnCoburn is an entrepreneur, inventor, writer, outdoorswoman, and mother of three who is passionately committed to supporting and elevating women who have nowhere to turn and living under the shadows of domestic violence. As a survivor, she assists women living with abuse by empowering and teaching them how to get out, heal and build a life they’ve always imagined.She is also the co-owner of NOLA Prestige Electric, a women/minority based contracting company. She founded the apparel line, Reel Housewives of the Deep South, in 2014, producing one-of-a-kind American-made designs for Southern women who love the outdoors and choose “catfishing over catfighting!”Lonnie Coburn joined the Army at age 17 and retired September, 19th 2020 as a Captain. He served several tours of duty in his long military career.Lonnie Coburn is an Operations Manager and Master Electrician at Nola Prestige Electrical and works in the United States Army Reserve as a Commissioned Engineer Officer. He graduated with an MBA from Western International University, and with a Bachelor of Business Administration in Operations Management and Supervision. Jillian and her husband Lonnie both live and work in Lago Vista, Texas with their three children.

story:
Fashion and sustainability are intrinsic partners. Yet, it is hard for many to lead an environmentally conscious lifestyle. That’s where we come in!

PAGE has established itself as a cultural disruptor. We want to bring the nostalgia of print back into the fantasy of fashion, the sustainable way. With our first issue in production and almost ready to be sent to printers, we need your support. It’s time that we had a physical reminder that fashion can run adjacent to the needs of our planet.

On our path to publishing, leading sustainable brands have committed to us. But we have hit a roadblock with the worldwide COVID-19 pandemic. Sill, we believe that there is light on the other side of this.

As we continue to produce content daily, our bi-annual print will feature exclusive articles and content limited or removed entirely from our online platform. With your help, the enthusiasts of fashion done the sustainable way, we bring you a collectible piece of culture -- PAGE Print.

I am the Editor In Chief and Founder of PAGE magazine. Fashion is why I fell in love with photography and design. Working in media and the fashion industry, I have noticed the lack of representation, not just of groups but of the ideas that shape us in our everyday decisions. 

The challenges we face are that of printing costs and that we want to be able to distribute this magazine as far and wide as possible, as our audience is here in America and abroad in places like Paris, London, and Melbourne. 

Shipping has already begun, expect 2-6 weeks to receive depending on your location. International shipping may affect shipping costs.

story:
We are an independent design studio.

We make fabric bags and clothes.

 

 

 

 

Lightweight, stylish bags

 

 

I was tired of carrying heavy leather bags and found out many of my friends share the same feeling.  Women already overstrain their hands by working, doing household chores, using smartphones, and taking care of children.

  A bag should not feel like a burden in their hands. Most women carry a bag every day, and they deserve a lightweight, practical bag.

There are fabric bags out there, but they are either not stylish or too expensive. We believe fabric bags should not be expensive, and our business was born.

 

 

 

Ready for the world

 

 

Our studio has 10 years of experience in textile and fashion design, and this makes us properly qualified to start this business.

At the first onset, we made and sold printed cotton bags via ETSY 6 years ago.  People loved our bags.  However, we could not move on to the next step due to several business constraints.

Today, we are working with a competent artisan who has 37 years of experience in bag manufacturing and operates a high-quality factory.  Besides, we discovered Indiegogo that will help us fund this business.

We want to spread the word about our bags through this campaign. 

We are proud to produce bags that are a perfect balance between design and fabric and have a sense of style as well.

 

 

 

What you get as a perk

You can match these bags for any look:  for work, a night out, or a vacation.

These fabric bags have a quiet gloss and a unique color that you won’t find in leather bags.

Because light weight is our focus, most bags come with an aluminum or fabric strap.  The only exception is RUMI bags which have a steel strap.  However, the strap is short, and you won’t feel the additional weight.

 

 

RUMI

$39 INDIEGOGO/ $55 RETAIL

          

 

100% NYLON

SIZE:  25×14×5 (cm)

Strap length: 45cm

Card pocket: 10×6.5 (cm)

Carry a wallet, sunglasses, keys, iphone7, lip balm, and compact powder.

 

 

 

 

 

 

CLEM

$65 INDIEGOGO / $89 RETAIL

                                                                                       

100% NYLON

SIZE:  27×18×5 (cm)

Strap length: 102cm

Zipper pocket: 16×10 (cm)

Carry a wallet, sunglasses,  iphone7, make-up pouch, a scarf,

and keep  your keys, compact powder and lip balm  in the zipper pocket.

 

2-WAY

 

 

 

 

 

BEAU

$65 INDIEGOGO / $89 RETAIL

                                                        

100% NYLON

SIZE:  30×18×4 (cm)

Strap length: 102cm

Card pocket: 10×6.5 (cm)

Carry a wallet, sunglasses, iphone7, make-up pouch, a scarf and your keys.

 

2-WAY

 

 

 

"And we have lots of Early Bird Perks"  ↗

 

 

 

You also help save stray cats

 

   

 

Another of our concern is animal welfare.

As a member of an animal rights group, I have seen and learned that there are too many stray cats that need help, especially in a big city like Seoul.  They are exposed to roadkill, hostile weather conditions, diseases, and animal cruelty.  A part of the fund collected through this campaign will be donated to organizations that help stray cats. We hope to make a difference, however small it may be.

In addition to animal welfare, we are generally concerned with social issues.  As we expand, we will be providing support into other areas of social concern.  By funding this campaign and spreading the word about our business, you could help make the world a little better.

 

The Timeline

 

           May 28 - Launch campaign   

    June 18 - Close campaign

      June 21   - Place orders       

    July 10~14 - Shipping         

     Late July - In your hands   

 

 

Progress update

We will frequently update you on the shipment of your perks as well as our progress in general. 

If you’d like to reach our team, please email us at lisa904ss@gmail.com.

 

 

 

Spread our Campaign

Our biggist hurdle is getting people to know that we exist.

    We would be so grateful

if you would share our campaign with your friends and family.

Thank you,

story:
Did you know that 85% of the global population can not find their shade in products labelled as "nude?"-- think foundation, lipstick lingerie, and yes, even footwear. 

I am Jeneba Barrie, Founder of Jeneba Barrie Nude Footwear.  During the day I am an attorney and at night I become obsessed with creating  the most diverse and inclusive luxury nude (skin-tone) footwear line on the market. We currently have 13 nude (skin-tone) shades in our collection--the most on the market--and we are just getting started. For far too long the market has had a very restrictive and narrow definition of "nude"--one or two shades of beige. We all know that when it comes to nude shoes, like foundation, one or two shades are not enough. 

Our line was created with the objective of fixing this problem. Our product affords everyday women true nude versatility with pumps that can be worn from the boardroom to happy hour and even running errands around town.   

Why Nude or Skintone?

A good pair of nude shoes gives the wearer a seamless look, it elongates the legs and it is versatile, as you can wear it with anything in your closet. Our line guarantees leg lengthening nudes.

story:
About eight years ago, we started out creating designs for independent watch brands. Originality was important to set these brands apart. Over the years, we got good at pushing boundaries and creating original designs.

With the experience gained, we're launching BADGER Watches – A modern watch brand with a vision to create high quality watches from original ideas. The Islander Automatic - our first ever watch – is a tonneau watch with a Swiss-made Sellita SW200-1 automatic movement. 

 

As seen in 

 

On The Wrist 

We designed the Islander to suit a range of wrist sizes. The following wrist shots are taken off a slightly smaller-than-average male wrist at 6.75 inches. 

 

Tonneau case 

A tonneau watch is one with a rectangular structure tapered at its ends. We designed the Islander as a tonneau for the incredible amount of wrist presence it gives. This comes from its uninterrupted form and generous dial display.

Between the wrist presence of a tonneau case and the satisfaction of reading time from a round dial - We designed the Islander to have both. We took an architectural approach to our two-layered dial design to give you the best of both worlds.

 

Every detail matters

We worked a lot on the case design, and spent even more time on the details. These include a sunburst Guilloché dial, sectored teardrop hands, and outlined hours. We designed every detail thinking about the detail next to it. This all came together into a watch unlike any other. 

 

Materials and construction

We gave the Islander Automatic as much substance as its form by making sure we didn't cut corners on the build. The watch features a three-part case construction, eight-screw caseback, brushed and polished surface finishings, Superluminova hands and hours, and sapphire crystal, which is only second to diamond in hardness.

 

The movement

If you've come across many mechanical movements by now, you'll know they are not all created equal. The ‘Elaboré’ grade SW200-1 movements we are using are crafted by skilled watchmakers in La Chaux-de-Fonds, Switzerland, and are amongst the best in its class in quality and accuracy. 

 

The 26-jewel movement has a hacking-second function and power reserve of 38 hours. You can choose to wind it manually or let it self-wind from your wrist's kinetic motion. It has a frequency of 28,800 vph. This means you get a very smooth sweeping second hand that ticks eight times in a second.

More hours are needed to make ‘Elaboré’ grade movements. They are adjusted to a higher accuracy (from 12 sec/day variance to 7 sec/day), and the rotor will be decorated with Côtes de Genève stripes. Watches with 'Elaboré' grade movements are typically offered by established brands above USD$1,000.

 

Here's what they say about us

 

The Collection Overview

Our Islander collection comes in four variations:

Onyx black

Azure blue

Sage green

Origin edition (limited to 99 pieces)

And you get to choose from the following quick-release Italian leather straps:

  • Fine grain black
  • Fine grain brown
  • Suede grey
  • Suede blue

The origin edition comes in a satin silver dial with its accents all done in navy blue. They come numbered and we will only be making 99 of these, of which 50 are available on Kickstarter in a Super Earlybird tier. (You get to pick your number, earlier backers pick first)

While the rest of the designs aren’t numbered, we will produce them in limited quantities. That way, we put ourselves on our toes to keep on creating from new and original ideas.

 

The Rewards 

We truly believe in creating original designs. We have invested in the tooling to make the final production prototypes you see in our campaign. All we need now is your support to bring the Islander into production.

For being the first to support us, we offer up to 35% discount on our retail price. The discounted prices will run for only a month on Kickstarter, some tiers come with limited slots. 

 

FREE DHL EXPRESS SHIPPING

All backers will receive free DHL Express shipping, worldwide. Customs duties and taxes are the buyer's responsibility upon delivery.

 

WARRANTY

We will provide a one year international warranty from the date you'll receive the watch. The warranty covers manufacturing defects.

Here are the full list of specifications and dimensions.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

  • 316L Stainless steel case
  • 5ATM Water resistance
  • 'Elaboré' grade Sellita SW200-1 movement
  • Côtes de Genève stripes decoration on movement rotor
  • Sunburst guilloche dial
  • Sapphire top crystal with AR coating
  • Superluminova BGW9 hands & indexes
  • Italian suede & leather strap options

 

DIMENSIONS

  • Case width without crown - 38mm
  • Thickness - 10.9mm
  • Lug to lug - 48mm (strap ends are 44mm apart)
  • Strap width - 22mm 

 

Who Are We

Leroy Xavier Zhong is the designer/founder of BADGER Watches. He started designing timepieces professionally in 2012, and for the past few years have had the pleasure of creating more than 50 designs for a couple of brands. 

He also holds the chief designer position for the timepiece division in a successful commercial brand, Hypergrand. He designed and oversaw production for more than 20,000 watches in the past few years. His work has been featured in GQ, Hypebeast, Watchpro, Esquire, Cool Material etc.

 

BADGER is his vision of a limited-production watch company. The opposite of a mass production brand, watch collections will be made in limited runs and never repeated.

Each Badger watch collection will tell its own story. One chapter to the next, a story is kept alive in the brand’s creative journey.

 

Risks and challenges

We may be new to Kickstarter, but where experience matters, we have completed more than 20 production cycles for various brands. Our production capabilities and supply chain are well established. From the backend to the DHL integrated front, we do not foresee any issues with production nor shipping. We are very close to the ground with our suppliers and shippers. Our communication channels are set up to solve problems quickly if they arise.

story:
Short Summary

* 英語に続いて日本語を掲載しています.

暑さに打ち勝つ！持ち運べるボディクーラー、「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」

服の下から冷風を送る充電式のポータブル・ボディクーラーで、あなただけの微気候空間をつくりましょう。

Summer is only 5 months away, and with it comes unbearable heat! Most personal coolers are hand-held and blow air on the face and neck only, thus severely limiting their cooling effect. In contrast, the Cool Human(TM) Portable Body Cooler is a hands-free cooler that  clips on to the belt or pants and is designed to be worn hidden UNDER the clothes and blow a steady stream of air up UNDER your shirt, thus cooling your entire upper body by cooling the microclimate that surrounds you. 

個人用のクーラーは、手で持って顔や首などに直接冷風を当てるようなものがほとんどです。そのため、冷却効果には限界があります。

その一方、ポータブル・ボディクーラーである「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」はベルトやズボンなどに取り付け、服の下にすっぽりおさまるように設計されています。涼しい風が服の下から体全体に吹き込み、体の周りに微気候空間を作って上半身全体を涼しくすることができます。

 Cool down your body's microclimate, not the whole room! 

Your shirt acts as a closed system, preventing the blowing air from escaping too quickly and allowing it to circulate around your body, creating a microclimate that evaporates your sweat as it forms and cooling you down much more than a wet towel or hand held fan could.

部屋全体を冷やすより、体に微気候空間を作ろう！

シャツを着た状態の体は密閉空間のようになっており、空気が体を巡らないため風の通りが悪い状態です。そのため、濡れタオルや手持ち扇風機などよりも効果的な、かいた汗を蒸発させて体を冷やす作用を促す「微気候空間」を作りにくくしています。

 The problem 

Overheating not only causes sweat and discomfort, but may even lead to dangerous health conditions such as heat exhaustion or heatstroke. 

Overheating also limits performance in sports and exercise by:

  • Reducing muscular endurance
  • Shifting metabolism from aerobic to anaerobic (unable to exercise as long)
  • Causing dilation of blood vessels in the skin, leading to reduced blood volume returning to the heart (increased fatigue)

The best way of cooling down the body is through the body's own innate mechanism of evaporative cooling, in which sweat produced by the body evaporates in the surrounding air, thus lowering the body's core temperature. 

In fact, this is how nearly all of those "miracle" cooling shirts work--wicking your sweat through the shirt to the outside where the wind can evaporate it. 

  But evaporative cooling is not effective when there is no wind, if you are indoors, or when humidity is high. Without a wind or dry air to act as a catalyst, they are just regular shirts.

体が熱くなりすぎると、汗をかいたり気持ち悪く感じたりするだけでなく、極度の疲労や心臓発作などの健康に害のある症状を引き起こす可能性があります。

また、体が熱くなりすぎることで、スポーツやエクササイズのパフォーマンスが以下のように下がってしまいます：

筋肉の耐性が低下する

代謝状態を好気性から嫌気性に変える (長時間の運動に耐えられなくなる）

皮膚内の血管を拡張子、心臓に戻る血液量を少なくする (疲労感増大につながる)

体の熱を逃す最も効果的な方法は、本来人間の体に備わっている気化冷却機能です。気化冷却とは、人間がかいた汗が空気中に蒸発することで熱を逃す機能で、体の深部の熱を下げてくれる働きがあります。

Why you need this

The Cool Human(TM) Portable Body Cooler eliminates these problems by producing air flow where you need it the most--UNDER your clothes. 

And it works wonderfully, even when there is no wind or there is high humidity.  ​Your sweat is able to evaporate as soon as it forms, cooling you down significantly no matter what the external conditions are.  

And even better, you don't need to wear a sweat soaked shirt to achieve evaporative cooling.

しかし、気化冷却機能は室内や湿度が高い場合など、十分な空気が通らない場所にいると効果が半減してしまいます。 

そんな時でも、この持ち運べるボディクーラー「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」があれば、衣類の下で風の通り道を作り、風のない湿度の高い場所でも人間の気化冷却機能の効果を発揮させることができます。

どんな外気状態にいても、あなたがかいた汗は空気中に蒸発して体温をしっかりと下げてくれます。

Excellent cooling in everyday activities

持ち運べるボディクーラー「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」は、例えばこんなときに効果的に活用できます。

Lower core body temperature; boost performance in and out of the gym. 

The cooler can also be worn outside the shirt depending on your preference.

このクーラーはあなたの好みに合わせて服の外に装着することもできます。

Why is this cooler different?  

Some of the main differences between the Cool Human(TM) Portable Body Cooler and other wearable coolers are listed below.  

他のクーラーとは何が違うの？ 

持ち運べるボディクーラー「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」 と他のウェアラブルクーラーの主な違いは、下記の通りです。 

  • Invisible. Curved air input port placed BEHIND the clip, NOT on the outside, allows for unimpeded air flow even when the outside of the cooler is covered by a shirt, thus maintaining strong aeration under the clothes at all times. 

服の中に隠すことができます。装置の外側ではなくクリップの後ろに斜めにデザインされた気の取り込み口がついているので、装置がシャツで覆われていても空気をスムーズに取り込むことができ、いつでも通気性の良い状態を保ちます。

  •  Cools under all conditions. Effective in poorly ventilated areas or high humidity.

どんな状況でも体の温度を下げます。 換気の悪い場所や多湿な環境でも効果抜群。

  •  Portable and convenient. Small size, can be taken anywhere.

持ち運びでき、便利です。 小さいサイズで、どこへでも持っていけます。

  •  Versatile. 3 separate speeds; low, medium and high.

 多目的使用も可。 弱・中・強の3つの異なるスピードに調整可能。

 
  • Rechargable. Can be recharged using any standard phone or computer recharger.

充電可能。 一般的なケータイやPCの充電器で充電できます。

 

  •  Silent. Barely audible at the lowest setting with normal ambient sound, and non-obvious at higher air flow settings.

静かな稼働音。 スピードが弱の設定なら若干聞こえる程度、強でも邪魔にならない程度のボリュームです。

  •  Long-lasting. Up to 12-14 hours of continuous use on a single charge!  

とっても長持ち。 1回の充電で12-14時間程度稼働できます。

  •  Strong air flow at all speeds. 

弱・中・強、どのスピードでもしっかりした風圧。

  •  Multi-use. Also functions as a bright LED flashlight for safety. 

 様々な用途に利用可。 安全のためのLEDフラッシュライトとしても機能。

 

  •  Multiple styles (plain, retro style circuit, futuristic social media). 

 Styles

 プレーン・レトロサーキットデザイン、近未来ソーシャルメディアデザインの複数デザインを取り揃えています。

                                                                                       3D Effect!

デザイン

プレーン

レトロなサーキットデザイン

近未来的なソーシャルメディアデザイン

  •  Lightweight. Light enough to be used even when running.

 本体は非常に軽く、ランニングの際に装着することもできます。

 

  • There is one more real benefit to using the Cool Human(TM) Portable Human Cooler: Cost and energy savings. 

持ち運べるボディクーラー「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」を利用するもう一つのとっておきのメリットは、コストとエネルギー消費を抑えることができる点です。 

 Time to get serious about reducing your environmental footprint. 

環境へのダメージについて、本気で考えてみませんか？

Air conditioners are necessary but consume an enormous amount of energy. Although the Cool Human(TM) Portable Body Cooler is not meant to completely replace normal air conditioner use, it can reduce it significantly, since you are only cooling the area next to your body, not entire rooms.  This offers the benefits of:

  • Decreased CFCs, HFCs, and HFO's
  • Decreased energy use (decreased CO2 release)
  • Significant cost savings over time

To promote a green society, for this campaign, the Cool Human(TM) Portable Body Cooler will be shipped to you free of charge if you reside in the USA, Canada, most European countries, Australia, Japan, Indonesia, Philippines, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore!

エアコンは生活に欠かせませんが、非常に膨大なエネルギーを要します。 持ち運べるボディクーラー「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」 は通常のエアコンを完全に代替するものではありませんが、部屋全体を冷やさずに自分の体の周りだけを温度を下げることができるので、使用するエネルギー量を大幅に削減できます。

これにより、下記のようなメリットが期待できます：

CFC、HFC、HFOなどのオゾン層を破壊するガスを削減

エネルギー消費量を削減（同時にCO2排出量も削減）

長期的にみて大幅なコスト削減

エコな社会を作るためにも、今回のクラウドファンディングキャンペーンでは、アメリカ・カナダ、EU諸国・オーストラリア・日本・インドネシア・フィリピン、ベトナム・タイ・マレーシア・シンガポールにお住まいの方向けには 持ち運べるボディクーラー「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」 を無料で配送いたします！

Summary

Specs

The Cool Human(TM) Portable Human Cooler features the following specs:

仕様:

大きさ: 76x120x40 mm

入力電圧・電流: 5V@800mA -> 5V/800mA

出力電圧・電流: 5W Discharge : 5V@800mA -> DC5V : 5V/800mA

充電時間:  5V/1Aの充電器で、約6時間

使用時間: 風量弱設定で最大約12-14時間、風量中で最大7時間、風量最大で5時間

接続端子: スタンダードMicro USB端子

TypeA端子（バッテリーポート）: 最大出力電流は800mAです。

通常の電源ポートには、USBおよびケータイ充電ケーブルをご利用いただけます。

All perks will be sent by April 2020.

 

Risks & Challenges

This is the first project involving production of an electronic gadget. While I do not anticipate any problems with production, the fact that it contains a lithium battery makes shipping individual units challenging due to restrictions on the shipment of lithium battery containing items. So to ensure that all backers will get their coolers, I will be shipping in bulk to each country to store at a fulfillment warehouse in each country so there will be no problem. There could be unexpected delays associated with this. However, I have set April as the delivery date to give myself plenty of time to address any problems that may arise, but I anticipate they will be done well before this time.

Other Ways You Can Help

You dont need to purchase to participate in product development. if you know someone who suffers from overheating, please share this campaign with them.

Additionally, you can also show support by hitting the subscribe subscribing button on the Cool Human(TM) Youtube channel here  

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWFl5bzLr1FG6l...

 if there is sufficient interest and I get 100 subscribers or more, this channel will list the latest cooling products from around the world, and will also offer occasional unbiased reviews of cooling products I find and want to try. You will also be able to comment on the products.  I will not accept free products in exchange for reviews or engage in advertising on this channel, so you can be sure the reviews are genuine.

Short Summary
* 英語に続いて日本語を掲載しています.
暑さに打ち勝つ！持ち運べるボディクーラー、「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」
服の下から冷風を送る充電式のポータブル・ボディクーラーで、あなただけの微気候空間をつくりましょう。
Summer is only 5 months away, and with it comes unbearable heat! Most personal coolers are hand-held and blow air on the face and neck only, thus severely limiting their cooling effect. In contrast, the Cool Human(TM) Portable Body Cooler is a hands-free cooler that  clips on to the belt or pants and is designed to be worn hidden UNDER the clothes and blow a steady stream of air up UNDER your shirt, thus cooling your entire upper body by cooling the microclimate that surrounds you. 


個人用のクーラーは、手で持って顔や首などに直接冷風を当てるようなものがほとんどです。そのため、冷却効果には限界があります。
その一方、ポータブル・ボディクーラーである「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」はベルトやズボンなどに取り付け、服の下にすっぽりおさまるように設計されています。涼しい風が服の下から体全体に吹き込み、体の周りに微気候空間を作って上半身全体を涼しくすることができます。
 Cool down your body's microclimate, not the whole room! 
Your shirt acts as a closed system, preventing the blowing air from escaping too quickly and allowing it to circulate around your body, creating a microclimate that evaporates your sweat as it forms and cooling you down much more than a wet towel or hand held fan could.

部屋全体を冷やすより、体に微気候空間を作ろう！
シャツを着た状態の体は密閉空間のようになっており、空気が体を巡らないため風の通りが悪い状態です。そのため、濡れタオルや手持ち扇風機などよりも効果的な、かいた汗を蒸発させて体を冷やす作用を促す「微気候空間」を作りにくくしています。
 The problem 
Overheating not only causes sweat and discomfort, but may even lead to dangerous health conditions such as heat exhaustion or heatstroke. 
Overheating also limits performance in sports and exercise by:

Reducing muscular endurance
Shifting metabolism from aerobic to anaerobic (unable to exercise as long)
Causing dilation of blood vessels in the skin, leading to reduced blood volume returning to the heart (increased fatigue)

The best way of cooling down the body is through the body's own innate mechanism of evaporative cooling, in which sweat produced by the body evaporates in the surrounding air, thus lowering the body's core temperature. 


In fact, this is how nearly all of those "miracle" cooling shirts work--wicking your sweat through the shirt to the outside where the wind can evaporate it.   But evaporative cooling is not effective when there is no wind, if you are indoors, or when humidity is high. Without a wind or dry air to act as a catalyst, they are just regular shirts.
体が熱くなりすぎると、汗をかいたり気持ち悪く感じたりするだけでなく、極度の疲労や心臓発作などの健康に害のある症状を引き起こす可能性があります。
また、体が熱くなりすぎることで、スポーツやエクササイズのパフォーマンスが以下のように下がってしまいます：
筋肉の耐性が低下する
代謝状態を好気性から嫌気性に変える (長時間の運動に耐えられなくなる）
皮膚内の血管を拡張子、心臓に戻る血液量を少なくする (疲労感増大につながる)
体の熱を逃す最も効果的な方法は、本来人間の体に備わっている気化冷却機能です。気化冷却とは、人間がかいた汗が空気中に蒸発することで熱を逃す機能で、体の深部の熱を下げてくれる働きがあります。
Why you need this
The Cool Human(TM) Portable Body Cooler eliminates these problems by producing air flow where you need it the most--UNDER your clothes. 

And it works wonderfully, even when there is no wind or there is high humidity.  ​Your sweat is able to evaporate as soon as it forms, cooling you down significantly no matter what the external conditions are.  
And even better, you don't need to wear a sweat soaked shirt to achieve evaporative cooling.
しかし、気化冷却機能は室内や湿度が高い場合など、十分な空気が通らない場所にいると効果が半減してしまいます。 
そんな時でも、この持ち運べるボディクーラー「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」があれば、衣類の下で風の通り道を作り、風のない湿度の高い場所でも人間の気化冷却機能の効果を発揮させることができます。
どんな外気状態にいても、あなたがかいた汗は空気中に蒸発して体温をしっかりと下げてくれます。
Excellent cooling in everyday activities
持ち運べるボディクーラー「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」は、例えばこんなときに効果的に活用できます。




Lower core body temperature; boost performance in and out of the gym. 

The cooler can also be worn outside the shirt depending on your preference.
このクーラーはあなたの好みに合わせて服の外に装着することもできます。

Why is this cooler different?

Invisible. Curved air input port placed BEHIND the clip, NOT on the outside, allows for unimpeded air flow even when the outside of the cooler is covered by a shirt, thus maintaining strong aeration under the clothes at all times. 
服の中に隠すことができます。装置の外側ではなくクリップの後ろに斜めにデザインされた気の取り込み口がついているので、装置がシャツで覆われていても空気をスムーズに取り込むことができ、いつでも通気性の良い状態を保ちます。
 Cools under all conditions. Effective in poorly ventilated areas or high humidity.
どんな状況でも体の温度を下げます。 換気の悪い場所や多湿な環境でも効果抜群。
 Portable and convenient. Small size, can be taken anywhere.
持ち運びでき、便利です。 小さいサイズで、どこへでも持っていけます。
 Versatile. 3 separate speeds; low, medium and high.
 多目的使用も可。 弱・中・強の3つの異なるスピードに調整可能。


 

Rechargable. Can be recharged using any standard phone or computer recharger.
充電可能。 一般的なケータイやPCの充電器で充電できます。




 

 Silent. Barely audible at the lowest setting with normal ambient sound, and non-obvious at higher air flow settings.
静かな稼働音。 スピードが弱の設定なら若干聞こえる程度、強でも邪魔にならない程度のボリュームです。
 Long-lasting. Up to 12-14 hours of continuous use on a single charge!  
とっても長持ち。 1回の充電で12-14時間程度稼働できます。
 Strong air flow at all speeds. 

弱・中・強、どのスピードでもしっかりした風圧。
 Multi-use. Also functions as a bright LED flashlight for safety. 
 様々な用途に利用可。 安全のためのLEDフラッシュライトとしても機能。


 

 Multiple styles (plain, retro style circuit, futuristic social media). 
 Styles
 プレーン・レトロサーキットデザイン、近未来ソーシャルメディアデザインの複数デザインを取り揃えています。


                                                                                       3D Effect!

デザイン
プレーン
レトロなサーキットデザイン
近未来的なソーシャルメディアデザイン
 Lightweight. Light enough to be used even when running.
 本体は非常に軽く、ランニングの際に装着することもできます。


 

There is one more real benefit to using the Cool Human(TM) Portable Human Cooler: Cost and energy savings. 

持ち運べるボディクーラー「Cool Human（クール・ヒューマン）」を利用するもう一つのとっておきのメリットは、コストとエネルギー消費を抑えることができる点です。 
 Time to get serious about reducing your environmental footprint. 
環境へのダメージについて、本気で考えてみませんか？

Air conditioners are necessary but consume an enormous amount of energy. Although the Cool Human(TM) Portable Body Cooler is not meant to completely replace normal air conditioner use, it can reduce it significantly, since you are only cooling the area next to your body, not entire rooms.  This offers the benefits of:

Decreased CFCs, HFCs, and HFO's
Decreased energy use (decreased CO2 release)
Significant cost savings over time

To promote a green society, for this campaign, the Cool Human(TM) Portable Body Cooler will be shipped to you free of charge if you reside in the USA, Canada, most European countries, Australia, Japan, Indonesia, Philippines, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore!

これにより、下記のようなメリットが期待できます：
CFC、HFC、HFOなどのオゾン層を破壊するガスを削減
エネルギー消費量を削減（同時にCO2排出量も削減）

Specs
The Cool Human(TM) Portable Human Cooler features the following specs:

仕様:
大きさ: 76x120x40 mm

出力電圧・電流: 5W Discharge : 5V@800mA -> DC5V : 5V/800mA

使用時間: 風量弱設定で最大約12-14時間、風量中で最大7時間、風量最大で5時間

story:
The wallet you see on the campaign is what you'll get. The wallets pictured are made by the very same way that yours will be.

It has been many months in the making and now that we've finalised the entire production process - from the design to the shipping - we're ready to show the Carboné to you.

As this is our first Indiegogo, we've given ourselves plenty of leeway until the end of the year but expect the wallets to be delivered earlier than expected.

It's our highest priority to keep an open channel with you every step of the way through Indiegogo updates and comments to ensure you always know what's going on.

Risks and challenges
The wallet you see on the campaign is what you'll get. The wallets pictured are made by the very same way that yours will be.
It has been many months in the making and now that we've finalised the entire production process - from the design to the shipping - we're ready to show the Carboné to you.
As this is our first Indiegogo, we've given ourselves plenty of leeway until the end of the year but expect the wallets to be delivered earlier than expected.
