story:
Short Summary

Here at THRIFTees Apparel we believe that the best clothes are the unique and mysterious found in the corners and isles of thrift shops, and not boring basic overpriced fashion from big box stores. We want to reinvent the idea of vintage apparel by finding the best of the best from stores all over and bringing recycled clothing to cool people like you. With your support, we plan to expand by investing more money in inventory and growing our online presence. 


The Impact

We hope to expand our online presence and buy up more inventory to bring our business to life! With more products in stock, we will be able to offer customers a larger selection as well as becoming more well known as a trust worthy online shop. 

Risks & Challenges

A risk we could take is buying to much inventory too quickly and not being able to move products quick enough. We plan to prevent this by having a reasonable number of articles up at a time. No challenges are presented to the backer/supporter of this project however.
Other Ways You Can Help

Like us on Facebook and check out our website!

www.thrifteesapparel.com

story:
About Us

The Moda team strives to help men slip into a style that they are comfortable and confident in, at an affordable price and in a convenient manor. No more trudging through the strip mall, roaming from store to store to no avail - we bring the wardrobe to you. You find your own groove, and we dispatch a set of three days of apparel that we find fits your taste. You try them on in the comfort of your own home. The pieces that you admire are yours to keep, and you simply ship the rest back to us.

What We Need & What You Get

We need:

  • $5000 for startup inventory
  • $360 for LLC 
  • $620 for a P.O. box
  • $1200 for bank account and other legal expenses
  • Moral support!
  • People who are excited about what we are doing :)

The Impact 

We love seeing people look their best, and we adore hearing that they feel great about how they look.
I (Olivia, "CEO") currently work part-time as an inventory manager at an electronic cigarette store. My boss asked me one day to take her son shopping, because she was "tired of him dressing like a bum," and he "is just too lazy to go pick out new clothes." So, I took Tate shopping. It was such a fun and uplifting experience to find him clothes that made him look and feel handsome, that I decided to turn it into a profession. Thus, the idea for móda gärb was born. With my sales and inventory experience and the help of my entrepreneur fiance, I have high hopes for my company.
  • móda gärb is working toward gaining an inventory warehouse as we grow
  • we plan to employ hundreds of fashion enthusiasts across the country as work-from-home consultants
  • we are different because we know that you aren't made of money - we offer both quality and affordability

Risks & Challenges

  • too little interest: lack of funding
If funding falls through, we will have to search for investors and interested parties to provide additional funding. However, quitting is not an option.
  • too much interest: lack of employees
We have very few employees at the moment, but we do have several on a call list on standby, ready to drop their boring retail jobs and join the team.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you know of any small brands trying to get their start and willing to team up, have them contact us! Inquiries: modagarb@gmail.com
  • Tell your friends, tell your family, tell your coworkers!
  • Share on indiegogo, or support us on instagram and twitter: @modagarb

Thank you all for being generous with your time, consideration, and support :)
story_txt:
About Us
 
The Moda team strives to help men slip into a style that they are comfortable and confident in, at an affordable price and in a convenient manor. No more trudging through the strip mall, roaming from store to store to no avail - we bring the wardrobe to you. You find your own groove, and we dispatch a set of three days of apparel that we find fits your taste. You try them on in the comfort of your own home. The pieces that you admire are yours to keep, and you simply ship the rest back to us.   What We Need & What You Get
We need:

$5000 for startup inventory
$360 for LLC 
$620 for a P.O. box
$1200 for bank account and other legal expenses Moral support! People who are excited about what we are doing :)

 The Impact 

We love seeing people look their best, and we adore hearing that they feel great about how they look.

I (Olivia, "CEO") currently work part-time as an inventory manager at an electronic cigarette store. My boss asked me one day to take her son shopping, because she was "tired of him dressing like a bum," and he "is just too lazy to go pick out new clothes." So, I took Tate shopping. It was such a fun and uplifting experience to find him clothes that made him look and feel handsome, that I decided to turn it into a profession. Thus, the idea for móda gärb was born. With my sales and inventory experience and the help of my entrepreneur fiance, I have high hopes for my company.  móda gärb is working toward gaining an inventory warehouse as we grow
 we plan to employ hundreds of fashion enthusiasts across the country as work-from-home consultants
we are different because we know that you aren't made of money - we offer both quality and affordability    Risks & Challenges  too little interest: lack of funding

If funding falls through, we will have to search for investors and interested parties to provide additional funding. However, quitting is not an option.
 too much interest: lack of employees 
We have very few employees at the moment, but we do have several on a call list on standby, ready to drop their boring retail jobs and join the team.   Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  If you know of any small brands trying to get their start and willing to team up, have them contact us! Inquiries: modagarb@gmail.com Tell your friends, tell your family, tell your coworkers!
Share on indiegogo, or support us on instagram and twitter: @modagarb   Thank you all for being generous with your time, consideration, and support :)

story:
Hi, my name is Dávid Juhász. I am the founder of WearWar. I have been a huge fan of roleplaying and board games since childhood. I love coming up with different characters. I am a firm believer that a good character can encompass and carry an endless amount of stories, be it in a novel, a film or a game. I have long been pre-occupied with how I can create a brand that is based entirely on the characters that I have brought to life. This is essentially how the concept of WearWar was born. Community games have moved into the online world during the last couple of decades. With the help of WearWar, my intention is to return the excitement of community gaming into the real world. I believe that it is enough to truly engage players - everything else will come naturally.

Wear It and Wage War!

The starter series consists of five characters, which you can purchase in both men’s and women’s cut on Indiegogo.

Regarding the gameplay itself, each side of the T-shirt is important: the hero is located on the front, and the back contains their name and who they can defeat.

Course of the Game:

  • Wear a WearWar T-shirt.
  • Once you meet an opponent, recognize each other as WearWar players! Someone will win, and someone will lose.
  • Decide for yourselves how you go about the situation.
  • Take a picture or make a video of the encounter, and post it via the smartphone app to the WearWar community page to your own heroes’ profile! Here you can also update everyone on the possible prize, or how the encounter went down.

In this way, members of the community can check out stories from around the world of others who had been strangers just moments before, all on their favorite characters’ page. They can also scroll through exciting statistics of current character standings.

 

Besides leaving the decision of what the winner’s prize should be in players’ hands, Wearwar also suggests a counter-cultural philosophy to participants, where the notion of winning at all costs is brought into question. This attitude of wanting others to win helps us make inner personal discoveries and fosters the well-being of our community. It helps us to deal with losing, and to differentiate between happiness and triumph. Why shouldn’t we be able to experience a stranger’s triumph over us as a success? A Wearwar player is sexy because they wear their loss with pride, and their opponents’ happy smile symbolizes their prize.

 

Why Do I Ask For Your Support?

The commercial introduction of the WearWar brand requires:

  • A total of 8.000 dollars;
  • The development of a webshop-based community page;
  • The development of a native mobile app;
  • Production of a 500 piece T-shirt stock needed for launching the webshop;
  • I would also like to strengthen WearWar’s already existing professional team, fund the initial promotions and brand communication essential to the brand launch.

 

Perks

You bear no risk! Since the WearWar project is already in its production phase, you are guaranteed to receive your perks, regardless of which ones you have chosen.

 

Up and Coming Updates

If the idea of WearWar appeals to you, some special perks will become available to you during Indiegogo’s campaign:

  • A limited series T-shirt with the amazing sixth character, which you can only acquire here, on Indiegogo.
  • Loving the character? Become the sole owner of the original hero sketches!
  • Interested in co-creating new characters? No problem!

 

Why Do I Believe in WearWar?

As more and more WearWar players start embracing the philosophy of „Losing Is Sexy”, little by little, the world starts becoming a better place. The lovable, cool characters are going to be followed by newer ones, thus the universe of WearWar expands ever wider. Games are more popular than ever. More and more of us are becoming disillusioned by the pervasive fabric of online gaming, and are willing to get involved in activities based on exciting, real-life connections.

 

Who Can Stop the WearWar Heroes?

Noone. Our WearWar Team has a wealth of professional experience, therefore, we tried our very best to prepare for the upcoming challenges while designing the campaign. We believe that all of these challenges can be overcome with dedicated effort, and we hope that you too can support us in this!

 

 

The goal of WearWar is to emerge as a unique brand from the vast market of T-shirts available today. WearWar is more than a simple clothing line, therefore, we place extra focus on brand communication straight out of the gate.

The characters are different in their personalities, so we do not expect everyone to love the same heroes. This is another reason why we plan on constantly fielding newer and newer characters on the battlefiled after the launch. We also expect contractor designers to join us in WearWar‘s later series.

We are quick to adapt to changes, however, we do not budge from the standard of quality that we have set for ourselves. We know no compromise when it comes to building an extensive and colorful network of distributors around WearWar‘s brand. The idea and concept itself of WearWar is a privately owned, patented trademark. The first series is already under production. The second, character concept design phase is in its final stages, therefore, utilizing our new funds make having our heroes available worldwide possible within weeks, with the launch of our new characters just around the corner!

 

Be a Part of the WearWar!

I hope we were able to convey to you our sense of excitement about the experiences and fantastic new connections that you will be able to make by simply wearing a WearWar T-shirt. Our community grows ever stronger with your support. Please share our WearWar news and campaign on your social media streams! Visit us in a bit, when you can expand your WearWar collection! See you you soon!

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram!

story:
Thank You in advance for checking out our IndieGoGo campaign! All the support is greatly appreciated!

You can find us at www.8eternity.com or Instagram official profile @8eternityofficial or via hashtag #8eternity

We make honest products durable and timeless.

GET YOUR ENGRAVED WATCH BY CLICKING HERE
 
Why are we different?
∞Eternity is supported by Italian Company having more than 20 years of experiences in Timepieces & Design. 

The goal is to achieve Luxury & Minimalistic but affordable products.
 

The way we challenge the status quo is by making our products

  • Beautifully Designed

  • Innovatively Engineered

  • Precise in every Detail

  • From Noble Materials

  • In Finest Quality

  • Created with Love

Feel the uniqueness flowing through your veins


The ∞ ETERNITY Symbolic Collection

THIS IS PANTHER

Courage.
Power.
Stealth.

THIS IS LION 

Pride.
Majesty.
Honor.

THIS IS ELEPHANT 

Strength.
Stability.
Patience.

THIS IS PANTHERA 

Charisma.
Grandeur.
Nobility.

THIS IS SNAKE 

Rebirth.
Intuition.
Intellect.

THIS IS VULTURE 

Knowledge.
Smartness.
Confidence.

In this moment we are looking for people who can help us to fund the ∞Eternity brand due to tough financial situation. For those people we have prepared special benefits and Your support WILL NOT be overlooked!


WATCH SPECIFICATIONS:

 

  •  45mm Case Width (MEN)
  •  36-40mm Case Width (WOMEN)
  •  22mm Strap Width
  • Interchangeable straps - Iron / Leather / Nylon
  • 100g / 0.1kg 
  • Pull Out Crown
  • Folding Buckle
  • Round Face With round Dial, 2-3 Hands & Logo
  • 316 High Precision Stainless Steel
  • Swiss Chronograph Movement 
  • 50M/5ATM Water Resistant
  • Sapphire Coated Lens 

Where is the ∞ETERNITY headed?

We want 3 Collections of different types and styled watches divided into 3 price categories that stay at an AFFORDABLE price. So join with us on this journey and be a part of it every step of the way.  We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond, with our backers, we want to build a connected family, because ultimately only You and your support is what is making this possible, to turn our dream into a reality.  We are excited to grow and We promise to enlarge the brand into more fields than only watches.
Backup our project and be sure that this is a little investment at the beginning, to raise even more in the future!

Who are we and how did it start?

Started by young and ambitious entrepreneurs from the very heart of Europe. We are Sports and Watch enthusiasts. We have been obsessed with watches our entire life and got fed up paying for overpriced name brand watches. So now we're doing it ourselves. We started this as a small project as friends and now we are hoping to push it forward!

What is our vision?

Beautiful design, simplicity and high quality engineering excellence built into one timepiece.

We are here to set the new standard, step up the game and make products that everybody wants to grab right from the screen. 

These are the watches you do not want to miss out on! You can easily wear it with a shirt during active lifestyle or with a suit on business meetings.

In a nutshell, it's a minimalistic yet functional watch with 45mm (men) / 36-40mm (women) case and a comfy high precision stainless steel.  

Lion was designed together with most delicate Italian watch crafters after their experience working for more than 20 years in this field. 

Eternity are not just a luxurious watches which are made by most us, the most passionate and ambitional young people, it’s also a story teller which tells what’s beneath the outer sight. Our customers write about as that our watches would be more accurately labeled as the “Thin Line Underneath The Past And The Present." Why? Well, that becomes less vague as to when we start seeing our watches as story tellers rather then just a time teller. Which is what Eternity accomplished with it’s watches by merging the finest luxuries and stories through a contemporary relation in it’s watches. 

Engrave & Customize

Say anything with a free engraving.

One of our main ideas is to give everyone the possibility to have a unique piece of watch by making it personalized with engraving.

Make it a gift they'll never forget by adding a personal laser-engraved message to your Watches.

Here is an example of the engraving on this sample photo - "Hungry Lion" on a LION model.

For the Start-up Symbolic Collection (photo above), this is what we will provide. Not only a watch, but the BEST POSSIBLE SERVICE THAT ANY BRAND EVER HAD, including these:

  1. Watches in Highest Possible Quality.

  2. Every watch customized by engraving Especially just for You.

  3. Made piece by piece, quickly as possible. (Production time: 55 days + delivery 1 week)

  4. The order/package will include several additional free stuff & gifts

    1. Interchangeable Leather Strap (future regular standalone price: 40$ USD)

    2. Original Quality Branded Stickers for iPhone and Macbook

    3. Original Stylish Wooden Box to keep your watch protected

    4. Luxury Black&Gold hard-paper wrapping

  5. It will be proudly decorated with a text of your choice (It could be for instance: Your name, favorite quote, greeting message, birth date, etc.)

  6. Possibility to obtain a VIP/B2B Price-list in case of an interested in working for us as a Wholesaler/Retailer/Distributor

  7. FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING BY AIR - VERY FAST!
    24-36HOURS ESTIMATED DELIVERY TIME!

We want to build a family on social media and connect everyone!

SO IF OUR CAMPAIGN WILL BE SUCCESSFUL AND YOU GET A WATCH FROM US, THEN SHOW PIECE OF YOURSELF, ADD HASHTAG #8ETERNITY & WRITE A REVIEW

 
Here are some examples of photos from our satisfied customers over the world.

We Need Your Support!

In order to keep the Eternity on track and keep moving forward, make more designs, more watches and make happy more and more people by turning this into a reality and providing the best possible service, we need your support. Not only does this mean looking out for one of our awesome watches, but sharing the story with the people around You! The main thing about fundraising on IndieGoGo is, that If you don't reach the goal, you get nothing, so NOW PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD!
Something as simple as sharing on your social media accounts, Tweeting, or just liking our FB page could be the main turning point of this whole thing and can help us so much more than you would imagine. 
Simply click on the social media tabs at the top of the page right below the video and current fund status, or at the bottom down here.

Do not forget to check out our FB PAGE and give it a like as well!

We, All of us here at ∞ETERNITY, want to thank You in advance for helping us kickstart and support this project!

Love You all ❤️

story:
____________________About Us_____________________

Established Los Angeles (LA) 

Raised in Philadelphia (PHI) 

Formed in New York City (NY)

LAPHINY is a genderless bag collection designed for the modern lifestyle. The name LAPHINY is inspired by the 3 cities where I‘ve lived, studied, and worked. The urban minimal esthetic appeals to the fast and on the go everyday commuter.

LAPHINY bags are crafted by local artisans with special attention to details. Our ­price structure allows us to use the best materials possible and still remain fair with our contractors. I am very involved in all the details to ensure each piece is price accessible to the customer without sacrificing quality and design.

If you like to reach us feel free to email us at info@laphiny.com.

___________________Goals & Rewards__________________

Our campaign goal is to raise $10,000 for the first round of production. The fund will goes toward, website, labor, materials & hardware. We offer discounted luxury leather bag and small leather goods on this campaign. Limited time ONLY.Just decide which design(s) you want and pick the bag.

For a note on bag size comparison, see images below

_________________Small Leather Goods________________

  • Passport Case: 4 1/1" W X 6" H
  • Key Holder: 3/4" W X 4" H
  • Bracelet: 1 1/2" W X 8"-11" H (Adjustable Closure)

___________________Everyday Tote__________________


  • Exterior: 100% Leather
  • Interior: Self Lining
  • Dimensions Approx: 13 3/4" W X 14 1/2" H X 4 1/2" D
  • Hardware: Gunmetal Finish
  • Straps: 100% Leather
  • 3 Inside Pockets & 1 Front Pocket
____________________Work & Play________________________


  • Exterior: 100% Leather
  • Interior: Padded Foam Lining
  • Dimensions: 11" W 15 1/2" H X 3/4" D
  • Detachable Strap:  6” Leather Handle
  • Hardware: Black Matted & Gunmetal Finish
  • 1 Front Zipped Pocket

_______________Weekend Adventure________________

  • Exterior: 100% Leather
  • Interior: Faux Suede
  • Dimensions: 22" W X 12 3/4" H X 6 1/2” D 
  • Detachable Compartment: 22“ W 1/4” X 3 1/2" H X 6 3/4” D
  • Hardware: Gunmetal Finish
  • Straps: Nylon
  • 2 Inside Pockets, 1 Front Pocket & 1 Back Pocket

____________________Explorer_______________________


  • Exterior: 100% Leather
  • Interior: Faux Suede
  • Dimensions: 12 3/4 " W X 15 1/2" H X 3 1/4" D
  • Hardware: Gunmetal Finish
  • Nylon Adjustable Strap: 60”-81”
  • 3 Interior Pockets, 1 Front Pocket & 1 Back Pocket

________________________Dopp Kit____________________________


  • Exterior: 100% Leather
  • Interior:100% Nylon Quick Dry
  • Dimensions: 9 3/4"W  X 6"H X 6”D 
  • Hardware: Gunmetal Finish 
  • 3 Inside Pockets , 1 Front Pocket & 1 Back Pocket

_________________Team & Inspiration_______________

Hello! My name is Sorn. I am the Founder & Creative Director for LAPHINY.  I’ve graduated from Moore College of Art & Design with a BFA in Fashion & minor in Textiles. I had worked with many design companies spanning from New York to Los Angeles. I wanted to create a bag my husband and I both can use. This is how LAPHINY was born.

_________________Local Impact_____________________

LAPHINY bags are crafted by local artisans in the Los Angeles area.

  • Your contribution will help keep the jobs in Los Angeles
  • Support our local Artisans
  • Help build small businesses

___________________Materials_______________________

All of our materials are not sourced locally. We do however try our best in sourcing locally here in USA.
  • Approx 2-3 ounces of chrome tanned leather (cow hide)
  • Approx 3-4 ounces of embossed croc leather (cow hide)
  • Lining is either self, faux suede and nylon water resistant
  • Our hardware has either a black, silver or gunmetal finish
  • The straps are comprised of high-grade aircraft nylon for durability

__________________Time Guide____________________

We've have spent the past few years sourcing hardware and experimenting with materials and designs, taking us through many stages from proto to samples.

We work with local artisans in the Los Angeles area. This stage of hand crafting the bags will take the most time. 

We are very happy to keep this made in Los Angeles collection to share with the world! Your contribution will help us fund this production and kick start this journey.

_________________Join Our Journey_________________

Please share this video. ­­­

  • Help Contribute NOW!! You can help us launch LAPHINY and be a part of our journey
  • Share our story & project. #laphiny #laphinycollection
  • Follow LAPHINY on facebook, instagram, & twitter

Thank You!!

________________Global Shipping__________________

For United States only any items over $100  will be FREE SHIPPING, there will be a small shipping fee for any item  under $100. An invoice of your order and shipment will be including.

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. So please consider all custom taxes & duties (VAT etc). We will be including an invoice of your order on top of the shipment.

______________Collaborators & Talents______________

First, thank you family and friends  for all your support and encouragement over the past few years. Thanks for believing in me John AKA husband!!

Collaborators-This project could not happen without your help and expertise:

Brenda Equihua- Brand Consultant

Dennis Mattei- Script Consultant 

Jared Farrell- Sound & Music engineer Music track "Lights of Babylon" Checkout his music on youtube & soundcloud

Stash Studio DTLA - Stills photographer ( Rene & Alain Mitchell)

Aarron  Merrill- Video Director

Joe LaMattina- Editor #1

Alex Ivany- Video Director/Editor #2

Garen Mirzaian- Camera Man #1

EJ- Camera Man #2

Calvin Edward- Male Model #1 

Max Heath- Male Model#2

Spring Terry- Female Model#1
Jasmine Landa- Female Model#2

story:
Our Website has more stuff! www.RebelLoveClothing.com

Product photos are at the top of this campaign, just scroll through the media where our video is

Meet the designers!

Elle Rebel: Elle has spent the last 10 years working in the fashion world. Trained in Fashion Design with a Post-Grad in International Business, she opened her first retail store at age 24, Rosie The Rebel boutique. After 2 years, her company had grown to 2 locations and a popular online shopping depot for retro and alternative apparel in Canada. With her background in garment construction and design, and the knowledge of what retailers need in their suppliers and what customers want in their retailers, starting her own clothing brand was the logical next step.

"As a retailer we have some amazing core brands that we can always depend on, but customers are always wanting more, more options, more sizing, more diversity in style. I wanted to create a pinup and subculture clothing brand that filled in some of the gaps in the industry, giving retailers what they need to keep their customers happy. We will continue to build our collection with more sizes, styles, while continuously analyzing our fit, quality, and customers needs to make sure we are the brand our Alternative fashion scene needs us to be" 

Kassandra Love: Kassandra Love's hands-on understanding of the Alternative Fashion world has made her the premier alternative model in the Toronto metro area. Her involvement in the scene includes modeling for fashion lines such as Jessica Louise and Toxic Vision and organizing fashion shows for local and international designers and Fashion businesses.
Kassandra's influence as an alternative model spans a wide range of media. Her images have been published in magazines such as Skin Two, Canadian Cycling, and Auxiliary. In Oct of 2015 she released her exclusive latex collection, which will also be available on www.RebelLoveClothing.com . Kassandra loves obsession with Alternative subculture makes her the perfect Alt designer, in tuned with the quickly evolving trends in the Alt scenes.

Welcome to our campaign!

Thanks for visiting our crowd funding campaign, with this campaign we hope to raise funds for:

  1. Bulk Manufacturing
  2. Bulk Fabric Print to lower overall fabric costs (and reduce our prices)
  3. Create a Retail/Wholesale website for easy wholesale orders.
  4. Design staffing, to expand our product line
  5. Expansion into plus sizes and menswear

What We Need & What You Get

We need a min of 25 pieces per style ordered to produce each of the styles available on this campaign. With your contribution we will be able to launch and expand our pinup collection to bring more and more amazing styles to market!

Our unique pledge rewards are designed to benefit you and help you be a part of our business.

Additionally, with any of the Pre-Order pledges, you'll receive an entry into our $500 Rebel Love Shopping Spree!

**Note to our customers, our prices are in USD regularly because our manufacturing prices are in USD, we apologize in advance for the exchange rate to Canadian dollar, and we will work towards lowering our manufacturing costs in the future, to help accommodate this unappealing exchange rate! We have converted all our prices on our Indie-a-gogo to CAD for the campaign with the most recent exchange rate, you can find US pricing on our website.**

Our Pre-Order Products and Color options 

PLEASE SEE CORRESPONDING IMAGES IN THE GALLERY AT THE TOP

ALL PRE ORDER ITEMS HAVE FREE SHIPPING IN CANADA

Snakebite Pencil Dress: This dress is curve hugging perfection, Made of Stretch lurex, available in sizes XS-2X (XS waist 26inch, 2X 37inch) in Lime Green, Black, Red for Oct ship dates and Emerald, Electric Blue, and Gold for Dec ship dates. Note: center of bust will be 1inch lower then photographed, adjusted for optimal cleavage! 

Snakebite Swing Dress: This Full Circle skirt version of our Snakebite dress is Elegance personified, and a show-stopping Holiday outfit! available in sizes XS-2X (XS waist 26inch, 2X 37inch) in Emerald, Black, Red for Oct ship dates and Purple, Electric Blue, and Gold for Dec ship dates. Note: center of bust will be 1inch lower then photographed, adjusted for optimal cleavage! 

Snakebite Pencil Skirt: Not a dress fan? you can still live the snakebite dream with this sky high pencil skirt. Cut 2 inches above the natural waist, and pictured here with a vintage Belt and back concealed metal zip. Available in Purple, Black and Red for Oct ship dates, and Emerald, Gold and Electric Blue for Dec ship dates. Made of Stretch lurex, available in sizes XS-2X (XS waist 26inch, 2X 37inch)

Snakebite Pants: Made of Stretch lurex, available in sizes XS-2X (XS waist 26inch, 2X 37inch)  These sky high Sandra-Dee-Esque pants feature a concealed back metal zip for a seamless front, cut to the ankle, and sit 1 inch above the natural waist, pictured here with a belt.  Available in Black and Red for Oct Ship dates, and Purple, Emerald and Electric blue for Dec ship dates. 

Beauty Mark Swing Dress: Made of soft and stretchy Bengaline fabric, this dress will hug your curves while draping perfectly in it full circle skirt. With cross neck detail and razor back, this classy retro look is the perfect amount of Elegance for your next event. Wear with a cross front bra to still get support and hide your bra straps. Made with a metal zip closure for durability and an authentic vintage look.  Available in Red and Black for Oct ship dates XS-2X (XS waist 26inch, 2X 37inch)

Beauty Mark Pencil Dress: Made of soft and stretchy Bengaline fabric, this curve hugging Pencil dress featured one-sided hip tucks to create texture over the tummy to conceal that problem area. With cross neck detail and razor back, this classy retro look is the perfect amount of Elegance for your next event. Wear with a cross front bra to still get support and hide your bra straps. Made with a metal zip closure for durability and an authentic vintage look. Available in Red and Black for Oct ship dates XS-2X (XS waist 26inch, 2X 37inch)

Girl Next Door dress: Photo and details for this dress will be added the week of the 7th

Whats Shakin dress: Photo and details for this dress will be added the week of the 7th

More products will be added for pre-order shortly so stay tuned and follow our social media!

SEE MORE PRODUCTS AVAILABLE FOR PRE-ORDER ON OUR WEBSITE! WWW.REBELLOVECLOTHING.COM

Can't contribute financially but want to support the brand? it takes only 10 seconds to share this campaign on your facebook page, we promise we are worth it! 

You can also follow us on Facebook: www.Facebook.com/RebelLoveClothing 

And on Instagram! @RebelLoveClothing 

ALL PRE-ORDER PRODUCTS WILL HAVE A STANDARD 30 DAY RETURN/EXCHANGE/CREDIT POLICY FROM DATE OF DELIVERY. PLEASE DONT HESITATE TO ASK US ABOUT OUR FITS!

SHIPPING IS FREE WITHIN CANADA AND A FLAT RATE OF $20 FOR THE REST OF THE WORLD

story:
Our Campaign's Goals

We have been designing and handcrafting fine and functional products in non-swing machine studio since 2012 only by hand & heart. For our Indiegogo campaign we hand-picked 6 of 12 product's line that we have in our collection and we could possibly reduce the prices by controlling production costs accessible to everyone with the same premium quality.


Simply by avoiding "Pricing Filters" which caused marke-up pricing, we can serve our final costumer via our Indiegogo campaign directly. Your perks will be utilised for providing materials and costs of making without any markup. Ignoring "Pricing Filters" in the diagram above allows us to meet our 30 to 40% price reduction only in limited quantity in this campaign in compare with our online and retail prices. Our wooden packages, marketing & advertising costs, online fees, photography and huge percentage of middleman commissions and so on will be excluded in pricing method exclusively for our campaign. One of our costly crafting stage is dying and conditioning (curing the cowhide). Now, according to our campaign's goals we will be offering only Pure Natural Color Vegetable-Tanned cowhide. As result, we can handcraft same quality goods with no luxury and made-up price. 

But why is that? Just because of the context provided by Indiegogo that helps us serve you directly rather than online platforms that has been leading us not only to sell through their policy but also sell in complex and costly marketing plan defined in their selling framework for makers like us.


Watch Crafted coco® Story


Product's List

  1. Smart Wallet
  2. Clutch Wallet
  3. Clutch Wallet (with strap)
  4. Dopp Kit
  5. Key-Holder
  6. Key-Fob


Products Review

#1. Smart Wallet
Lot #49. CH15
Original Price: $90
Direct sell: $59 | Only 20 pieces
Stitch-less & one-piece versatile card holder/coin purse/Wallet
Check Product's Specification & more info

*Two years old Vegetable-Tanned aged beautifully with patina to it.



#2. Clutch Wallet

Lot #49. CW03

Original Price: $170

Direct sell: $129 | Only 20 pieces

Unexposed Stitching | Passport Wallet/Phone case/Travel Wallet

Check Product's Specification & more info


#3. Clutch Wallet with Strap

Lot #49. CW03

Original Price: $190

Direct sell: $139 | Only 10 pieces

Same Clutch Wallet with cross-body strap

Check Product's Specification & more info



#4. Dopp Kit

Lot #302. BB22

Original Price: $170

Direct sell: $119 | Only 20 pieces

Detachable Dopp Kit/Shaving Kit/Cosmetic Bag/Beach Pack/Toiletry Bag

Check Product's Specification & more info


#5. Key-Holder

Lot #11. KH14

Original Price: $80

Direct sell: $49 | Only 40 pieces

Draw String Key-Holder with Lock/Designed to hold 3 to 4 keys.

Check Product's Specification & more info


#6. Key-Fob

Lot #11. KF25

Original Price: $80

Direct sell: $49 | Only 20 pieces

Split O-ring for inserting your keys/Halter Snap (Solid Brass Hook) for hanging the key-fob on your jean's loop in order to put your keys on your pocket. No more jingle sound.

Check Product's Specification & more info




See How They Work





Lifetime Guarantee
We believe simplicity, functionality and durability give second hand value to a product. Most of our products has been sold to the U.S.A, The Netherlands, Germany, Spain, The U.K, Norway, Ireland and Singapore. We believe that accuracy and true proportion nowadays is one of the most important factors in terms of design process which is lost in the handcrafted goods’ market. We have lots of true craft experience and we value our costumers. These are the reason behind the No Expiration Lifetime Guarantee for every single purchase that will be made.

What Crafted coco’s lifetime guarantee means? 

​It simply means WHENEVER your purchase takes apart you will send it back to us and if it is repairable we will prepare it, if not you will receive a brand new item in same color! 

What the warranty does cover? 

​Components malfunction such as:

  • Opened Stitches.
  • Opened Fasteners and hardwares.
  • All Hardwares (snap fasteners, buckles, studs, rivets, joints, rings and etc.)
  • Non functionality of hardwares or malfunctioning of any components of our products.



THE STORY OF CRAFTED COCO®

Crafted coco is a leather goods brand founded in 2012. The name Coco is influenced by coconut's properties. From its durability, nature, color, even its taste. The strong feeling after drinking coconut milk and the time has taken for a coconut to get rich, all are metaphors of leather crafting process and making premium leather goods only by the hands of one craftsman. ​The founder and designer of crafted coco® leather goods was born in 14, February 1984. He has been involved with design and particularly with tendency of minimal product design since 2002. Graduated from Australian design collage. 


DESIGN PROCESS & CURING LEATHER
By using CAD and providing template we design our products by passion and sincerity. We believe that accuracy and true proportion now a days is one of the most important factors in terms of design process which is lost in the handcrafted goods’ market. Crafting process starts with hand- cutting, hand-dying, stitching and ends with our own organic and in-house formulated leather milk and conditioner and here our secret starts working the best. The water repellent and Leather sealant makes the leather supple and durable. Almost all of scratches will be gone by buffing. Our Leather conditioner made of 8 different extra virgin organic substances that formulated & patented by us and has been outsourced from 4 different countries to achieve premium quality and adorable look. This the most costly stage of crafting process for us. No mineral and petroleum based ingredient has been used in its formula. It means the more the leather works the more beautiful it becomes. There is no sewing machine in our workshop and every process has been done only by hand! Our products are limited edition according to the individual maker and designer and also production speed on the other hand which is quiet time-consuming.



TOOLS, MATERIALS & HARDWARES
​We are utilizing premium materials, from U.S. made cowhides, rivets, belt buckles to French traditional Threads and Sam Browne solid brass studs. Cowhides are vegetable-tanned and has been outsourced from Australia, The U.S.A, Poland, Vietnam & Thailand. We know without using professional tools we won’t end with quality products. ​Now we are going toward our making and hand crafting method by having our hands on the world’s best leather crafting tools from Vergez Blanchard from France to Japanese Kyoshin Elle. We also costume made our fasteners applied in our products from one of the world's reputed hardware maker from Japan, such as copper and solid brass.




Leather Types

What kind of leather we will be using for making our products?

Australian ​Top grain, grade A, 100% genuine vegetable-tanned cowhide in four different thicknesses. | 1.5 | 2.2 | 3.5 | 4.5 | Millimetre.



Project Timeline




Crafted coco's Team

Peter Tan
Crafted coco's Founder, Product Designer & Leather Maker

​Our inspiration coming from both  heart of classical look and nature of modern product design. We start to pitch an idea simply with pencils and paper. There is where we meet concept development and boosting the durability aspect of our products while we are designing. When our inspiration begins then our principals must be fulfilled. When I feel to remember the seamless and structural organs in the nature like a leaf that its structure hold it up and How layers of coconut  fits together to  support the core, our journey gets started and it is what you can feel in the DNA of crafted coco, a coconut with the charismatic smell of leather that is not made for monkeys.


SARUDA UMPHO
Marketing Director & Partner

"We believe simplicity, functionality and durability give second hand value to a product. Most of our products has been sold to the U.S.A, The Netherlands, Germany, Spain, The U.K, Norway, Ireland and Singapore. We believe that accuracy and true proportion nowadays is one of the most important factors in terms of design process which is lost in the handcrafted goods’ market. We have lots of true craft experience and we value our costumers. These are the reason behind the No Expiration Lifetime Guarantee for every single purchase that will be made. To me dealing with marketing and representing a true portrait of craftsmanship in an artistic frame in such level of quality goods was so easy, Like a piece of cake. Just because the design was so honest and simplicity of shapes, hues, ergonomic dimensions and true proportion of each product talked itself and conveys the succeeded costumer satisfaction. With this approach we are so thrilled and honoured to share all of these experiences."


Fondly, Crafted coco® Leather Goods would like to appreciate your trust buy backing our project and sharing the story of an unfailing leather goods with the world.

story_txt:
Our Campaign's Goals
We have been designing and handcrafting fine and functional products in non-swing machine studio since 2012 only by hand & heart. For our Indiegogo campaign we hand-picked 6 of 12 product's line that we have in our collection and we could possibly reduce the prices by controlling production costs accessible to everyone with the same premium quality.





Simply by avoiding "Pricing Filters" which caused marke-up pricing, we can serve our final costumer via our Indiegogo campaign directly. Your perks will be utilised for providing materials and costs of making without any markup. Ignoring "Pricing Filters" in the diagram above allows us to meet our 30 to 40% price reduction only in limited quantity in this campaign in compare with our online and retail prices. Our wooden packages, marketing & advertising costs, online fees, photography and huge percentage of middleman commissions and so on will be excluded in pricing method exclusively for our campaign. One of our costly crafting stage is dying and conditioning (curing the cowhide). Now, according to our campaign's goals we will be offering only Pure Natural Color Vegetable-Tanned cowhide. As result, we can handcraft same quality goods with no luxury and made-up price. 
But why is that? Just because of the context provided by Indiegogo that helps us serve you directly rather than online platforms that has been leading us not only to sell through their policy but also sell in complex and costly marketing plan defined in their selling framework for makers like us.


Watch Crafted coco® Story
Product's List


Smart Wallet

Clutch Wallet

Clutch Wallet (with strap)

Dopp Kit

Key-Holder

Key-Fob




Products Review

Split O-ring for inserting your keys/Halter Snap (Solid Brass Hook) for hanging the key-fob on your jean's loop in order to put your keys on your pocket. No more jingle sound.
Check Product's Specification & more info







See How They Work












Lifetime Guarantee

We believe simplicity, functionality and durability give second hand value to a product. Most of our products has been sold to the U.S.A, The Netherlands, Germany, Spain, The U.K, Norway, Ireland and Singapore. We believe that accuracy and true proportion nowadays is one of the most important factors in terms of design process which is lost in the handcrafted goods’ market. We have lots of true craft experience and we value our costumers. These are the reason behind the No Expiration Lifetime Guarantee for every single purchase that will be made.


What Crafted coco’s lifetime guarantee means? 
​It simply means WHENEVER your purchase takes apart you will send it back to us and if it is repairable we will prepare it, if not you will receive a brand new item in same color! 

What the warranty does cover? 
​Components malfunction such as:

Opened Stitches.
Opened Fasteners and hardwares.
All Hardwares (snap fasteners, buckles, studs, rivets, joints, rings and etc.)
Non functionality of hardwares or malfunctioning of any components of our products.








THE STORY OF CRAFTED COCO®
Crafted coco is a leather goods brand founded in 2012. The name Coco is influenced by coconut's properties. From its durability, nature, color, even its taste. The strong feeling after drinking coconut milk and the time has taken for a coconut to get rich, all are metaphors of leather crafting process and making premium leather goods only by the hands of one craftsman. ​The founder and designer of crafted coco® leather goods was born in 14, February 1984. He has been involved with design and particularly with tendency of minimal product design since 2002. Graduated from Australian design collage. 

DESIGN PROCESS & CURING LEATHERBy using CAD and providing template we design our products by passion and sincerity. We believe that accuracy and true proportion now a days is one of the most important factors in terms of design process which is lost in the handcrafted goods’ market. Crafting process starts with hand- cutting, hand-dying, stitching and ends with our own organic and in-house formulated leather milk and conditioner and here our secret starts working the best. The water repellent and Leather sealant makes the leather supple and durable. Almost all of scratches will be gone by buffing. Our Leather conditioner made of 8 different extra virgin organic substances that formulated & patented by us and has been outsourced from 4 different countries to achieve premium quality and adorable look. This the most costly stage of crafting process for us. No mineral and petroleum based ingredient has been used in its formula. It means the more the leather works the more beautiful it becomes. There is no sewing machine in our workshop and every process has been done only by hand! Our products are limited edition according to the individual maker and designer and also production speed on the other hand which is quiet time-consuming.






TOOLS, MATERIALS & HARDWARES​We are utilizing premium materials, from U.S. made cowhides, rivets, belt buckles to French traditional Threads and Sam Browne solid brass studs. Cowhides are vegetable-tanned and has been outsourced from Australia, The U.S.A, Poland, Vietnam & Thailand. We know without using professional tools we won’t end with quality products. ​Now we are going toward our making and hand crafting method by having our hands on the world’s best leather crafting tools from Vergez Blanchard from France to Japanese Kyoshin Elle. We also costume made our fasteners applied in our products from one of the world's reputed hardware maker from Japan, such as copper and solid brass.






Leather Types
What kind of leather we will be using for making our products?
Australian ​Top grain, grade A, 100% genuine vegetable-tanned cowhide in four different thicknesses. | 1.5 | 2.2 | 3.5 | 4.5 | Millimetre.

Project Timeline








Crafted coco's Team



Peter TanCrafted coco's Founder, Product Designer & Leather Maker
​Our inspiration coming from both  heart of classical look and nature of modern product design. We start to pitch an idea simply with pencils and paper. There is where we meet concept development and boosting the durability aspect of our products while we are designing. When our inspiration begins then our principals must be fulfilled. When I feel to remember the seamless and structural organs in the nature like a leaf that its structure hold it up and How layers of coconut  fits together to  support the core, our journey gets started and it is what you can feel in the DNA of crafted coco, a coconut with the charismatic smell of leather that is not made for monkeys.



SARUDA UMPHOMarketing Director & Partner


"We believe simplicity, functionality and durability give second hand value to a product. Most of our products has been sold to the U.S.A, The Netherlands, Germany, Spain, The U.K, Norway, Ireland and Singapore. We believe that accuracy and true proportion nowadays is one of the most important factors in terms of design process which is lost in the handcrafted goods’ market. We have lots of true craft experience and we value our costumers. These are the reason behind the No Expiration Lifetime Guarantee for every single purchase that will be made. To me dealing with marketing and representing a true portrait of craftsmanship in an artistic frame in such level of quality goods was so easy, Like a piece of cake. Just because the design was so honest and simplicity of shapes, hues, ergonomic dimensions and true proportion of each product talked itself and conveys the succeeded costumer satisfaction. With this approach we are so thrilled and honoured to share all of these experiences."



Fondly, Crafted coco® Leather Goods would like to appreciate your trust buy backing our project and sharing the story of an unfailing leather goods with the world.

story:
Who are we?

We are a group of college students from the Czech Republic. One day, we were wondering "what to do with our spare time?" That's when the idea came. And here we are now, trying to achieve our goal. Starting new brand and setting a new trend.

We are proud to introduce our first product - Woodley watch. Handmade out of bamboo wood with a leather band and the heart of the watch - Japan movement Miyota which provides an accurate display of time. The design is unisex - it is both for ladies and gentlemen.

What is best about the natural material - wood? Every piece is a little bit different, thanks to the structure of the wood; every piece is unique, original, just as a person that wears it on the wrist.

But what is even better? Wood is very easy to customize. Do you want a personalized gift for your husband or wife, boyfriend or girlfriend, brother or sister? That's no problem; we can help you make a watch with your desired inscription.


Watch Face Design

The design of the watch is minimalistic, but we want to meet the requirements of all potential customers; therefore, you can choose out of 3 different watch face designs. The default watch face is without any marking, but you can also get a watch with hour marks or minute marks, it is just up to you!

What's next?

We don't plan to start and finish just by making this watch. We want to continue making and inventing different products and accessories made out of natural materials. But first, we need to make this one a reality.

What We Need

The prototype is done, below is a list of what we need your help for:

  • Design and fabrication of product packaging and promotional items
  • Registration of trademark
  • Making professional product shots in the studio
  • Finalization of web presentation (www.woodley.cz) and translating it into more languages
  • Stock first supplies - Production and Logistics
  • Social marketing and advertising campaign
  • Multilingual customer support

 

     

    What You Get

    For helping us to make our project a reality, you can get:

    • Writing accessories – Woodley - bamboo pen
    • Woodley T-shirt
    • Coupons for discounts after official product launch
    • EARLY BIRD - one of the first pieces of Woodley watch for lower price
    • Woodley watch 
    • Personalized custom Woodley watch with inscription

    You will receive all these rewards from the first batch of stock supplies.

    http://www.woodley.cz
    Website

    http://facebook.com/woodleycz
    Facebook

    http://instagram.com/woodleywatch
    Instagram

    Thank you very much for your interest. If you have any questions feel free to ask.

    Sincerely, David from Woodley

story:
My name is Jahise LeBouef, a 21 year old designer from Washington, DC. I recently graduated from New York University studying costume design in the drama department. To some, deciding to make the switch from pursuing costume design for theatre/film to fashion design may not seem like too big of a decision, however there are many differences. Therefore, in a lot of ways, I am starting a new. Teaching myself fashion techniques, and making new connections that I didn't pick up during my studies because they were centered around another form of design. 

This collection represents that decision for me. It will be the first time I step out and introduce myself as a fashion designer, not a costume designer. The first time I see a whole collection that will be released for purchase lifted off the page of my sketchbook. This is a big deal for me because I have seen very few people wearing my work.

Which brings me to, this campaign! You all will help me achieve that goal of launching pretty much my career, getting people to wear my designs, stamping that I am a fashion designer because things will not stop after this collection drops, it is just a jump start for the 'LeBouef' brand as a whole. Designing a line comes with a lot of production costs. Materials, manufacturing fees, and finishes, are half the battle to produce the samples I need to put together the other half; a showcase of the line when it is completed. From there I will build on a made to order process.

I have a lot of different sides to me, and all of the 'LeBouef' collections will represent that. I decided to have STAMP (a streetwear collection) be my first because it is closer to home. It is inspired by the streets of DC I grew up in, with my own twist. I am in a way paying homage; saying thank you for grooming me into the artist I am. Hence the DC slang word being the title. While I am located in New York currently, I plan on having my first showcase, in my hometown District.

I am asking for $5000. To get the best materials, the best people to make it to guarantee that it is made with great care & quality, and finished with the utmost detail (embroidery, closures, etc.),to purchase clothing labels, and packaging, to put together a website for easy ordering, to lock in a venue for the showcase, and a team to make the event happen.

Also in the name of branding myself, if a certain amount is donated, I will give to the donater a neoprene, embroidered handmade by me, 'LeBouef' Tee as a thank you.

Every little bit counts, and if I do not make my whole goal, what was donated will still go toward STAMP, and costs will be cut and/or made up somewhere and somehow, but your help is greatly needed.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not all can help in the monetary sense, but please know sharing and getting the word out is a huge help as well.

I cannot wait to share with the world all that 'LeBouef' has to offer, and I hope you enjoy STAMP.

Thank you greatly,

Jahise LeBouef

story:
Akash Majumder, 21, a final year Civil Engineering student from South Calcutta Polytechnic who also holds Diploma in both Fine Arts and Fashion Designing from Birla Academy of Art and Culture and VTI respectively is the founder of AKPEACE.com - an e-commerce shopping site exclusively for startups! 

Akash, an avid Design and Start-Up enthusiast, founded this company with the money he earned from freelancing on Multiple Design projects. According to Akash, AKPEACE.com is not only a multi-retail Marketplace. Instead, it is a first of its kind multi-startup marketplace featuring the most original and trendsetting products from the latest startups at the most affordable rates.

Team of AKPEACE

Subhodeep Chakraborty 

Head of Public Relations and Promotions, AKPEACE.com

Shubhankar Bhattacharjee​

Head of Sales, AKPEACE.com

Harsh Pratik

Head of Technologies, AKPEACE.com

 

How You Can Help Akash

The Website of AKPEACE.com is already up and running. However, after investing almost all his savings in setting up the company, Akash is in urgent need of a substantive fund for spending in various Promotional and Advertisement activities across several Social Media channels.

If you Contribute Whatever You Can to this campaign, Akash would be able to reach out to more and more amazing people like you and deliver the most awesome products possible.

How the funds will be utilized?

Facebook and Instagram Marketing - $450

Blog Features - $200

Whatsapp/Sms Marketing - $125

Ad Sense and Website Ad Features - $225

Print Issue Publlication Cost - $100

Look Book Publication Cost - $85

story:
The thing that we appreciate most about fashion and art is that imagination is endless. Rêve de jour invites you to join in our proposition to provide a space where talented artists and fashion designers can build, advance, and host their collections under one platform. Along with housing multiple up and coming designers and artists under one roof, Rêve de jour will also be an ecommerce store and a virtual learning experience for creatives.

One of the main concepts is brand development as well as portfolio expansion for various artistic disciplines including fashion design, photography, fashion styling, makeup artistry, and modeling. Selected collections will have access to Rêve de jour’s in-house photography studio as well as a team of professionals to provide and assist with editorials, ad campaigns, and media content. In addition, Rêve de jour will also establish a nationwide registry for the aforementioned fields but also including influencers, web designers, illustrators, and graphic designers so that inquiring brands can easily connect with creatives in their local region or market.

      Although all demographic groups are encouraged to submit their collections, we would like to be a catalyst in amplifying the production and access to African American art and fashion. This also extends to all other African diasporic ethnic groups. Your donations and contributions will undoubtedly support the visions of hundreds of young creatives through this campaign.

 

How it benefits artists + designers:

  • Creative vendors set their own retail prices and choose how many pieces they would like to be featured. They will only pay for their selected packages, which will come with features such as curated editorials and social media content for their brand.
  • The retail store will feature a photography studio and professional equipment where students and creators can have a space to fuel their projects.
  • They will have access to a team of professionals to produce quality editorial photoshoots, videos, and media content to take their brands to further horizons. Designers will have the option to have editorials and ad campaigns curated and executed by a team of stylists, photographers, and creative directors.
  • Rêve de jour will also have internships for creative fields in areas such as fashion styling, photography, makeup, and hair to boost portfolio building.

Customer perks:

  • Patrons will have the unique shopping experience of an in store + online platform to purchase art and fashion from emerging designers.
  • Rêve de jour will provide an inside look at projects via a Youtube channel. We will also feature a virtual learning experience for students and all others who are interested in creative fields.
  • Work with us! Employees will gain hands on experience throughout all aspects of Rêve de jour. These include retail, photography, merchandising,and much more. Our purpose is to help you grow!
  • Rêve de jour will also implement a location and portfolio based registry for photographers, models, stylists, hair artists, makeup artists, and influencers so that brands can easily search, select, and hire for assignments. There will also be a separate registry dedicated to graphic designers, illustrators, art direction, branding, and advertising.
  • Patrons don't have to be designers to access our photography studio. All creatives are welcome to come build their portfolio or gain hands-on experience.
 

We definitely understand if you're unable to donate, however, we hope you will still show support by sharing the campaign!

story:
Idea behind wtchout.com

The idea of the wrist cover was born in a Finnish forest. I started a new hobby, trail running, in summer 2017. I fell in love with it instantly and bought a lot of new equipment. One of my new purchases was a sports watch that measures the heart rate on my wrist. It also helps me to navigate and prevents me from getting lost in the forest. Summer was followed by cooler weather – my watch did not feel comfortable anymore. My wrist got cold, because I had to wear the watch between my coat sleeve and glove. I instantly started to plan a solution to the problem. Because of my background as a craft teacher, it was easy for me to sew some prototypes of wrist covers. After one year of testing (with family and friends), sewing more prototypes and further testing, I completed the final product – the wtchout.com wrist cover was born. The idea behind wtchout.com is new, and the design has therefore been protected by applying for an international PCT patent.

Goals

Wtchout.com wrist cover is designed to keep you warm and comfortable. It is a simple solution to prevent cold chills. It adds value to your sports watch, because you can utilize it better in all conditions. The aim of the Indiegogo campaign is to make wtchout.com products available to all sports watch users: whether you are a runner, skier, cyclist, hiker or walker, you will enjoy this product. With this campaign, we are hoping to make a dream come true; by buying our products, you are making it possible for my company to order fabrics and start manufacturing and shipping wtchout.com products all over the world. I am excited to share my innovation with you; it is important to feel good and enjoy sports even more. Please join our campaign and let good chills spread! Share the wtchout.com campaign with your network by using the Indiegogo share tools. We are extremely grateful for your support!

 

Products, materials

The wtchout.com wrist cover has several appealing qualities:

Compatible – it matches whatever you are wearing.

Affordable – reasonable price.

Ecological – sustainable material Seaqual™.

Unique – new innovation, new design.

Comfortable – feels good and warm.

Functional – Maximizes the use of your sports watch, keeps you warm, includes a pocket for small items.

The wtchout.com wrist cover comes in three different sizes (small, medium and large, see the sizing instructions above). The material is super elastic and ecological Seaqual™ polyester fiber, made of recycled ocean plastics.

 

Seaqual™: 85% PET recycled, 15% EA  (www.seaqual.com)

Eco-friendly

360° stretch

Antibacterial

 

Colours: Black, red

Sizing (unisex), how to choose your size?

Wrap a measuring tape around your wrist or use a strip of paper that you can then measure with a regular ruler.

 

Buy products and share the campaign 

 

We are grateful for your orders and your help with the campaign. Your supports makes it possible to start producing wtchout.com products!

If you do not want to buy the product, but want to support the campaign, please leave your contact information. All those supporting the wtchout.com campaign with less than15 EUR/16 USD will receive a mention/advertisement in our social media. Donations of more than 15 EUR/16 USD will receive a thank your letter from us, posted internationally.

 

In cooperation with:

Garmin Finland, www.garmin.com      

          

 www.craftsportswear.com
story_txt:
Idea behind wtchout.com
The idea of the wrist cover was born in a Finnish forest. I started a new hobby, trail running, in summer 2017. I fell in love with it instantly and bought a lot of new equipment. One of my new purchases was a sports watch that measures the heart rate on my wrist. It also helps me to navigate and prevents me from getting lost in the forest. Summer was followed by cooler weather – my watch did not feel comfortable anymore. My wrist got cold, because I had to wear the watch between my coat sleeve and glove. I instantly started to plan a solution to the problem. Because of my background as a craft teacher, it was easy for me to sew some prototypes of wrist covers. After one year of testing (with family and friends), sewing more prototypes and further testing, I completed the final product – the wtchout.com wrist cover was born. The idea behind wtchout.com is new, and the design has therefore been protected by applying for an international PCT patent.

Goals
Wtchout.com wrist cover is designed to keep you warm and comfortable. It is a simple solution to prevent cold chills. It adds value to your sports watch, because you can utilize it better in all conditions. The aim of the Indiegogo campaign is to make wtchout.com products available to all sports watch users: whether you are a runner, skier, cyclist, hiker or walker, you will enjoy this product. With this campaign, we are hoping to make a dream come true; by buying our products, you are making it possible for my company to order fabrics and start manufacturing and shipping wtchout.com products all over the world. I am excited to share my innovation with you; it is important to feel good and enjoy sports even more. Please join our campaign and let good chills spread! Share the wtchout.com campaign with your network by using the Indiegogo share tools. We are extremely grateful for your support!

 
Products, materials
The wtchout.com wrist cover has several appealing qualities:
Compatible – it matches whatever you are wearing.
Affordable – reasonable price.
Ecological – sustainable material Seaqual™.
Unique – new innovation, new design.
Comfortable – feels good and warm.
Functional – Maximizes the use of your sports watch, keeps you warm, includes a pocket for small items.

The wtchout.com wrist cover comes in three different sizes (small, medium and large, see the sizing instructions above). The material is super elastic and ecological Seaqual™ polyester fiber, made of recycled ocean plastics.
 
Seaqual™: 85% PET recycled, 15% EA  (www.seaqual.com)
Eco-friendly
360° stretch
Antibacterial

 

Colours: Black, red

Sizing (unisex), how to choose your size?

Wrap a measuring tape around your wrist or use a strip of paper that you can then measure with a regular ruler.

 
Buy products and share the campaign 
 
We are grateful for your orders and your help with the campaign. Your supports makes it possible to start producing wtchout.com products!
If you do not want to buy the product, but want to support the campaign, please leave your contact information. All those supporting the wtchout.com campaign with less than15 EUR/16 USD will receive a mention/advertisement in our social media. Donations of more than 15 EUR/16 USD will receive a thank your letter from us, posted internationally. 
 
In cooperation with:

Garmin Finland, www.garmin.com      
          

 www.craftsportswear.com

story:
We are a professional company that has developed innovative filtering masks and applied creative and ergonomic designs to protect ourselves from fine dust, fumes for the past 4 years.

i3D&D has been developing filtration masks since 2018 to keep their health from air pollution such as fine dust and smoke. We can get disposable masks easily, which have excellent performance; however, they trigger negative effects regarding easily disposable, uneconomical and causing environmental pollution.

We have made the Fashionable FACE Mask improved the uneconomical and uncomfortable functions which help to commute, exercise, travel and use everyday free from air pollution.

Our ears and face are uncomfortable wearing the disposable mask for long hours.  To solve this problem, we developed a new type of mask.

The skin wounds are caused by friction of immediate contact with the masks and the face skin.

Many people have such weak skins, and it causes skin troubles. While wearing the mask on the ears the pain was very severe in the facial part that was worn for a long time, and the pain that led to the secondary pain caused our mind also very much suffering.

i-ous KB-M1 FACE MASK is developed with a design that suits individual fashion. In addition, you can use it as a filter necessary for intense exercise, commute and secret prevention. The filtration function is exclusive to protect me from environmental pollution. It was developed to be interchangeably used.

We are focusing on developing the design to further improve the function of the filter mask. We developed various types of filters, rather than using a single filter, and the function to freely replace the filter according to the application.

Also, the silicone frame was designed not to make a face mark as well as no makeup marks even when worn for a long time with a special coating method applied on silicone frame. Women who need to wear makeup can also use it casually

Other uncomfortable points can be skin problems and cosmetic marks on the masks while wearing a mask in everyday life.

In addition to solving this problem, we developed a mask design which fit with individual fashion style and created a smart mask in the new era.

i-ous KB-M1 FACE MASK is designed with a simple structure, so anyone can easily attach and detach the filter. The mask case is designed that people can wash in the water and can use hygienically to provide convenience.

 

 

 

We have been working hard to develop our current product for two years. Although it is difficult to purchase masks worldwide due to COVID-19, after seeing that many people are uncomfortable and having a hard time due to poor quality products, we are strengthening our team, holding many meetings, and working together on this product development.

Our team challenges with ideas developing numerous products to collect crowdfunding.
We are checking all risk factors related to project planning, production and transportation and we are doing our best to ensure quick delivery after the campaign is over.
Starting with the INDIEGOGO campaign, we are preparing a distribution channel allowing customers to purchase products and various filters. Hence, we are preparing stock in advance for sponsors who want to purchase additional filters and products.
