story:
Press kit available here

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The most advanced sleep tracker on the market!

 

Neuroon Open is an advanced sleep tracker that uses build-in sensors to measure your sleep.  

What parameters does Neuroon Open measure?  

- brainwaves (1-channel EEG- Fp1-Fp2)  

- heart rate (pulse oximeter)  

- oxygen saturation (pulse oximeter)  

- changes in the skin temperature (thermometer)  

- movement (accelerometer)  

All this information is processed by our core sleep-staging algorithm and then used to build your personal sleep staging, which is shown in Neuroon App. In the morning you can read EXACTLY when you fell asleep, when you had the fastest heart rate and when the slowest. 

Thanks to this data, Neuroon Open algorithms can show you a detailed architecture of your sleep, calculate your sleep efficiency and what is the most important for you, advise how to improve your sleep habits by suggesting tools (such as meditation) to get a better night’s sleep.

Every single feature in Neuroon Open works due to the mask’s ability to measure sleep metrics in such a detailed manner. And most importantly for most of the features: sleep analysis takes place in REAL TIME!

Would you like to know more about this feature? Click here to get more information.

Learn how you sleep and boost your energy for the day  

When we read about sleep and best practices to have a good night’s sleep, it often looks as though there is an universal solution for everybody. But is that really the case? Should all people wake up in the lightest phase of sleep and go to bed around 11pm?  

We want to give you a tool to check your sleep performance, then find your best sleep pattern based on both short and long-term feedback.

So how will this tool work?  

A/B testing consists of two parts. First it helps you measure your subjective evaluation of sleep quality after various sleep patterns. Second it will objectively check the condition of your brain.  

1. After each sleep you will be given a short test in which you estimate your sleep quality and sleepiness after waking on VAS. This self-evaluation system records changes in the subjective reception of your sleep. This is then combined with metabolic and sleep-staging data in order to provide information about the best sleep pattern to suit you.  

2. As a voluntary extra option, you will have the possibility to try two short games which measure your mental capabilities after sleep. The working memory test will check your perception and working memory condition upon waking. The cognition test will check your cognitive capability. During the first ten days, Neuroon Open will gather data from the tests to personalize its analytic software. After this period, you will be informed about your daily results compared to the average, allowing you to choose the best sleep pattern for your top mental condition.  

These two methods help you to optimize Neuroon Open’s sleep-adjustment tools according to your needs. These tools include artificial dawn, bedroom conditions, specific sleep stage awakenings and optimal time-schedules for falling asleep and waking up.  

In short: they will help you sleep like a child.

Would you like to know more about this feature? Click here to get more information. 

Your entrance to the world of lucid dreaming

The brain has the innate ability to act as a virtual reality generator, generating complex visual scenes, scenarios and imaginary characters, in the form of dreams. Lucid dreaming is a metacognitive state within a dream, which may enable the dreamer to know that they are dreaming or even give them full intellectual ability and volitional control over the dream.

Sounds familiar? According to a meta-analysis of lucid dream prevalence and frequency studies, no less than half of you reading this may have experienced at least one lucid dream in your life! The authors of the meta-analysis have proposed that “the capacity for lucid dreaming is widespread”!

Lucid dreaming is thought to be a trainable skill that has been demonstrated to increase through the use of cognitive and external stimulation techniques. Both techniques are features of Neuroon Open!

Neuroon Open will use a combination of methods, including guided audio sessions (similar to guided audio mindfulness sessions that e.g. HeadSpace app uses) and external stimuli (light/sound/vibration) to help induce lucid dreams more reliably and easily. 

Cognitive techniques are audio sessions that you use before falling asleep- there are similar to guided audio mindfulness sessions that e.g. HeadSpace app uses (headspace.com).  

External stimulation consists of light and vibration stimulation provided you while you are asleep, in REM sleep. You can find a simplified scheme of this stimulation (based on F. Paul, M. Schädlich, D. Erlacher, Journal of Dream Research Volume 7, No. 1, 2014).

Would you like to know more about the science behind Lucid Dreaming feature? Find more information here.

Prepare your body and mind for the night

Nowadays there is no space to stop doing things and focus on calming your mind and body, and yet the benefits of meditation are priceless. With Neuroon Open we provide guided mindfulness meditation sessions. For those who are unfamiliar with the term: mindfulness meditation is a basic form of meditation in which one concentrates on his or her inner self. 

 It begins with breath awareness and builds from there. Whenever you find your mind full of thoughts, you return your awareness back to breathing. Because it provides an opportunity to explore one’s mind without judgement or resentment, it is widely used as an integral part in cognitive therapies (Mindfulness-Based Cognitive Therapy or MBCT for short). 

With Neuroon Open you can start meditating whenever you feel you need it: at home, at the office or outdoors. The benefits from meditation are visible even after 2 hours of practice. 

Neuroon Open meditation feature consists of the three components:  

1. Guided audio meditation sessions. Mindfulness meditation audio sessions will interact with your personal physiology based on brain wave readings and pulse oximetry. For example, when you are calm, you will be guided in a different way than when you are tense and nervous. Guidance will be adjusted to these parameters and will change in the middle of the session if your mood dramatically changes. Neuroon Open is the first device that guides your meditation session based on EEG and pulse oximetry in real time.  

2. Recording option. Neuroon Open will record your EEG readings, movement and pulse, along with any variations in heart rate during each meditation session. You can compare different sessions and see your progress and the influence of external factors on your mood. It’s not only the mind that alters the way your body functions; your body changes your way of thinking, too.  

3. Biofeedback. The Neuroon App gives you the chance to choose which form of feedback you’d prefer and what you’d like from the mask, for example, vibration when dominant brainwaves are alpha or light stimuli while your pulse is raised and unstable. You can customize your biofeedback depending on your needs. It’s all up to you.

Would you like to know more about the science behind Meditation feature? Click here to find out more. 

Design your perfect wakeup and get energy for the whole day  

You might have noticed that it is much easier to wake up when it’s already after sunrise and sunny outside. When you wake up in very dark room you have many difficulties avoiding sleep inertia and getting out of bed on time.  

Neuroon Open simulates the light of a slowly-breaking dawn so that you wake up the natural way. The sleep tracker eliminates morning grogginess by waking you at the optimal moment.  

When it’s time to wake up, the mask will gradually fill with light that simulates a natural dawn. If you don’t wake up, Neuroon will add gentle vibrations followed by a final audio alarm from your mobile phone.  

Neuroon Open allows you to choose out of which phase of sleep you’d like to wake up. For some people the optimal phase to be woken out of is light sleep. For some it’s REM. Using the Neuroon Open app, you will be able to choose. Additionally, while analyzing the EEGs of sleeping people during the product development stage, we discovered that before waking up there is a great deal of what is called “micro wakeups”. We added an option under the “automatic” button an option to be woken up from these micro wakeups.  

You can choose:  

1. If you want to be woken up by light or not  

2. If you want to be woken up using vibration or a ringtone, both or neither  

3. If you want to use smart wakeups, meaning you can pick a time when the mask should start to gently wake you up before the final alarm (as well as the sleep phase you would like to start waking up in).  

 Control your home while you sleep  

Have you ever wished your bedroom lighting would automatically turn up when you get out of bed in the middle of the night? Maybe you’d like other adjustments made on your behalf.  

Of course Neuroon won’t clean your apartment for you but it can definitely make your sleep routine easier and help you sleep better.  

So how does it work?  

As has already been noted, Neuroon Open is doing sleep data analysis in real time. All of the recorded signals are forwarded to different algorithms, which can then detect various events. After that those events can be further fed into your home network.  

To begin we plan to integrate Neuroon Open with IFTTT. This is a free web-based service that can be used to create chains of simple conditional statements, called “applets”. Each applet consists of a trigger and an action. We would like to program a few triggers for the mask that can then be integrated with other smart home devices compatible with IFTTT.

 

Triggers that will be implemented for this campaign include:  

1. The moment of falling asleep  

2. REM and NREM detection  

3. Exact wake-up moment, or the moment the mask is removed  

With such triggers it will be possible to:  

- Connect Neuroon Open with your smart hi-fi set and so that the volume is reduced when you fall asleep  

- Connect Neuroon Open with smart lightning in the home, making it shine gradually every time you wake during the night and take off the mask to go to the bathroom  

- Connect Neuroon Open with your Nest and lower the temperature in your room when you enter the REM phase of sleep  

Of course there are a great deal more possibilities for smart home integrations. 

It all depends which IoT devices you use at home. It also depends on the number of triggers we program – but given Neuroon Open is open source, why not to program some useful solutions yourself?

We want you to get the most from our work. That’s why we have decided to make out device open-source and share our algorithms. This is what makes Neuroon Open unique.

 

Our product is now transparent, available to the experts who can audit the code and provide constructive feedback as to what we can make better.  

It is verifiable. Researchers using Neuroon for their experiments can see where the results come from and can track the resulting data to electric circuits in the mask.  

It is accessible to DIY and Quantified Self-enthusiasts as it provides SDK and raw data access.  

Its functions may be extended or enhanced with custom apps and tools. With open APIs and data formats, it’s ready for integration with existing and upcoming technologies.  

In an unlikely worst case scenario, if we as a company decided to withdraw our product it could easily be resurrected by a collective of enthusiastic individuals.  

We hope that together we can create a new open standard for exploring and enhancing our minds.  

On the start day of the Kickstarter campaign we will release all of our work-in-progress:  

- Electronic design files  

 - Sources for Neuroon’s firmware  

 - Sleep-staging algorithms  

We encourage everybody to use the materials for both personal and commercial work, so long as the results remain open source.

 

 


Would you like to read more about our sleep staging algorithm? Click here to find out more.

 

For our product to be truly successful is to provide a new standard, an open platform for working with your sleep, dreams and meditating mind.

It can only happen with mass adoption and thriving and healthy community around Neuroon Open. The most important part of which, next to the early adopting customers, is the community of developers, makers, FLOSS hackers, diy coders, researchers, etc. Shortly, the people creating new layers of tools and research upon our part of the work.  

Clean and well-documented open-source Software Development Kit  

In order to make it comfortable and rewarding we intend to provide the ever-growing set of clean and extensive documentation and real-life examples of usage of our SDK and other tools.  

Imagine creating your own tools, algorithms and research with scripts as simple as the following conceptual Python snippet:  

Hackathons  

As our code and user base matures, we plan to organize several hackathons around the world to ignite some interesting community projects. The first one is already on the horizon and will take hopefully take place in August this year in Warsaw at Copernicus Science Center!

Here on the campaign we would like to share with you a part of our hardware documentation! We explain there how Neuroon Open measures your forehead temperature, what is the meaning of this temperature and a little bit more technical/ geek details for hackers- measurement method description with the whole analog layout, pin connections and more. 

Please mind that this is just the beginning. We are working really hard to make the whole documentation fully nonconfidential during the campaign!

You can find the documentation here

Neuroon Open App is so called remote controller of Neuroon Open.

If you don’t want to write your own software on Neuroon Open this app will be your very best friend when using Neuroon Open. It will guide you through all the Neuroon Open features, gather your sleep data, show you your sleep score and personalized sleep tips.  

Neuroon Open app is needed to manage your device and trigger different features of the mask. It also controls the mask, analyzes the data coming from the device and present it to you.  

The app works with Iphones and Android phones.  

You can find all* screens of the new app under this link. 

*Please be noted that Meditation and Lucid Dreaming features will be developed after the Kickstarter campaign finish.  

 

 

Get an awesome set: Neuroon Open + headphones!

 

Neuroon: noise cancelling headphones are a great addition to your Neuroon Open. These headphones will support you while meditating, having audio sessions for lucid dreaming induction and finally to get some peace and quiet when needed, eg. on a plane.

You can connect your phone to Neuroon headphones via Bluetooth or 3.5mm audio cable (mini jack).

These headphones are also equipped with microphone so you can answer your calls and with other button easily switch between the songs. 

You can charge them using micro USB cable. You can use them for up to 12 hours of calls or playing music.

 

 

 

 

 

Product certifications essentially ensure that a product has passed various performance tests and quality assurance checks before it hits the mass market. Neuroon Open has already received all required certifications, which means it is safe and can be market and manufacture. 

 

 Would you like to take a look at the certificates that Neuroon Open obtains? Click here and scroll down for the links. 

Our first Kickstarter campaign took place in December 2013 and lasted one month. During this time 1,944 backers pledged $438,573 to help us bring Neuroon to life. We have reached the goal of the campaign: $ 100 000 within 1 day! Here are the statistics of that campaign: Infographic here During the last 3 years we received a lot of valuable feedback and positive comments from our users.

 

 

We are very thankful to all the backers who supported us at that time. We couldn’t be here today without them, without their belief and patience :) 

Our team has learned a lot through these 3 years. We are aware that we have delivered the product to our backers with a delay so now we have planned everything much better in terms of production and logistics and the whole process with run very smoothly. 

This time we won’t spend much time on development because Neuroon Open is pretty much done. It just requires some final polishing and the factory that is based in Poland will start its work in 100%. The most important thing that we learned through the last 4 years was to listen to all the comments and feedback that we have received - the community gave us always lots of energy, great ideas and topics to think about.

 

The formal name of our company is Inteliclinic. We are based in San Francisco, California, and Warsaw, Poland. 

In February 2016 we became a member of Sky Deck accelerator organized by one of the most respected universities in the world - the University of California Berkeley in US and member of Pfizer Consumer Healthcare & Galvanize network.  

We are also prizewinners of many prestigious, global competitions for the most innovative new companies eg. first place at the LeWeb contest in Paris in 2013 and first place at the ReleaseIt at SXSW in Austin, TX, the USA in 2016. 



Also the company has been selected as the best sleep startup in 2015 by HealthXL with cooperation with Cleveland Clinic. Inteliclinic was also awarded the Best Health Startup from the Plug and Play accelerator program by Johnson & Johnson and received a $25K award.

 

  

In 2016 Neuroon was featured in the Lufthansa FlyingLab that allowed passengers to test out innovative products in accordance to their ‘Sleep Better’ theme.

In 2017 we received prestigious grant: $1.7mln from the European Commission as part of the Horizon 2020 program for implementing a medical version of Neuroon Open for sleep apnea detection and sleep screening tests.

 

Would you like to always get the first-hand news from us? Follow our social media channels!

@Facebook

@Twitter

@Instagram

Guidance will be adjusted to these parameters and will change in the middle of the session if your mood dramatically changes. Neuroon Open is the first device that guides your meditation session based on EEG and pulse oximetry in real time.  
2. Recording option. Neuroon Open will record your EEG readings, movement and pulse, along with any variations in heart rate during each meditation session. You can compare different sessions and see your progress and the influence of external factors on your mood. It’s not only the mind that alters the way your body functions; your body changes your way of thinking, too.  
3. Biofeedback. The Neuroon App gives you the chance to choose which form of feedback you’d prefer and what you’d like from the mask, for example, vibration when dominant brainwaves are alpha or light stimuli while your pulse is raised and unstable. You can customize your biofeedback depending on your needs. It’s all up to you.
Would you like to know more about the science behind Meditation feature? Click here to find out more. 
 

Design your perfect wakeup and get energy for the whole day  
You might have noticed that it is much easier to wake up when it’s already after sunrise and sunny outside. When you wake up in very dark room you have many difficulties avoiding sleep inertia and getting out of bed on time.  
Neuroon Open simulates the light of a slowly-breaking dawn so that you wake up the natural way. The sleep tracker eliminates morning grogginess by waking you at the optimal moment.  
When it’s time to wake up, the mask will gradually fill with light that simulates a natural dawn. If you don’t wake up, Neuroon will add gentle vibrations followed by a final audio alarm from your mobile phone.  
 
Neuroon Open allows you to choose out of which phase of sleep you’d like to wake up. For some people the optimal phase to be woken out of is light sleep. For some it’s REM. Using the Neuroon Open app, you will be able to choose. Additionally, while analyzing the EEGs of sleeping people during the product development stage, we discovered that before waking up there is a great deal of what is called “micro wakeups”. We added an option under the “automatic” button an option to be woken up from these micro wakeups.  
You can choose:  
1. If you want to be woken up by light or not  
2. If you want to be woken up using vibration or a ringtone, both or neither  
3. If you want to use smart wakeups, meaning you can pick a time when the mask should start to gently wake you up before the final alarm (as well as the sleep phase you would like to start waking up in).  
 

 Control your home while you sleep  
Have you ever wished your bedroom lighting would automatically turn up when you get out of bed in the middle of the night? Maybe you’d like other adjustments made on your behalf.  
Of course Neuroon won’t clean your apartment for you but it can definitely make your sleep routine easier and help you sleep better.  
So how does it work?  
As has already been noted, Neuroon Open is doing sleep data analysis in real time. All of the recorded signals are forwarded to different algorithms, which can then detect various events. After that those events can be further fed into your home network.  
To begin we plan to integrate Neuroon Open with IFTTT. This is a free web-based service that can be used to create chains of simple conditional statements, called “applets”. Each applet consists of a trigger and an action. We would like to program a few triggers for the mask that can then be integrated with other smart home devices compatible with IFTTT.
Adjust your bedroom to your sleep
 
Triggers that will be implemented for this campaign include:  
1. The moment of falling asleep  
2. REM and NREM detection  
3. Exact wake-up moment, or the moment the mask is removed  
With such triggers it will be possible to:  
- Connect Neuroon Open with your smart hi-fi set and so that the volume is reduced when you fall asleep  
- Connect Neuroon Open with smart lightning in the home, making it shine gradually every time you wake during the night and take off the mask to go to the bathroom  
- Connect Neuroon Open with your Nest and lower the temperature in your room when you enter the REM phase of sleep  
Of course there are a great deal more possibilities for smart home integrations. 
It all depends which IoT devices you use at home. It also depends on the number of triggers we program – but given Neuroon Open is open source, why not to program some useful solutions yourself?
 

We want you to get the most from our work. That’s why we have decided to make out device open-source and share our algorithms. This is what makes Neuroon Open unique.

 
Our product is now transparent, available to the experts who can audit the code and provide constructive feedback as to what we can make better.  
It is verifiable. Researchers using Neuroon for their experiments can see where the results come from and can track the resulting data to electric circuits in the mask.  
It is accessible to DIY and Quantified Self-enthusiasts as it provides SDK and raw data access.  
Its functions may be extended or enhanced with custom apps and tools. With open APIs and data formats, it’s ready for integration with existing and upcoming technologies.  
In an unlikely worst case scenario, if we as a company decided to withdraw our product it could easily be resurrected by a collective of enthusiastic individuals.  
We hope that together we can create a new open standard for exploring and enhancing our minds.  
On the start day of the Kickstarter campaign we will release all of our work-in-progress:  
- Electronic design files  
 - Sources for Neuroon’s firmware  
 - Sleep-staging algorithms  
We encourage everybody to use the materials for both personal and commercial work, so long as the results remain open source.
 

 
 Click on this button and you will get all Neuroon Open open- source files 
 
Would you like to read more about our sleep staging algorithm? Click here to find out more.

 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 


 

For our product to be truly successful is to provide a new standard, an open platform for working with your sleep, dreams and meditating mind.
It can only happen with mass adoption and thriving and healthy community around Neuroon Open. The most important part of which, next to the early adopting customers, is the community of developers, makers, FLOSS hackers, diy coders, researchers, etc. Shortly, the people creating new layers of tools and research upon our part of the work.  
Clean and well-documented open-source Software Development Kit  
In order to make it comfortable and rewarding we intend to provide the ever-growing set of clean and extensive documentation and real-life examples of usage of our SDK and other tools.  
Imagine creating your own tools, algorithms and research with scripts as simple as the following conceptual Python snippet:  

Hackathons   
As our code and user base matures, we plan to organize several hackathons around the world to ignite some interesting community projects. The first one is already on the horizon and will take hopefully take place in August this year in Warsaw at Copernicus Science Center!

Here on the campaign we would like to share with you a part of our hardware documentation! We explain there how Neuroon Open measures your forehead temperature, what is the meaning of this temperature and a little bit more technical/ geek details for hackers- measurement method description with the whole analog layout, pin connections and more. 
Please mind that this is just the beginning. We are working really hard to make the whole documentation fully nonconfidential during the campaign!
You can find the documentation here

Neuroon Open App is so called remote controller of Neuroon Open.
If you don’t want to write your own software on Neuroon Open this app will be your very best friend when using Neuroon Open. It will guide you through all the Neuroon Open features, gather your sleep data, show you your sleep score and personalized sleep tips.  
Neuroon Open app is needed to manage your device and trigger different features of the mask. It also controls the mask, analyzes the data coming from the device and present it to you.  
The app works with Iphones and Android phones.  
You can find all* screens of the new app under this link. 
*Please be noted that Meditation and Lucid Dreaming features will be developed after the Kickstarter campaign finish.  

 

 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

 

 

Get an awesome set: Neuroon Open + headphones!

 
Neuroon: noise cancelling headphones are a great addition to your Neuroon Open. These headphones will support you while meditating, having audio sessions for lucid dreaming induction and finally to get some peace and quiet when needed, eg. on a plane.
You can connect your phone to Neuroon headphones via Bluetooth or 3.5mm audio cable (mini jack).
  
These headphones are also equipped with microphone so you can answer your calls and with other button easily switch between the songs. 
You can charge them using micro USB cable. You can use them for up to 12 hours of calls or playing music.
 

 

 
 
 
 

Product certifications essentially ensure that a product has passed various performance tests and quality assurance checks before it hits the mass market. Neuroon Open has already received all required certifications, which means it is safe and can be market and manufacture. 
 

 Would you like to take a look at the certificates that Neuroon Open obtains? Click here and scroll down for the links. 
 

Our first Kickstarter campaign took place in December 2013 and lasted one month. During this time 1,944 backers pledged $438,573 to help us bring Neuroon to life. We have reached the goal of the campaign: $ 100 000 within 1 day! Here are the statistics of that campaign: Infographic here During the last 3 years we received a lot of valuable feedback and positive comments from our users.

 

 

We are very thankful to all the backers who supported us at that time. We couldn’t be here today without them, without their belief and patience :) 
Our team has learned a lot through these 3 years. We are aware that we have delivered the product to our backers with a delay so now we have planned everything much better in terms of production and logistics and the whole process with run very smoothly. 
Production of Neuroon Open
This time we won’t spend much time on development because Neuroon Open is pretty much done. It just requires some final polishing and the factory that is based in Poland will start its work in 100%. The most important thing that we learned through the last 4 years was to listen to all the comments and feedback that we have received - the community gave us always lots of energy, great ideas and topics to think about.
Last units of our first product has been shipped to customers.
 

The formal name of our company is Inteliclinic. We are based in San Francisco, California, and Warsaw, Poland. 
In February 2016 we became a member of Sky Deck accelerator organized by one of the most respected universities in the world - the University of California Berkeley in US and member of Pfizer Consumer Healthcare & Galvanize network.  
We are also prizewinners of many prestigious, global competitions for the most innovative new companies eg. first place at the LeWeb contest in Paris in 2013 and first place at the ReleaseIt at SXSW in Austin, TX, the USA in 2016. 

Also the company has been selected as the best sleep startup in 2015 by HealthXL with cooperation with Cleveland Clinic. Inteliclinic was also awarded the Best Health Startup from the Plug and Play accelerator program by Johnson & Johnson and received a $25K award.
 

  
In 2016 Neuroon was featured in the Lufthansa FlyingLab that allowed passengers to test out innovative products in accordance to their ‘Sleep Better’ theme.
In 2017 we received prestigious grant: $1.7mln from the European Commission as part of the Horizon 2020 program for implementing a medical version of Neuroon Open for sleep apnea detection and sleep screening tests.

 

Would you like to always get the first-hand news from us? Follow our social media channels!
@Facebook
@Twitter
@Instagram
 

Please be informed that the fulfilment of this campaign may be forwarded to another legal entity but it does not change anything for you and the obligations that we have to you stay the same.
If you choose any physical reward then you should add the shipping fee depending on the country of delivery. Moreover you may expect some additional taxes and customs fees depending on your country’s legislation.

story:
'Crew'

'No-Show'

We created BeClothed because we wanted to create products that are comfortable, look great and are better for the environment.

We believe it is our mission to reinvent the relationship you have with your everyday wear. We do this by making clothing that is not only good for you but for the world too. Our clothes are designed to eliminate odour, thereby requiring you to wash them less often, leading to less wasted water, energy and wear on your clothes.

Born out the frustration that our clothes would never be the way we wanted, we set out to disrupt an outdated industry which is focused on planned obsolescence, the practice of intentionally and artificially limiting the useful life of a product for the purpose of driving more sales, something we're completely against.

We’re dedicated to crafting high-quality timeless products designed to last (and, hence, reduce waste). Our products are made from some of the best materials and are intentionally designed to last for years.

After the overwhelmingly positive response to SilverSocks V1 we’ve been in extensive talks with our factories but most importantly our backers to find out how we can make them even better! We've managed to make several important improvements.

An extra 5% of silver has been worked into the SilverSocks design, bumping the silver content up to a massive 30%. Instead of making the silver denser, we’ve totally reformulated the weave. Allowing for the same nylon frame flexibility, whilst spreading the silver out- for more consistent coverage, in turn creating a more evenly spaced silver to cotton ratio, making the supersoft twill even comfier.

As if that wasn’t enough the gentle cuff has been rethought too, adding 3% more spandex to allow for extra stretch. The toe has also been strengthened without effecting comfort by meticulously adding a layer of ‘pick’ stitching to the design.

How it works

The Cotton is intertwined with threads of our patented Silver fibers that weave in and out to ensure full coverage.

When any part of the Silver touches a bacterial cell, it breaks down its cell wall until the bacteria is no longer able to function, effectively rendering it inactive and unable to produce the pungent smell that comes when it feeds on your sweat.

Method of Application

Our patented Silver fibers are made from a specialist design allowing them to be woven directly into the fabric. During manufacture, the Cotton fibers are intertwined with our patented Silver fibers to ensure each and every surface is covered. 

High definition close up of silver-infused yarn

 

Breakdown of Materials

 

 

Comfort, Hygiene and Versatility

The three pillars of everything we make are underscored by comfort, hygiene and versatility. We believe that every single thing you wear should be the best version that exists. 

Our main focus above all is comfort, because who's going to wear something that doesn't feel great? We try our hardest to give your clothes that extra cosy feel. You can see everything we use in our garments below.

Hygiene is the second of our pillars which is a huge part of our culture as many clothes get smelly very easily and need washing after every single wear which ultimately leads to degradation. Our garments don't smell for up to seven days, so you can pack light on that weekend away and come back wearing the clothes you went in (so you've got plenty of space for presents).

Last but by no means the least, versatility. We believe everything you buy should withstand everything you do, so whether you're at work, at the gym or even on a hike, all our clothing is made to withstand any environment so you won't need any athletic or smart versions of your clothes to take up more room in your wardrobe. 

  • What are 'No-Shows'?

Not to be confused with ‘Ankle Socks’. No-Show socks were originally made to act as an additional unseen insole for primitive footwear. Fast-forward; several centuries and here at BeClothed we’ve made these into the best invisible socks out there. Perfect for hiding just below the frame of; loafers, shoes or sneakers. No-show socks provide ultimate comfort and hygiene, particularly in warm climates where Crew or Ankle socks are not appropriate.

  • What are 'Crew' socks?

Originating from the standard uniformity ‘Crews’ wore on Naval ships. This type of sock holds perfectly at just below the mid-shin level on our legs. Rather than using outdated suspenders or unforgiving elasticated bands to keep our Crew socks up all day. We use a super-soft woven nylon and spandex cuff, entwined within our twill-weave cotton, to keep circulation and breathability flowing all day long.

Origins of Cotton

Grown from a soft, fluffy boll that's cultivated all over the world - that's even made it to the far side of the moon - cotton is by far one of the oldest and most widespread materials around.

Usually planted in the spring, it is a perennial that lives on year after year and keeps growing. With evidence of use in the old world before 5000 BC, it sits firmly near the top of the most resilient fabrics around.

What Does It Do?

Cotton is super lightweight and durable and as a result, is one of the best base materials there is. The soft-to-the-touch quality ensures comfort and cosiness with every wear.

With its roots in the neolithic period, cotton is a reliable, weather-proof insulator that's perfect at any moment and for every occasion.

The comfortable yet flexible stretch makes cotton the perfect fabric to use in all garments, along with its hypoallergenic properties that make it a flawless favourite.

With the prominently high tensile strength of the twill weave, it's able to withstand multiple washes without a problem.

Sustainable Farming

We only source our cotton from organic crops which haven't been adulterated by genetic modification. This gives an experience as similar to the original cotton that we strive to implement. By cutting out the use of pesticides and other chemicals, we can ensure all our garments are held to a higher standard and free from allergens.

We spend on average 70% of our lives with our feet covered, whether we're wearing socks around the home or additionally, shoes outside the home. We live in unnecessary discomfort with socks that don’t work with our feet.

SilverSocks provides you with a premium silky feeling on your feet while stopping other irritants like itchy feet.

 

For our first major product launch, we chose Indiegogo as the community is both intrigued by new inventions and incredibly useful as a sounding board to help us understand if our ideas would work out.

We were picked up by many outlets in the wake of our launch that by the end of it all we had shipped over 10,000+ pairs of our SilverSocks No-Show across all our platforms. This gave us the green light that we were doing something that was in very high demand and we knew we couldn't stop there.

With our first product hitting shelves and our team working tirelessly to keep up with orders on our site, we were being asked by thousands of customers if we'd be able to make our socks in a longer crew version that they were more used to. 

Even with the demand, we had to spend countless months perfecting every single aspect so as to ensure we'd release only the best version before launch day. Again, we were picked up by outlets across the globe and the SilverSocks Crew flew past its goal overnight. By the end of it all, we had shipped over 15,000+ pairs on all our platforms. 

Right now, at this moment in time, we've sold over 50,000+ pairs to over 160+ countries across the world which is something we wouldn't ever have imagined.

It's all thanks to you, our supporters. 

Thank you. 

Here are some dimensions for the SilverSocks Crew in size Medium

Weight: 18g per pair 

Thickness: 1.8mm

Ventilation Mesh: 70 x 115 mm

Size inscription: 1.5 x 0.5 mm

Circulation Cuff (Flat): 70 x 80 mm

Trapezium Toe (before expansion):

  • Flat Top: 40mm
  • Diagonal Sides: 30mm
  • Depth: 22mm

Material Composition:

  • 30% Pure Silver
  • 43% Cotton
  • 22% Nylon
  • 5% Spandex
  • Q: How much does shipping cost to my country? 
  • A: We offer Free Shipping across the world, wherever you are.
  • Q: How much warranty do we get? 
  • A: You get a one year warranty on all your socks.
  • Q: How do I choose my colours and sizes? 
  • A: You can choose which colour and size you want for every single pair of SilverSocks in BackerKit. This survey is activated once the campaign ends and is sent directly to your email address.
  • Q: How do I give you my address? 
  • A: You will provide your address, sizes and colours to us in a service called BackerKit. This survey is activated and sent to your account email when the campaign finishes. 

Risks and challenges

In order to ensure total transparency, the samples used in the campaign are manufactured by the very same technique that your socks will be.

We've been through many months of prototyping to test and refine every feature and we've finalised the entire production line, right through to the quality checking and shipping.

As this is our fourth Indiegogo campaign we're well versed on the level of care that is needed to execute a campaign successfully.

Through our first and second campaigns for the SilverSocks No-Show (10,000+ pairs), SilverSocks Crew (15,000+ pairs) and our website, beclothed.com, we've now sold over 50,000 pairs of the SilverSocks. We've also gone on to sell over 5,000 pairs of underwear in our most recent third campaign which is in the process of being manufactured. 

We understand that crowdfunding campaigns can come with unexpected hiccups so we've prepared ourselves for every eventuality - including going over our goal (like we did the previous three times).

We have three backup manufacturers and packaging producers as well as two backup shippers so there is no doubt we will deliver on time.

It's imperative to us that we keep an open channel with our backers by conveying our thoughts to you every step of the way through Indiegogo comments and occasional updates to ensure you're always in the loop.

story:
Welcome to our Page!

Thank you for visiting our campaign.  Now that we have your attention, we want to explain what we are doing and why we need your help.  To give you a little history about the brand, the company name is LuJeanik and we are based out of the Tampa Bay area.  Our company was established by its designer Shanikki Peterson.  Shanikki always had a dream of becoming a designer since she was young.  She moved all the way from her hometown, Jacksonville, FL to pursue her career in Fashion Design at the International Academy of Design in Tampa, FL.  After graduating she later created her own brand and name it LuJeanik which the name was created by including her mother's name, her grandmothers name and her name into one.  The name itself represents uniqueness and three strong fashion forward women.  Since the establishment of LuJeanik women have appreciated the brand because it offers sexy yet classy and sophisticated pieces for the mature woman that has a love for fashion.  To further enhance her background and to also learn the business side of fashion, Shanikki decided to enroll in Saint Leo University to obtain an MBA in Marketing.  After working full-time in Corporate America for nine years at a well known financial institution, being a full-time student as well as managing and building LuJeanik, Shanikki decided to leave Corporate America and work full-time on her dream.  Since working full-time on her dream, the brand has been slowly progressing but we need your help to put our goals on the frontline.


What We Need

We Need $20,000 for our campaign.  We have so many projects that we would like to start on immediately, however these projects have been placed on hold due to lack of funding.  LuJeanik would like to take the brand to a whole new level.  Currently, all the pieces we create are designed and personally created by Shanikki.  We would like to build a small team to help with the production and manufacturing.  We also need funding to pay for inventory, supplies, a new working location and to pay for marketing strategies to promote the brand.  Shanikki has placed the brand to where it is at today using her own funds and we are now looking for others to help.  Shanikki's goal is to not only be a fashion label that is successful but to also help out within the community by helping others.  Future goals for the brand is to open a non-profit organization that will empower young women and men by teaching fashion and finance that will help young entrepreneurs start their own companies and become successful.   Regardless if we are successful at meeting our goal or not, please be reassured that the funds we do achieve will be invested into purchasing inventory or supplies for the brand. 


What You Get

For contributing to our cause, you will personally get a Thank You letter and a mention in our blog.  You will also receive a  20% discount on purchases made via our website www.lujeanik.com. 

The Impact

Contributing to LuJeanik will go to a great cause to help build our brand and provide programs to help within our community.  It is a main goal of ours to help others and to teach the youth that dreams can really come true.


Your Contribution Matters

Your contribution will be well appreciated and we look forward to meeting our goals.  We understand that everyone may not be able to assist monetarily and that is ok.  If you can help us get to the resources that we need, that will be appreciated as well.  Please share our campaign with others by posting to social media sites or in your blogs.  We also love hearing from people and if you would like to help with what we are doing, feel free to write a comment.  If you have any further questions about this campaign, please feel free to send us a message.

Thank you very much for your time.


Sincerely,

Shanikki Peterson

Executive Director

story:
Short Summary


Hello and thank you for checking out my 1956 Ford Fairlane classic car project.   My name is Jason Palermo, and I'm a native Atlantan.   In July 2014, I purchased my first classic car a 1956 Ford Fairlane in Denver, Colorado after a ten year hunt online, and searching in person I found a barn find. 

Over four months I worked on the car turning wrenches trying to get the original 292 engine to start, draining oil which looked like a chocolate milkshake, pulling out spark plugs and draining coolant.   Unfortunately the 292 engine was seized and I am unable to get the engine to start on my own therefore I shipped the car from Denver to Georgia on 10/31/2014  to my mechanic to start the process of an original engine rebuild. 

This vehicle is very important  to me because the 1950's is such an ionic time period with cars and they do not make vehicles like they used to. You can defiantly tell what make a car was back then just by looking at the lines from a distance. The picture included is what the vehicle will look like when I'm 100 percent complete with the restoration. When I found the Ford Fairlane the vehicle was painted Fiesta Red in color.  While searching the FORD stamp inside the door I found out the car was originally two tone painted white and Fiesta Red.


HOW I WILL USE THE $10,000 DONATIONS TO PUT INTO THE 1956 FORD FAIRLANE CLASSIC CAR RESTORATION. 

  • The 1956 will need a brand new two-tone paint job White and Fiesta Red. Currently  the car is painted Fiesta Red I found the car like this in a barn find. Originally the car from research was White and Fiesta Red which it will be painted to complete the project.
  • The 1956 has a cracked original windshield from a hail storm from sitting outside in Denver before I found it. I'm on the hunt of  finding the original thickness of the 1956 windshield.  
  • The 1956 will need new window stripping in all six windows.
  • The 1956 has a few dents on the hood and body-from multiple hail storms in Denver, Colorado. I will have body work done to remove all dents in the body 
  • The 1956 has a dent on the back right truck side. This dent will need to be pounded out. 
  • The 1956 will need carpet in the front and back seats.
  • The 1956 will need white wall tires and new wheels.
  • The 1956 will need two 1956 side mirrors.
  • The 1956 will need one piece of chrome on the front bumper which is missing.
All donations that are contributed will help greatly by bringing the  1956 Ford Fairlane  back to life through the eyes of an ionic time period in classic cars. Please help me in bringing this car back to life with a donation. 


What We need $10,000 & What You Get AMAZING PERKS



*Make a $25 donation and I will send you a one of a kind photo attached with a thank you note thanking you for your personalized donation. "ONLY ONE HUNDRED AVAILABLE." 

*Make a $100 donation and you will get lunch for two and attend a classic car show and get a 15 minute car ride in the 1956 for two people. "ONLY FIFTEEN AVAILABLE."

*Make a $500 donation and you will utilize the 1956 Ford Fairlane for a model shoot or movie shoot.  "ONLY TWO AVAILABLE."

*Make a $2,500 donation and you will have the classic 1956 Ford Fairlane for your wedding vehicle for the special Bride and Groom. Make an every lasting memory and make use of my classic  car at your wedding. I will drive the bride and groom around on your special day making your wedding a memory to remember.  "ONLY TWO AVAILABLE."



Other Ways You Can Help

It's ok if you can not contribute, but that doesn't  mean you cannot  not help:

  • Please help and get the word out and make some noise about the 1956 Ford Fairlane Classic Car Restoration
  • Please remind everyone to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you,


Jason Palermo

404-202-0285

story:
OUR STORY 


Arthur Limited is a line of casual mens jackets, created out of the desire to have something that's easy to wear, yet fun and unique.
We believe in things that are local, made in small batches, and have an air of exclusivity about them.

The "Limited" in our name stands for just that. We come out with small collections, where each style has a limited quantity produced, and once it sells out, that's it.
If you are lucky to snag one, you become one a few people in the world to own that piece. It becomes a collector's item, if you will.


We are very proud to keep our manufacturing right here in Canada. This allows us a hands on approach, and the ability to monitor every step along the way. Each jacket is made with care, and personal inspection, ensuring we catch potential quality control issues way before it has a chance to reach you.

The fit of the jackets is relaxed, with many of the fabrics being very forgiving, This makes them ideal for travel, and a low maintenance lifestyle. 

Our hope is that Arthur Limited becomes your new favourite jacket. The kind of piece that has the comfort and familiarity of an old worn in pair of jeans, and the novelty and fun factor of a stand out piece. No matter what, you know you'll always feel good when you put it on.



PERKS 

$5   DONATION TO PUGALUG PUG RESCUE

WE LOVE ANIMALS!!! It's no secret, we're huge animal lovers. Our brand was named after our very own PUGGLE rescue, Arthur. As part of our campaign, and every day mission, we want to give back to the organizations that endlessly help animals in need. For the duration of our campaign, all contributions made in this perk are going straight to PUGALUG PUG RESCUE (how cute is that name btw :) You're helping us by keeping the campaign active, while doing a good deed. Amazing, right?


$25   THANK YOU + 25% OFF 

Not ready to buy? Don't see anything you like? That's OK. We've got you covered. All of our jackets are unique and limited edition. We release each style in limited quantity, and once it sells out, that's it. But, that means there's always something new and exciting coming. This perk gets you a big wet juicy THANK YOU from our team, and a 25% OFF CODE to use on our website towards a future order. Limit 1 code per item. 


$195 LOCALS ONLY PERK (OTTAWA)

As a special thank you to our early local supporters, we're opening the doors to our studio for a private shopping event, with exclusive access to our current collection. Very limited edition, only 5 pieces per style. A true boutique experience. Price includes tax and delivery. Reg. retail price $295+tax CAD


$195   EXCLUSIVE INDIEGOGO LIMITED EDITION 

We've designed an EXCLUSIVE INDIEGOGO EDITION just for you, our early supporters. There are 3 styles, and a small batch of 30 pieces from each. Every jacket will come with it's own limited edition number.

The regular retail price is $295+tax                                                                                            You get it for $195 (includes tax and shipping within Canada)


SOHO TWILL / CORAL

BODY - 65% Cotton / 33% Polyester / 2% Spandex                                                         LINING - 100% Polyester                                                                                                               SIZE: 38 - 50


CHICAGO JACQUARD / NAVY-BLACK 

BODY - 70% Rayon / 26% Nylon / 4% Spandex                                                         LINING - 100% Polyester                                                                                                               SIZE: 38 - 50


RENAISSANCE / VEGAN LEATHER

BODY - 100% Viscose ground / 100% PU Coating                                                      LINING - 100% Polyester                                                                                                          SIZE: 38 - 50



DELIVERY 

We've spent the last year developing the line, and working closely with our production facility to iron out any issues with fit, catch design flaws, and come out with the best product.

The benefit of keeping manufacturing local is that it allows for fast turnaround times. Once the campaign is completed, we will go straight into production, and are planning to ship October, 2015.


SHOUT IT FROM THE ROOFTOPS 

Don't forget to SHARE!! Sharing is caring ;)

We love and appreciate all of your support. Every little bit helps and means so much to us. 

THANK YOU

The Arthur Limited Team (JOHN / MIRNA / ARTHUR)

story:
Our Story

Di Valore was founded by a gentleman who held a huge love for watches. Growing up, the founder was a watch enthusiast following in his grandfather’s footsteps. They would spend hours cleaning and servicing watches together, fascinated by the classic designs and the movements of the watches.

Sadly, when his grandfather passed away, he found him self neglecting watches, as it didn’t feel the same without his grandfather. Whilst visiting his fathers and grandfathers grave, he told them all about the watch industry, and how it has unfortunately lost its spark, heavily fixated with overpriced brands. 

At that moment, he decided he would start his own brand in the hope to reconnect a love for watches back into the world as it once did. His aim is to provide a neatly designed range of elegant watches at reasonable purchasable prices. With their innovative new movement, he hopes people will fall in love with the movements of watches in addition to their design. 

We are not here to create just a brand but to create a legacy.

What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to raise £10,000 to be able to bring a number or new ranges at our affordable prices for you! We want to be able to offer a range for every different style, incorporating our innovative movement. We aim to use our expertise and knowledge behind the history of watches to apply a story behind each watch, which for all watch enthusiasts is a great different talking point! Do you dare to be different?

Also with your support we will be able to exhibit our range at the International Jewellery and watch exhibition in London. This would help us to get our watches into the windows of your local jewellers, making it more accessible for you!

The Impact

With your support we can drift away from the tradition of brands using expensive marketing techniques to create the impression of quality, charging you higher prices. We can grow in a very organic manner, which then we would be able to provide you with quality goods with affordable prices! Try it out your self and become part of the legacy!

Risks & Challenges

Were not here to lie to you, we want to portray complete transparency to our supporters and members of the Di Valore legacy. We have not had a easy startup, having difficulties with trade marks, finding high quality suppliers and getting the company up and running. Driven with our huge passion for watches we have overcome all of these problems, no doubt we will come across more bumps in the road but with your support and our drive we can concur these all. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone can support us financially, thats not a problem! We would appreciate the support of your exposure, please share our campaign and follow Di Valore Watches on social medias and help this legacy become a reality!

story:
pYppa is an innovative jewelry company, based in London with its roots and assembly-line in the worlds diamond capital Antwerp, Belgium. The company was built by jewelry and diamond veterans with over 30 year experience in diamonds and jewelry, who wanted to take jewelry to the next level.

We developed and patented an innovative way of fastening diamonds and gems into jewelry. Anyone and everyone can do it, easily and 100% securely.

This is how it works. A gem or diamond is fastened into a cartridge-like setting, coined a pYppa. The pYppa fits perfectly into all the pYppa compatible jewels. The pYppa is protected by US and International Trademarks, Patents and Patent Pending.

Our system consists of three parts:

  • The Jewel.
  • One or more pYppa (BTW pYppa is both singular and plural )
  • Our Tool to fasten and unfasten the pYppa, the Ykey.


This campaign: Changing Jewelry Forever with the Domin8

In this campaign we are introducing both the concept of interchangeable gems and an innovative, exciting and iconic jewel especially designed for the pYppa, the Domin8.

The Domin8™ is a pendant that looks like a domino with five and three dots. The eight dots are either white mother of pearl discs or multi-colored natural gemstones or a combination of both.

It's 2" (5.2mm) high and 1" (2.6mm) wide and weighs 1/2 ounce (15gr).

This gorgeous midnight black jewel is made of one of the lightest yet most resistant metals there is: hard-anodized airplane grade aluminum 7075. 

Like the very expensive watches and jewelry pieces, every Domin8 has an engraved serial number.

ALL OUR METAL PIECES

  • Are precision milled on CNCs with tolerances of 0.05mm or 0.002" 
  • The black metal is airplane grade aluminum 7075, hard anodiezed
  • The back of our pYppa is a special stainless steel that is magnetic and chrome plated to last many years 
  • the springs are tested for at least 30,000 cycles, take out or fasten back in

ALL OUR GEMS:

The Premiere Collection is limited to 999 pieces.

Risks & Challenges

pYppa is not a fly by night operation with only a prototype to their name, because

  • pYppa has successfully designed and patented the most innovative jewelry fastening system, ever.
  • pYppa has successfully registered the pYppa brand in Europe and is currently waiting for its registration in the US.
  • pYppa has cut her teeth on several manufacturing runs. We have a very detailed plan of action with the exact partners needed for every step of production and assembly.

The more we succeed -  the better jewelry (in general) will become.

pYppa is an innovative jewelry company, based in
London with its roots and assembly-line in the worlds diamond capital Antwerp,
Belgium. The company was built by jewelry and diamond veterans with over 30
year experience in diamonds and jewelry, who wanted to take jewelry to the
next level.
We developed and patented an innovative way of
fastening diamonds and gems into jewelry. Anyone and everyone can do it, easily
and 100% securely. 
This is how it works. A gem or diamond is fastened
into a cartridge-like setting, coined a pYppa. The pYppa fits perfectly into all the
pYppa compatible jewels. The pYppa is protected by US and International Trademarks, Patents and Patent Pending.
Our system consists of three parts:


The Jewel.


One or more pYppa (BTW pYppa is both singular and
plural )


Our Tool to fasten and unfasten the pYppa, the
Ykey.

concept of interchangeable gems and an innovative, exciting and iconic jewel
especially designed for the pYppa, the Domin8.The Domin8™ is a pendant that looks like a domino with
five and three dots. The eight dots are either white mother of pearl discs or
multi-colored natural gemstones or a combination of both.It's 2" (5.2mm) high and 1" (2.6mm) wide and
weighs 1/2 ounce (15gr).
This gorgeous midnight black jewel is made of one of
the lightest yet most resistant metals there is: hard-anodized airplane grade
aluminum 7075. Like the very expensive watches and jewelry pieces, every Domin8
has an engraved serial number.ALL OUR METAL PIECES
Are precision milled on CNCs with tolerances of 0.05mm or 0.002" 
The black metal is airplane grade aluminum 7075, hard anodiezed

story:
We're honored to have been covered by many on-line and print publications as well as local Orlando television. If you'd like to take a look, here are a few links: Orlando Channel 13 Orange Appeal Magazine (page 122), Style and Trashon

* Please Note: All Donation Perks including the scarf and outfits are shown in full as you scroll down the page

Summary

Most people do not know the horrors of human trafficking. Once I learned about human trafficking and how it affected the world, I changed the direction of my business.

My name is Carolyn Bailey founder of Treasure Box Kids and I have been steering my company to become a socially responsible company. I believe that a for-profit company should also be socially responsible and help people as much as it reasonably can. 

Treasure Box Kids Mission:

To offer the highest quality children’s clothing through socially-responsible manufacturing practices.

Treasure Box Kids designs, retails and sub contract manufacturers children's clothing from newborn to size seven. Our product mix consists of unique American-made independent designs as well as imported, designer and embellished children’s clothing. Treasure Box Kids original U.S.A. designs are ethically manufactured in Central Florida.

We are now embarking in a new direction. We will introduce a new line of children's clothing-Little Maisha. This new line of children's clothing will be manufactured in Kenya by former victims of human trafficking or women who want to educate their children so that they do not become human trafficking victims. 

Maisha means life in Swahili. I named the line Little Maisha because our little clothing will change lives.   

Why Kenya?

The International Labor Organization estimates that there are 20.9 million victims of human trafficking globally, with the Kenyan government consistently ranking toward the bottom half of the U.S. Department of State’s three-tier human trafficking compliance list, thus making the African country a severe source, transit, and destination for men, women, and children subjected to forced labor and sex trafficking.

After learning this information and more about what is happening in Kenya, I felt compelled to launch an effort through Treasure Box Kids to help educate, employ, and ultimately prevent Kenyan women from becoming victims of human trafficking. This is why I created the Little Maisha Line of children's clothing.  Your support is needed to jumpstart this endeavor.

If you would like to reach us, feel free to email us at contactus@treasureboxkids.com. We would love to hear from you and answer your questions!

Thank you!

The Impact

Education and Economic development are the two keys to preventing Human Trafficking.  If woman are working they can help their families. Women in Kenya are eagerly waiting for the completion of this campaign. They know that they will start to be able to rebuild their lives economically and be given the opportunity of educating their children. A partnership with an American company to produce a line of clothing will change their situation from one without hope to a situation for themselves and their children that is now filled with hope.  

A successful campaign will start to give hope to people that have not seen any hope for a better future. 

The success of this project and campaign will also help our own domestic Human Trafficking victims. Treasure Box Kids will start to employ former victims in our administrative office. We have future plans to open a fashion production house in Central Florida in  2016 and employ former victims in an ethical and emotionally supportive environment.  


What We Need & What You Get

Campaign Goal-$20,000

  • We will start production of the Little Maisha line
  • The first production run will include the eight offered rewards
  • Several women will obtain new work

If We Exceed Our Goal-

  •  We can include a larger line of girls clothing
  •  Expand the line to include a complete boys line (there is currently only one  style that will be produced as a reward) 
  •  More Women will be employed
  •  Hire additional USA staff to market the expanded line

If we do not meet and/or exceed our goal we will still start to manufacture in Kenya. It will still include the eight designs but it will be a smaller production run and it will not help put as many women to work as a full line of both boys and girls clothing. If we exceed our goal and manufacture two complete lines we can help more women.

This is a breakdown of how the funds will be utilized.


Project Timeline

This project will be completed and rewards shipped by the end of June 2016. We are adding in additional time to deliver rewards as there can be complications with overseas deliveries. We do anticipate shipping in earlier in May 2016.


Rewards:

The initial Little Maisha Line will consist of these Eight Styles and One Infinity Scarf.

We included a Infinity Scarf as a reward, available in Women's and Child sizes. Great as a gift to support the campaign.

                        

Our outfit styles are available in size 12 Months to size 6 in girls- 12 Months to size 4 Toddler in Boys.

At the end of the campaign you will be sent a style selection sheet to choose your exact style and size. Pre Ordering during the campaign will save you money as these designs will retail higher after the campaign ends.   


Size Chart


Risks & Challenges

  • Sourcing Quality Fabrics- We have been working hard with our Kenyan project manager to educate her about the types of quality fabrics that we want for this line. We have put a plan into effect to have a U.S, Project manager from Tembo Trading Education Project to work with the Kenyan Project Manager and accompany her to the markets to show and educate her about quality fabric types 
  • Production Times: We do not anticipate any production delays but things do happen. We have added in a extra month to the delivery of our rewards in case there is any delays we have accounted for them already
  • Customs Clearance: Having a shipment clear customs can sometime cause a delay. We can't control how long an item takes to clear customs in another country.   


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you feel you cannot contribute financially, you can still help this campaign succeed:

  • Share it verbally and by email with your friends, family and co-workers
  • Share and like us on the following social media platforms: Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Google+ and LinkedIn. 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Ask us for a copy of our ready made Social Media Pac. All you will have to do is cut and paste to help us promote the campaign.  

FAQ 

  • When will you ship?
        We will ship at the latest by the end of June 2016. We anticipate being able to ship in May 2016.
  • Can you ship to me if I live outside the USA? 
        Yes, in most instances.
         Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for  any applicable duty/VAT charges.

        Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, your package will have to clear customs. We do not have any control on how long this might take. Please order your size accordingly.

We would love to hear from you and answer your questions!Thank you!The ImpactEducation and Economic development are the two keys to preventing Human Trafficking.  If woman are working they can help their families. Women in Kenya are eagerly waiting for the completion of this campaign. They know that they will start to be able to rebuild their lives economically and be given the opportunity of educating their children. A partnership with an American company to produce a line of clothing will change their situation from one without hope to a situation for themselves and their children that is now filled with hope.  A successful campaign will start to give hope to people that have not seen any hope for a better future. The success of this project and campaign will also help our own domestic Human Trafficking victims. Treasure Box Kids will start to employ former victims in our administrative office. We have future plans to open a fashion production house in Central Florida in  2016 and employ former victims in an ethical and emotionally supportive environment.  What We Need & What You GetCampaign Goal-$20,000
We will start production of the Little Maisha line
The first production run will include the eight offered rewards 
Several women will obtain new work 
If We Exceed Our Goal-
 We can include a larger line of girls clothing 
 Expand the line to include a complete boys line (there is currently only one  style that will be produced as a reward) 
 More Women will be employed
 Hire additional USA staff to market the expanded line

If we do not meet and/or exceed our goal we will still start to manufacture in Kenya. It will still include the eight designs but it will be a smaller production run and it will not help put as many women to work as a full line of both boys and girls clothing. If we exceed our goal and manufacture two complete lines we can help more women. This is a breakdown of how the funds will be utilized.
Project TimelineThis project will be completed and rewards shipped by the end of June 2016. We are adding in additional time to deliver rewards as there can be complications with overseas deliveries. We do anticipate shipping in earlier in May 2016. Rewards:The initial Little Maisha Line will consist of these Eight Styles and One Infinity Scarf.We included a Infinity Scarf as a reward, available in Women's and Child sizes. Great as a gift to support the campaign.                          Our outfit styles are available in size 12 Months to size 6 in girls- 12 Months to size 4 Toddler in Boys.At the end of the campaign you will be sent a style selection sheet to choose your exact style and size. Pre Ordering during the campaign will save you money as these designs will retail higher after the campaign ends.   





Size ChartRisks & Challenges 

Sourcing Quality Fabrics- We have been working hard with our Kenyan project manager to educate her about the types of quality fabrics that we want for this line. We have put a plan into effect to have a U.S, Project manager from Tembo Trading Education Project to work with the Kenyan Project Manager and accompany her to the markets to show and educate her about quality fabric types 

Production Times: We do not anticipate any production delays but things do happen. We have added in a extra month to the delivery of our rewards in case there is any delays we have accounted for them already 
Customs Clearance: Having a shipment clear customs can sometime cause a delay. We can't control how long an item takes to clear customs in another country.   

Other Ways You Can Help 
Even if you feel you cannot contribute financially, you can still help this campaign succeed:

Share it verbally and by email with your friends, family and co-workers
Share and like us on the following social media platforms: Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Google+ and LinkedIn.  Use the Indiegogo share tools!
Ask us for a copy of our ready made Social Media Pac. All you will have to do is cut and paste to help us promote the campaign.     FAQ 
When will you ship?         We will ship at the latest by the end of June 2016. We anticipate being able to ship in May 2016. Can you ship to me if I live outside the USA? 
        Yes, in most instances.          Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for  any applicable duty/VAT charges.        Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, your package will have to clear customs. We do not have any control on how long this might take. Please order your size accordingly.

story:
ABOUT ME:

Hi everyone! I’m Anthony and welcome to the Bed Threads post startup campaign! A little about myself, I come from a family of five. I was born in Hawaii and moved around because my dad is a former Marine. He served 32 years. I grew up playing video games, watching cartoons and movies, and playing sports. I’m a huge Call of Duty fan. I graduated high school in New Orleans and soon after joined the service like my dad. I did two tours in Iraq and now have two children that I love unconditionally.

CAMPAIGN SUMMARY:

Bed Threads will be the first store geared towards the big kids in all of us!

I think it would be cool for someone to come home from work and change into their favorite Avengers pajama pants or for a guy to watch his girlfriend walk out of the bedroom with her Batman pajama pants and bra on and sit next to him on the couch.  It’s just another way to express “them” in a fun relative way with each other.

Thing is, we know that we aren’t not the only people to think like this. But we know it’s hard to find everything a person would need all in one place. So we wanted to bring to everyone a place where they could find the latest, fashionable, but affordable lingerie and pajamas all in one setting. Theme based from movies, cartoons, and comic books, these products will never allow room for a dull moment.


WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET:

We started this campaign to raise startup revenue for Bed Threads to use towards inventory. To start this business $515,664 is needed. What this will cover is inventory of over 100 different pieces with hundreds and even thousands of quantity.

Your help will also cover warehouse cost to keep store products, office space, call center for customer service, website, business cards, nationwide advertisement about Bed Threads, and marketing of the products and services, newsletters, and other online store fronts.  Lastly it will also cover payroll. By birthing Bed Threads, with your help, we could open up more job opportunities for anyone in need of employment.


Help from you will allow Bed Threads to conduct free giveaways like smart watches and other devices with a minimum purchase.  It will also help the business to be able to provide discounts and awards to everyone. We will have gift cards and memberships as well. If for some reason we don’t reach our goal, we will use the funds to start the best way we can. That way the ball will be rolling and people can see all of the cool products we will have.

SOCIAL IMPACT/VALUE:

We know that women love to be sexy and that men love to look cool. We also know that when in a relationship, it’s all about keeping the spark alive. The best way to do that is to communicate in a memorable fun way. Like my older brother, he and his girlfriend spend time buying each other cool thinks like Minions movie themed shot glasses, custom Zelda coasters, Dragon Ball Z action figures, and even a child sized Batman.

That’s what they do. What I like is when I walk in the store and see someone wearing a shirt with a comic book heroes symbol on it. I love it! It makes me want to step back from reality just for a moment and indulge in a Marvels movie or go hop on the PlayStation.

I really believe that when everyone sees the products we will have, that they would start a collection of cool stuff that will always be around because it’s right there at home.  There will be sexy lingerie for special occasions, panties for the women who just like to collect them. Pajama bottoms and tops for men and women with all sorts of themes to choose from.


RISKS & CHALLENGES:

We’ve done a lot of research behind this and we believe the biggest challenge for us would be the funding. We have everything ready to go. We just need now to get them rolling. We believe that with Bed Threads being a new company and all, it will take long hours and dedication from everyone involved to get in the swing of things.

By starting with such a large inventory we will have to implement close tracking on everything and will need to be able to reorder products in a timely manner. That way we keep the world happy at all times with our company. Another is getting all orders processed and shipped to insure customer satisfaction. We will work close with our carriers.

I’ve personally overseen inventory on many different occasions from food supply to battery supplies while serving in the Military. I've also worked with Fedex previously as well. So it’s definitely a challenge that will be overcame in my eyes. The real challenge will be finding out what the real challenge is once we are up and going as a business. 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

Here we do understand that not everyone will be able to assist or contribute monetarily. However word of mouth goes a long way. If any of you would be generous enough to spread the word about Bed Threads and what we are trying to do as a whole for the world it will be more than greatly appreciated. It would really mean the world to us to hear the world buzzing about our business. Like us on Facebook, Follow us on Twitter and Instagram, and stay updated with the progress that you are helping to bloom. As soon as we get the newsletter going we will inform everyone. That way you can stay updated with any perks and deal we may have going.

FaceBook: https://www.facebook.com/Bed-Threads-972702476121958/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bed_threads

Instagram: @BedThreads
