MOVEMENT…
DEFINED DOPENESS will be a unisex apparel collection in
which I plan on using apparel pieces as the canvas for my artwork.  Instead of just selling print work or using
fine art materials as a medium, why not utilize something that everyone needs
and can use and reuse?  I see apparel as
a moving canvas.  Most works of art are
placed somewhere stationary and I don’t want that.  I want my artwork to be seen as much as it
can be.  The complexity of the each
illustration and printing style will all depend on how much money I can
contribute to each design for production. 
First production will consist of just t-shirts based on my main logo (to
get the brand out) and a couple of my anime illustrations utilizing different
printing and ink techniques. The goal is
to release a new piece every 3-6 months. 
As my funds grow, ultimately I would like to branch out into fleece
goods and more cut & sewn pieces along with different types of trim such as
appliques, embroidery, custom woven labels, etc.  I also plan on using social media as sort of
a lifestyle platform in which I will assist my customers on how to coordinate
my apparel pieces with other articles of clothing they may already have or are
looking to purchase.
HOW YOU MAY
HELP…
Here is where I need your help. Humbly I am asking for your
generosity to help me raise $5,000 to complete my first production.  Below is the breakdown on how I plan to use
all funds raised:
LEGAL + BUSINESS
CARDS
First and foremost, approximately
15% of proposed funding will be used for legal purposes to register or trademark
my logo.  The last thing I ever want, as
any artist can agree with, is for someone to see my work and try to copy my
ideas. Therefore I must protect myself
and already have a business lawyer to do so. 
Once my logo is in the works to be legalized, I plan on printing new
business cards.
WHOLESALE + PRODUCTION
+ PACKAGING + DISTRIBUTION + PROMOTION
The remaining 85% of funds will be
divided between purchasing wholesale t-shirts, ink, outsourced printing, production,
packaging, distribution, and promotion.  For
my basic logo t-shirts, I plan on doing the printing myself at a local print
shop, Newark Print Shop, which is why I would need to purchase ink.  But I also want to explore as many printing
techniques as I can which is why I will be using additional printing services.  The more detailed oriented illustrations and
printing techniques I can produce, the better for my vision.  I plan on selling my first collection
personally, through social media utilizing PayPal or cash, the Etsy website, and
bigcartel.com. Each purchase will be
wrapped and fastened with a custom DEFINED DOPENESS sticker that I will also
print myself.  With each purchase I plan
on including a personalized invoice, and a small card with my logo and a
personal thank you to each customer.  As
my funds grow, the ultimate goal is to build a DEFINED DOPENESS cut & sewn apparel
line and lifestyle brand.
If I do not raise the
proposed amount of $5000, I will use the funds I do receive to produce as much
as I can. I still plan on legalizing my
logo first because I feel that is most important and I will then take it step
by step until I reach my goals.

PERKS (THE
COLLECTION – FIRST PRODUCTION GOALS
 

THE IMPACT
OF YOUR GENEROSITY…
Honestly, I
just cannot do this alone.  My life does
not afford me the extra funds to get my goals to the next level, especially
being a single mom with other financial responsibilities, mostly repaying
student loans.  It really is that challenging
but I want the opportunity to share my art in my own way. I want the freedom to
be an entrepreneur, work on my own time and most importantly to have more time
with my son.  I know I have the talent to
be successful; I have been sharing my artwork through print since 2009 and
people have really responded positively and have always inquired if I were
going to start a t-shirt collection or sell my prints.  So not only is this for me but for those who
have supported me all these years.  The
same people who trust me to help them with their own creative projects.  For example, I have been working with a
non-profit and one t-shirt I designed for Cancer awareness has raised over
$6.5k to date.  I am also a graphic
designer by day and have been creating licensed artwork for major sports leagues
for 3 years now.
I am also a firm believer of giving back to the community.  From every purchase, I plan to donate 10% to Fashion
For A Cure (FFAC), www.fashionforacure.org
, a non-profit organization I support which uses fashion to help raise money to
increase education and support for families affected by Heart Disease and
Cancer and is also a platform intended to motivate people to give back to their
communities.
THE
CHALLENGES…
Of course with starting any new business venture, especially
a creative one, there will be risks.  Printing
and production could not be as per my standards and I have to reprint, the
apparel could not sell as well as I would hope, or I just run out of money and
cannot move forward in the direction I’d like. 
One of my biggest personal challenges will be establishing a client base
beyond my friends and family and competition with other apparel lines.  I am constantly viewing other apparel
collections that could possibly be competition for my genre of artwork and have
found a good number of collections that could be considered similar.  The challenge will be whether or not my apparel
collection stands out amongst them.  I
have no idea of the answer but I believe in myself and my art and will get my
apparel out to as many people as I can by establishing a solid customer base
from selling, word of mouth, and social media.
OTHER WAYS
YOU MAY HELP….
Even if you cannot contribute monetarily, you can still help
out.  Please, share my campaign with your
friends and family or with anyone you think would enjoy my apparel or may
believe in my campaign and would like to help me out.  You can follow my artist page on Facebook, Instagram,
and Twitter or you can always send me an email if you would like to know more
about myself and my work.  Every little
bit helps and I graciously accept any way you are willing to assist. 
Thank you for the time dedicated to reading my campaign,
supporting me, and sharing my story with others… Love is love!

story:
Why did we start MDRN?

Boxers are only the beginning of our crusade to liberate menswear from the archaic businesses that you’ve been stuck with and we hope you join us. 

We’ve seen a fundamental problem with the men’s basics market. There are cheap brands that don’t last, aren’t very comfortable, and convince you that they are “just good enough”. We don’t think your clothes should be just good enough. On the other end of the spectrum, are designer brands that feature nicer fabrics at extortionary prices and are designed for looks over function resulting in some nice, but expensive and uncomfortable underwear. We’ve spent the last year and a half trying to figure out why there can’t be a happy medium of boxers that are high quality, high comfort, and high performance at a reasonable price. We think that we’ve developed the perfect pair of boxer briefs for the modern gentleman and now we need your help.

 

Why you’ll love our boxers

Comfort

We’ve designed our boxers to maximize comfort, and we believe that we’ve created some insanely comfortable boxers. They don’t ride up. They aren’t too tight. They have four-way stretch fabric. They breathe easy and dry quickly.

Great look

Our co-founders Steve and Keri developed dozens of designs and finally created the perfect pair that are flattering no matter how you’re built and look great both in the locker room and at home.

Performance Fabric

We’ve sourced our fabrics from premium manufacturers located in the US to ensure maximum quality. Our custom blend of lightweight cotton and spandex blended fabric is designed specifically for these boxers. You literally cannot find this fabric in any other product anywhere in the US… we checked! We’ve combined organic pima cotton that is light, breathable, and quick drying with the stretch and performance of spandex. In addition, we used an anti-microbial treatment to ensure these boxers stay fresh. Our fabric keep your boxers fresher, longer and reduce the odors created by microbes on a daily basis.

A Fair Price

We’ve decided to ditch the traditional apparel business model for a more modern approach with direct-to-consumer online sales. This allows us to cut out the middleman distributors, retail markup, and traditional marketing channels, resulting in a brand made and sold directly to you.

 

Why We Need Your Support

100% of your contributions here will fund the first production round of MDRN boxers. In order to produce the high quality fabric that is used to create our boxer briefs at an affordable price point, we need to order several thousand yards of it. By pre-ordering a pair (or 7) here, you will help us reach the threshold needed to make these boxers a reality. 

The Founding of MDRN

Co-founder, Stephen Haugse, has been on-the-go for the past decade. Owning and operating retail stores in Honolulu, HI and commuting monthly to California to manage an online marketing firm, while fitting in a little surfing and hiking on the side. He noticed that his wardrobe – specifically his underwear - could not keep up with the on-the-go lifestyle. He tried dozens of brands, but couldn’t find anything that offered high-quality performance and insane comfort at a reasonable price. Fortunately for him the answer was closer than he could ever imagine!

During Stephen’s constant commutes, his girlfriend, Keri Ogden was busy growing her own swimwear business, Elle Mer. Keri grew up on the Big Island of Hawaii, wearing bikinis just about everyday to the beaches along the Kohala coast. Her swimwear business was built on sourcing the best fabrics, stitching the perfect seams, and making swimwear that stays on in even the most powerful shorebreak Hawaii has to offer.

Working together, Stephen and Keri began to design the concept of what the perfect pair of men’s boxer briefs should be. The shorts had to be top quality but also priced reasonably. They had to look great and perform better than any pair Stephen had tried to-date.

That meant no riding up.

They had to be breathable.

They had to dry quickly and stay cool on the warmest Hawaiian afternoon. And they had to be insanely comfortable.

Using Keri’s design expertise and connections to the best US fabric suppliers & manufacturing, the first MDRN boxer briefs were created.

Steve and Keri decided that all MDRN boxer’s should be made in California and shipped around the world. The shorts are sewn in a proprietary method to ensure comfort with every movement. The fabrics are non-pilling, breathable, quick drying, and super stretchy to ensure comfort in any environment.


Custom Designed Features

 

No Riding Up - Some brands claim to have boxers that don’t ride up and don’t need adjustment, but overcompensate with tight elastic bands and minimal stretch in the fabric. Our boxers offer the perfect medium to keep everything where it should be without having to add in tight elastic. 

2” Premium Elastic Waistband - Smooth to the feel, no loss of elasticity, no warping in the wash or baconing. Don’t worry about frayed edges or stretched out waistbands, our custom elastic will hold tight time after time. The extra tall elastic provides added surface area which in turn delivers a more personal and comfortable fit. Our thin, ultra durable elastic contours to your waistline immediately upon putting them on.

No Bothersome Tag - We’ve been there, you just settle in for a 6 hour flight and realize the the tag on your boxers is not going away. Don’t get annoyed with an irritating tag. Our heat-press text eliminates the tag and the discomfort.

Quick Dry Fabric - Our 90/20 Prima Cotton/Spandex intelligent blend of fabrics are made to dry quickly to prevent moisture and odors. No matter if you just got done with squats or have been sitting at your desk all day, take a quick walk and you’ll be as good as new. Plus our custom blend of fabrics help eliminate microbes that breed in warm, moist environments.

Contoured pattern - contours to the shape of a man, providing a flattering look that you’ll feel proud to show off around the house, in the gym, or anywhere else you might get caught with your pants down.

Stitching - We use “flat lock” stitching so that there are no rough edges and you have a clean fit all over. This stitching also helps prevent frayed edges for a longer lasting pair of boxers. This method of stitching is much more time consuming to manufacture but once you try it on, you will know why we take the time to have this stitch on all our boxer briefs.

Easy Access Fly  - our “Easy Access” horizontal fly makes it easier to take care when nature calls and results in fewer left over drips. For those of you who wear tucked-in dress shirts to the office or out on the town, the horizontal fly makes it easy to take care of business without having to untuck everything.

Multi-stretch fabric - multi stretch fabric so that they fit any size and shape. This results in boxers that contour to your shape without restricting or riding up. The 4 way stretch fabric has more elasticity vertically to move with your natural motion. The horizontal stretch profile is slightly more snug which provides a more secure form fit and prevents the briefs from riding up.

 

By backing this crowdfunding campaign you get the chance to purchase our MDRN Boxers at over half the cost of our competitors. In order to bring you these savings, we had to develop a unique business model that skips the traditional marketing and retail locations. 

 

Stretch Goals: 

While we have our initial goal set to deliver our first line of boxer briefs, we have plans for much, much more. If we're able to break the following thresholds, all backers will be eligible for any level. With more funding comes more options for our customers. We'll add in 3 bright new colors if we hit the $30k mark. 

  • $30,000: MDRN CORE Colors - Light Blue, Royal Blue, Navy Blue, Red, Heather Grey, Black

  • $60,000: MDRN - LIFESTYLE Series in two Custom Prints

  • $90,000: MDRN -  SLVR Series with Anti-Microbial Treatment
At $90,000 things get really interesting.
Get us to $90k and we will integrate a special anti-microbial fabric that utilizes silver technology to help kill microbes that cause odors. We have developed a pair of boxers that can go a full day, and more, without the horrible odor that comes after a full day of wear. These are great for backpackers, athletes, or guys that just want a fresher pair at the end of the day. This essentially means we get to add our own proprietary blend of threads to create the ultimate fabric. The fabric will be created right here in California.

Custom Elastic Mockup:

 

Product Testing And Quality Assurance

 

After creating the final prototypes, we then developed a limited first run and shared them with some of our more active friends for extreme endurance testing. The Idea? Wear only one pair of MDRN boxers for 30 days and put them through the grind of your daily routines. Wash them as often as needed but don’t wear any others, no matter what you’re doing. After 30 days, between these testers, we’ve had MDRN boxers reach the top of MT. Whitney, submerge themselves in the Pacific ocean for a daily swim, run a combined 800 miles, and lift off on 9 cross-country flights.


The Results: after 30 days of continuous use, MDRN boxers still had their same contour fit and stretch. While they were a little worn as you’d expect, they looked almost as good as new. It was after we started hearing about these results that we knew that we had a winning set of boxers.
 
We will be implementing standard professional apparel product testing, quality assurance and eco-responsibility throughout our company. By sourcing and manufacturing our products in the US, we are already a step ahead of most other mens underwear brands.
 

Where do we go from here?


With the prototypes completed, the manufacturer selected, and the fabric developed, the hard part is out of the way. By funding our campaign, you will help us secure discounted pricing to some of the best fabric on earth. We will also be able to implement product testing standards on every pair of boxers we make, ensuring that you only receive the best. 100% of our Indiegogo funds will go to sourcing, manufacturing and fulfilling product orders.

We need your help!

Hopefully by this point you are on-board to contribute to owning a pair of the best boxers on earth. You can help further by sharing our cause with anybody you think might be interested. Please  share this page with your friends, family, co-workers, and anyone you think might want the best pair of boxers.

Featured on:

 

 

FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions

 

  • Q: Where do I pick out which color I want?

    • A: At the conclusion of the campaign (July 16), we will be emailing out a survey to every person who contributes to our campaign and that's where you will select the color you want. Indiegogo will provide us with your email address in order to do so.

  • Q: Where can I buy these boxers after the campaign

    • ​A: Visit our website at mdrnwear.com

  • Q: If I buy multiple boxers, can I get any combination of the colors?

    • A: Yes, you are able to get any combination you would like. For example, if you are ordering 4 boxers, you can get all 4 of the same color or mix it up any way you like.

  • Q: When will my boxers arrive?

    • A: We estimate Mid-November 2016 - after our 30 day campaign is over on October 19, Indiegogo releases the funds to us and we'll pay the manufacturer to begin production.  The estimated production time is roughly 30-45 days, depending on the quantity of the order.  As soon as we receive the boxers, we'll work around the clock to ship out the watches to our awesome supporters!

  • Q: What if I select the wrong size?

    • A: Don’t worry, we will be sending out a final confirmation email just before we ship product to confirm color, size and shipping information is all correct.

  • Q: I’m located out of the US, will you still ship to me?

    • A: Yes, we will ship to Canada and the EU however there will be an added $20 shipping fee for any of these orders.

  • Q: How will the boxers be priced after this campaign is over?

    • A: After the Indiegogo campaign is over, all CORE boxers will be priced at $30 per pair and SLVR boxers will be priced at $34 per pair.

  • Q: Are your underwear Moisture-wicking?

    • A: No. although we tested moisture-wicking materials, we found that because these materials didn’t absorb any moisture, they ended up transferring it to our pants! You definitely don’t want this happening when things start to heat up down there. Instead, our boxer briefs are made with custom premium fabric blends that absorb moisture and quickly dry, leaving you comfortable all day.

  • Q: What’s the big deal about the Easy Access Fly?

    • A: Many men that wear dress shirts tucked into their pants find it easier to simply pop through the front rather than untucking everything and having to re-tuck their shirts. Plus, there are other benefits to an easy access fly... ;)

  • Q: How should I wash my boxers?

    • A: You can wash your boxers the way you would any other clothing pieces. Avoid bleach but other than that they should stand up to your washer and dryer. With proper care, these boxers are meant to last.

FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions
 


Q: Where do I pick out which color I want?
A: At the conclusion of the campaign (July 16), we will be emailing out a survey to every person who contributes to our campaign and that's where you will select the color you want. Indiegogo will provide us with your email address in order to do so.


Q: Where can I buy these boxers after the campaign
​A: Visit our website at mdrnwear.com


Q: If I buy multiple boxers, can I get any combination of the colors?
A: Yes, you are able to get any combination you would like. For example, if you are ordering 4 boxers, you can get all 4 of the same color or mix it up any way you like.


Q: When will my boxers arrive?
A: We estimate Mid-November 2016 - after our 30 day campaign is over on October 19, Indiegogo releases the funds to us and we'll pay the manufacturer to begin production.  The estimated production time is roughly 30-45 days, depending on the quantity of the order.  As soon as we receive the boxers, we'll work around the clock to ship out the watches to our awesome supporters!


Q: What if I select the wrong size?
A: Don’t worry, we will be sending out a final confirmation email just before we ship product to confirm color, size and shipping information is all correct.


Q: I’m located out of the US, will you still ship to me?
A: Yes, we will ship to Canada and the EU however there will be an added $20 shipping fee for any of these orders.

A: After the Indiegogo campaign is over, all CORE boxers will be priced at $30 per pair and SLVR boxers will be priced at $34 per pair.


Q: Are your underwear Moisture-wicking?
A: No. although we tested moisture-wicking materials, we found that because these materials didn’t absorb any moisture, they ended up transferring it to our pants! You definitely don’t want this happening when things start to heat up down there. Instead, our boxer briefs are made with custom premium fabric blends that absorb moisture and quickly dry, leaving you comfortable all day.


Q: What’s the big deal about the Easy Access Fly? 
A: Many men that wear dress shirts tucked into their pants find it easier to simply pop through the front rather than untucking everything and having to re-tuck their shirts. Plus, there are other benefits to an easy access fly... ;)

A: You can wash your boxers the way you would any other clothing pieces. Avoid bleach but other than that they should stand up to your washer and dryer. With proper care, these boxers are meant to last.

story:
The Project

New Street Communications seeks to publish a 300-page facsimile edition of the actual FBI reports and memoranda related to the Bureau's surveillance of Pete Seeger during the late 1960s. This facsimile edition will include commentary from Edward Renehan – longtime friend of the Seeger family and author of the critically acclaimed Pete Seeger vs. The Un-Americans: A Tale of the Blacklist. It will also serve as the first of eight volumes providing facsimiles of ALL released FBI materials related to Seeger from the early 1940s onward.

J. Edgar Hoover's FBI kept the musician/activist under observation (and continual harassment) for many years, commencing before World War II (with its investigations of the Almanac Singers and related organizations), and extending well into the 1970s.

Of some 1,800 pages of recently released FBI files, the Bureau's surveillance summaries related to the late 1960s - during which period Seeger was deeply involved with the anti-war movement and various other left-wing causes, not the least the fledgling environmental movement – are of special interest.

These FBI reports unwittingly reveal the rather absurd preoccupation of Hoover and his minions with regard to Seeger, his family, and his milieu ... not to mention the Constitutionally questionable nature of the exercise. At the same time, however, they provide a vivid chronicle of this fascinating era from the uniquely paranoid point-of-view of an organization which believed not only Seeger but also such personages as Lauren Bacall, James Baldwin, and John Lennon bore watching.

In these pages we get the Bureau's “take” on Seeger's support for the “Fort Hood Three” (three servicemen who refused orders to go to Vietnam) … his cooperation with the Catholic Peace Fellowship, SDS, the United Farm Workers, and other organizations … his appearances at such events as the W.E.B. DuBois Centennial Celebration at Carnegie Hall and memorial gatherings for Julius and Ethel Rosenberg … his being named the honorary Chairperson of Earth Day-New York in 1970 … his visits to Cuba and thence Franco's Spain in 1971 along with daughter Mika and others … and much more.

In sum, the files provide an invaluable record which tell us as much about the observers as they do about the observed, and the times in which they moved.


What We Need & What You Get

As noted above, we intend eventually to produce eight volumes in total comprising all 1,800 pages of the FBI documents. Reproducing full facsimiles of the Bureau's actual typewritten and handwritten documents is an expensive proposition for which our small publishing company will need help in the way of prepaid orders for this first book off press (8.5" x 11", 300 pages).

  • Funders who support the 1967-1971 volume at the $20 level will receive the book itself as a 'thank you' gift, this in effect amounting to a 33% discount off the $29.95 list price, with shipping/handling on us. As well, these funders will have their names noted in the acknowledgments, and will be offered the opportunity to purchase subsequent volumes at the discounted $20 price.
  • Funders who contribute $10 or more will get their names in the acknowledgments.
  • Funders below $10 will receive our grateful thanks.
  • Should we not make our goal of $3000, we will still publish the 1967-1971 volume, but may be forced to reconsider our long-term publication of all eight books.

How Else  You Can Help

  • Spread the word on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook and other social media. Do this and we'll love you forever. ;-)

story:
Our smart camera offers two options that will instantly adapt to your lifestyle. Either FRAME -fixed base- or FRAME 360° -rotatable base- will make your life smarter. 






Our rotation base will provide a 360° degree view of your home or office. The microphone will allow to have two communication and with the 1080p HD video quality you will have full control of your surroundings. 


The infrared functionality will allow you to track motion in low light. Angle adjustment together with a rotational base will provide great flexibility to set FRAME in the best position according to your needs.   


Share electronic messages (Sticky Notes) with your loved ones and friends. FRAME’s rotatable base is equipped with a color indication light that can be set in the App. See who is watching or get an indication of a personal message left behind for you in one of the 16 million colors you can pre-set.   

. 



FRAME is made to last because of its durable technology. Back us up now and enjoy it for years to come without the need of upgrading your hardware.

This feature lets you record voice messages from your phone to FRAME devices in your home or office. The indication light lets you know who the message is from and automatically will play when you enter .

FRAME connects to your home or office's Wi-Fi and notifies you when someone has entered the premises. FRAME can then be set to take a picture of the person entering and send it to straight to your mobile device.

Share your moments through LifeSmart App with the live stream feature, invite family members to help you keep-an-eye on your loved ones while you're out. 

FRAME's 8GB will allow you to store videos and images. For an additional fee you will be able to upgrade and keep your recordings from a week up to a month and play them back when you need to see them. Play your video on your mobile device from any location. 

Upload your favorite FRAME videos straight from our cloud into your social media. 



Trigger actions between your FRAME camera and other LifeSmart devices.  Create a full smart home experience that is simple to set up and easy to use. Create a full security check up or create triggers to make your life easier.


  

Upgrade your FRAME! Get this incredible Home Automation Kit,  normally at a price of $199 USD and now for $99 USD. Limited time offer!


* Our cameras are stand alone products, therefore, you don't need any other devices to experience FRAME or FRAME 360°.

Want to store your footage? Upgrade through our dedicated cloud storage.  





Yeah! You´ll have an award winning design camera either at your office or at  home.  We are so proud to win "The Chicago Athenaeum Award 2015" for Good Design, the oldest and most well known Design Award in the world!

We would like to thank Branch for the fantastic design!























As we have been working on this project for a long time we have overcome many challenges already. 

Since manufacturing will be done by a large electronics manufacturer that we have worked with before, we do not foresee any issues with the quality of the hardware. As soon as the campaign comes to its end we will start the manufacturing process. We expect to be able to deliver the first backers in August. Not knowing the exact volumes might be a challenge. 


We are currently setting up local servers to support FRAME around the globe. The challenge we face is whether FRAME will be able to support top speeds for our backers in countries outside of the USA, Europe, South-America, and Japan. E.g. We have not been able to test our speeds in Africa.



In this moment, we only offer LifeSmart App in English. Although we would like to translate LifeSmart App into other languages this will not be ready on time for the product launch. We have designed LifeSmart App to be as intuitive as possible with the use of icons but for some of our users who do not speak English, this might be a challenge. 


All of the functionalities shown in the screen shots have been developed and are working. New software features will be released but we don't want to slow down the manufacturing process.




1. How does FRAME work?

FRAME is an  easy-to-set-up camera that you can control fully from your mobile device. It allows you to see in real-time what's going on at home and get notifications if there is unexpected movement, to your phone or tablet. You can also leave messages that get delivered when and where they need to be heard. FRAME interacts with other LifeSmart devices in your house to make it a smart home.

2. Is the App free?

Yes, the App is free to use. For some additional features such as cloud storage we will have to ask for a reasonable monthly fee.

3. How many FRAMEs do I need in my home?

To really keep-an-eye-on everything that is going on in your home or office we highly recommend having one FRAME camera in every room.

4. Can I buy one for my office or my second home?

Yes, of course! You only need to make sure there is a reasonably stable Wi-Fi connection for optimal use.

5. I am not super tech savvy, will I still be able to set up FRAME at home?

We have made the set-up process as easy as possible. Setting up FRAME will be as easy as unpacking, pushing two buttons (one on the device and one on your phone) and you're good to go.



6. Does FRAME include some kind of warranty?

FRAME comes with a one year (limited) warranty that applies to manufacturing defaults by normal use. FRAME is designed to last. We hope you won't experience any issues as FRAME was built to be robust. We inspect every single product before shipped. If you do experience any difficulties we will be there to solve the problem.

7. Shipping methods?

LifeSmart will use premium services to ship FRAME in a safe way to your doorstep. The service that we will use for your shipment depends on your location.

8. When can I expect delivery?

Production starts the moment the campaign comes to its end. All production and technical details have been taken care of and we are ready for production. We expect our backers to receive their FRAME cameras in the beginning of October.

9. How much are shipping and handling?

Shipping and handling, which include shipping the items to our offices, packing and fulfilling orders will cost:

- US, Canada, UK, Australia, the EU, & Japan: Free shipping. 

- International Orders: $20 for a small size.

10. Can I change or cancel my perk?

Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on Indiegogo are also non-refundable. 



11. Is FRAME battery operated? If so, how does it recharge?
FRAME has a built-in battery. If the camera is placed on the base station it will continue charging. 

12. Can I connect more than one FRAME to the App system? 

Yes, you can operate multiple FRAME cameras through the same app. More functions will become available as we re-adapt and re-develop the software. 


13. What cable is FRAME using? Can I use another cable? 

FRAME's base uses standard micro USB ports which you can plug the USB into to power FRAME. You can also replace our micro USB to USB with other cables using the same plugs.


14. How do I use sticky notes in the LifeSmart App? 

Gently hold down the microphone icon button in LifeSmartApp while speaking and release the button when you're done. The voice message will automatically upload into your FRAME. 


15. How will my family member see they have a message? 

On the rotatable base station, there is an indication light showing you who left a message. E.g. You can set it so mom has a red indication light and dad has a blue one. 


16. Can I program the indication light to show who is watching? 
Yes, not only will the indication light show that someone is watching, But also who is watching, E.g. Lets say grandma or dad.

17. Can I give temporary access? 

Yes, we think there might be situations where you would like to share access with your neighbor, close friend, grandparent or babysitter; that's why you can easily set a time limit to grant them access to. When someone you've given access too is watching, FRAME's indication light will show you.


18. What are the camera specs of FRAME? 
FRAME is a 1080HD camera with 8GB internal memory that is used to make a backup that can be uploaded into the cloud if the internet connection is down.

19. How is FRAME powered? What happens if the power or WiFi goes out? 

FRAME has a built-in battery and memory. This will work as a backup during instabilities in your Wi-fi connection and power. When the Wi-fi connection comes back on, the footage will be restored. Additionally, you will get a notification if the connection is lost.


20. What voltage does FRAME Support?
FRAME will ship with an international switching power supply capable of 100v - 240v 50/60Hz cable.


21. How safe is it?

LifeSmartApp, server, and communication is all encrypted and runs on a bank-level security protocol to ensure it's private and secure.



22. Can I use multiple phones/ devices? 

Yes, after setting up FRAME you can integrate other devices with Lifesmart App.

23. What operating systems are supported by FRAME and its App?

LifeSmartApp is available for IOS, (Apple Watch for notifications) and Android. Soon we will launch a Smart TV app so you can see what is going on straight from your TV.

24. Can I use my iPad (mini) or IPod Touch with the App? 

Yes, you can use your iPad (Mini) to control your FRAME camera remotely and also your iPod Touch as long as it is connected to Wi-Fi


25. Will FRAME work with other third party devices? 

Yes, besides our other LifeSmart products we will launch in the USA soon, we started integrating other devices within the LifeSmart platform. We will integrate more devices over the next few months.

story:
We, at Marble Swimwear have teamed up with Instagram star, Sarah Kohan of @moonstrucktraveller to bring this unique collection to you. Helping reduce harmful ocean pollutants, the fabric we're using is made from recycled fishing nets and other waste plastics meaning every piece of swimwear purchased quite literally cleans our seas. 

Sarah, who is best known for sharing her far flung travels through her Instagram account spends most of her time in a bikini. Through this, she has learnt what shapes and designs are most flattering and has used these learnings as well as her travel inspirations and love of the ocean to design this unique collection. We hope you love it as much as we do!

From Left to Right, Sarah and Sian wear:

Sarah wears Elissa Top in Night and Hanli Bottoms in Avorio

Sian wears Cindy Top and Terri Bottoms in Vigneto and Sarah wears Michele Top and Sylvia Bottoms in Vigneto

Sarah wears Ramsey One Piece in Cristallo

Our swimwear is made using luxurious Italian fabric made with Econyl®, a recycled fibre made from abandoned fishing nets and other post-consumer waste.

The Econyl® yarn is then woven with LYCRA® XTRA LIFE™ which proved to be 5 times more durable when exposed to chlorine and UV than comparable swimwear fabrics.

Think first class fabric, that doesn't harm the planet!

 

The Collection includes 3 Bikini Tops, 3 Bikini Bottoms and the ultimate One Piece. Each of these styles come in five amazing colour-ways and in sizes Small, Medium and Large.

From Left to Right, Sarah wears:

Cindy Top and Sylvia Bottoms in Vigneto

Elissa Top in Night and Hanli Bottoms in Avorio

Michele Top and Sylvia Bottoms in Vigneto

The Colours

 

The Michele Top is a Fixed Triangle top featuring cut out details and adjustable length straps.

Front View:

Back View:

 

The Cindy Top is a fully adjustable halter neck top to allow for a fully flexible fit and ultimate support. 

Front View:

Back View:

 

The Elissa is a Bandeau Top with lace up front, sides and back. The straps at the back can be tightened for a fully adjustable fit.

Front View:

Back View:

 

The Terri Bottoms offer a medium, super-flattering coverage with looped criss-cross detail at the sides.

Front View:

Back View:

 

The Sylvia bottoms have a Brazilian shape with minimal coverage and looped criss-cross detail at the sides.

Front View:

Back View:

 

The Hanli Bottoms can be worn high or low on the hip and have a Brazilian, super-flattering shape with minimal coverage.

Front View:

Back View:

 

The Ramsey One Piece has adjustable straps and a medium to high cut leg for a flattering shape and ultimate adjustability.

Front View:

Back View:

Our size chart below has all the information you need regarding sizing, although if you’re unsure please drop us an email on info@marbleswimwear.com with the Subject ‘Size Enquiry’:

By placing an order, you’ll be helping us fund the first collection and actively cleaning our seas. Here’s how to support our campaign and be the first to wear Ocean to Ocean this summer:

  • Select a perk on the right hand side to begin your order - Bikini Set or One Piece
  • Select the style, size and colour you would like within the Perk - you can mix and match Top and Bottoms styles, sizes and colours.
  • Continue on to the next page to enter shipping and finally payment information
  • Complete your payment via Apple Pay, Credit or Debit Card.
  • Orders will be dispatched in 2 week batches depending on when you order. We’ll keep you updated with how our campaign is going and when you can expect to receive your order. It should be no longer than 4 weeks after placing your order with us, and hopefully even sooner!

At Marble Swimwear, where our products are made to be enjoyed in the ocean and on the beach, we felt compelled to act responsibly to preserve this precious resource. 

Our intention for this collection is to bring a beautiful collection of swimwear to a generation of responsible shoppers  looking for high quality fashion with the planet in mind.

Not only that, but we will be ensuring that every single element of our production is environmentally conscious. From the fabrics used through to the methods used to deliver it to you - we are committed to ensure that every decision made is done with the planet at the forefront of our minds. 

We believe that fashion can be beautiful, luxurious, fashion forward and environmentally friendly. 

By pre-ordering a piece from our collection, you'll be helping us fund the first production run of this unique collection, which quite literally cleans our seas.

Please ensure that you’ve read our FAQ before reaching out to us!

 

Backers: indiegogo@marbleswimwear.com

Business Enquiries: sales@marbleswimwear.com

Press Enquiries: press@marbleswimwear.com

 

Thank you so much for taking the time to read our story and checking out Ocean to Ocean! We’d appreciate you sharing our exciting project with your friends!

Sian & Sarah xx

 

What does the material feel like?

We promise you, you will not believe that it’s made from regenerated plastic. The material is super soft and luxurious. It’s got enough stretch but will not be baggy come the end of Summer. Not only that, but it’s super resistant to UV rays, chlorine and sun creams and oils. This is swimwear that will last.

 

Where do these abandoned fishing nets come from?

Sadly, not everyone cleans up after themselves. Fishermen will often abandon their nets because it’s the easiest way for them to get rid of them, because they are fishing illegally or due to many other factors - some of which are intentional but others that are accidental. The collateral damage of this is marine life, thousands of which are killed every year unnecessarily as a result.
Recovered fishing nets are then recycled: by means of a regeneration process they are turned into new raw materials which can be used to create brand new products such as swimwear! Therefore, ocean pollution decreases with every product manufactured.

 

What sizes does the collection come in?

Currently, we are offering sizes Small, Medium and Large in every style. Please see our Size Chart for further details.

 

I entered my address or some order details incorrectly. Can I change it?

Please email info@marbleswimwear.com with Subject Title ‘Order Details - Change’

 

When will I receive my order?

Orders will be dispatched in 2 week batches depending on when you order. We’ll keep you updated with how our campaign is going and when you can expect to receive your order. It should be no longer than 4 weeks after placing your order with us, and hopefully even sooner!

 

What if the pieces I order don’t fit?

Once the campaign is over, and we can hopefully move in to full production, we'll be in a position to exchange any orders where pieces don't fit. If you have any size enquiries, please don't hesitate to drop us an email on info@marbleswimwear.com with Subject 'Size Enquiry' so that we can try to make sure you get the right size first time!
story_txt:
We, at Marble Swimwear have teamed up with Instagram star, Sarah Kohan of @moonstrucktraveller to bring this unique collection to you. Helping reduce harmful ocean pollutants, the fabric we're using is made from recycled fishing nets and other waste plastics meaning every piece of swimwear purchased quite literally cleans our seas. Sarah, who is best known for sharing her far flung travels through her Instagram account spends most of her time in a bikini. Through this, she has learnt what shapes and designs are most flattering and has used these learnings as well as her travel inspirations and love of the ocean to design this unique collection. We hope you love it as much as we do!From Left to Right, Sarah and Sian wear:Sarah wears Elissa Top in Night and Hanli Bottoms in AvorioSian wears Cindy Top and Terri Bottoms in Vigneto and Sarah wears Michele Top and Sylvia Bottoms in VignetoSarah wears Ramsey One Piece in CristalloOur swimwear is made using luxurious Italian fabric made with Econyl®, a recycled fibre made from abandoned fishing nets and other post-consumer waste.The Econyl® yarn is then woven with LYCRA® XTRA LIFE™ which proved to be 5 times more durable when exposed to chlorine and UV than comparable swimwear fabrics.Think first class fabric, that doesn't harm the planet! The Collection includes 3 Bikini Tops, 3 Bikini Bottoms and the ultimate One Piece. Each of these styles come in five amazing colour-ways and in sizes Small, Medium and Large.From Left to Right, Sarah wears:Cindy Top and Sylvia Bottoms in VignetoElissa Top in Night and Hanli Bottoms in AvorioMichele Top and Sylvia Bottoms in VignetoThe Colours The Michele Top is a Fixed Triangle top featuring cut out details and adjustable length straps.Front View:Back View: The Cindy Top is a fully adjustable halter neck top to allow for a fully flexible fit and ultimate support. Front View:Back View: The Elissa is a Bandeau Top with lace up front, sides and back. The straps at the back can be tightened for a fully adjustable fit.Front View:Back View: The Terri Bottoms offer a medium, super-flattering coverage with looped criss-cross detail at the sides.Front View:Back View: The Sylvia bottoms have a Brazilian shape with minimal coverage and looped criss-cross detail at the sides.Front View:Back View: The Hanli Bottoms can be worn high or low on the hip and have a Brazilian, super-flattering shape with minimal coverage.Front View:Back View: The Ramsey One Piece has adjustable straps and a medium to high cut leg for a flattering shape and ultimate adjustability.Front View:Back View:Our size chart below has all the information you need regarding sizing, although if you’re unsure please drop us an email on info@marbleswimwear.com with the Subject ‘Size Enquiry’:By placing an order, you’ll be helping us fund the first collection and actively cleaning our seas. Here’s how to support our campaign and be the first to wear Ocean to Ocean this summer:
Select a perk on the right hand side to begin your order - Bikini Set or One Piece
Select the style, size and colour you would like within the Perk - you can mix and match Top and Bottoms styles, sizes and colours.
Continue on to the next page to enter shipping and finally payment information
Complete your payment via Apple Pay, Credit or Debit Card.
Orders will be dispatched in 2 week batches depending on when you order. We’ll keep you updated with how our campaign is going and when you can expect to receive your order. It should be no longer than 4 weeks after placing your order with us, and hopefully even sooner!
At Marble Swimwear, where our products are made to be enjoyed in the ocean and on the beach, we felt compelled to act responsibly to preserve this precious resource. Our intention for this collection is to bring a beautiful collection of swimwear to a generation of responsible shoppers  looking for high quality fashion with the planet in mind.Not only that, but we will be ensuring that every single element of our production is environmentally conscious. From the fabrics used through to the methods used to deliver it to you - we are committed to ensure that every decision made is done with the planet at the forefront of our minds. We believe that fashion can be beautiful, luxurious, fashion forward and environmentally friendly. By pre-ordering a piece from our collection, you'll be helping us fund the first production run of this unique collection, which quite literally cleans our seas.Please ensure that you’ve read our FAQ before reaching out to us! Backers: indiegogo@marbleswimwear.comBusiness Enquiries: sales@marbleswimwear.comPress Enquiries: press@marbleswimwear.com Thank you so much for taking the time to read our story and checking out Ocean to Ocean! We’d appreciate you sharing our exciting project with your friends!Sian & Sarah xx What does the material feel like?We promise you, you will not believe that it’s made from regenerated plastic. The material is super soft and luxurious. It’s got enough stretch but will not be baggy come the end of Summer. Not only that, but it’s super resistant to UV rays, chlorine and sun creams and oils. This is swimwear that will last. Where do these abandoned fishing nets come from?Sadly, not everyone cleans up after themselves. Fishermen will often abandon their nets because it’s the easiest way for them to get rid of them, because they are fishing illegally or due to many other factors - some of which are intentional but others that are accidental. The collateral damage of this is marine life, thousands of which are killed every year unnecessarily as a result.Recovered fishing nets are then recycled: by means of a regeneration process they are turned into new raw materials which can be used to create brand new products such as swimwear! Therefore, ocean pollution decreases with every product manufactured. What sizes does the collection come in?Currently, we are offering sizes Small, Medium and Large in every style. Please see our Size Chart for further details. I entered my address or some order details incorrectly. Can I change it?Please email info@marbleswimwear.com with Subject Title ‘Order Details - Change’ When will I receive my order?Orders will be dispatched in 2 week batches depending on when you order. We’ll keep you updated with how our campaign is going and when you can expect to receive your order. It should be no longer than 4 weeks after placing your order with us, and hopefully even sooner! What if the pieces I order don’t fit?Once the campaign is over, and we can hopefully move in to full production, we'll be in a position to exchange any orders where pieces don't fit. If you have any size enquiries, please don't hesitate to drop us an email on info@marbleswimwear.com with Subject 'Size Enquiry' so that we can try to make sure you get the right size first time!

story:
Leap 

Key Features: 

  • 20 day battery life on a full charge 
  • Always on (24/7) colour Screen
  • Reflective MIP (Memory In Pixel) Screen - Brighter Screen Under Direct Sunlight

Distributed By MedTech Wearables Inc. (www.medtechwearables.com)

Leap Into A New Paradigm Of Health & Fitness Tracking Devices

Know Yourself - Improve Yourself - Enjoy Yourself

The Leap independent GPS enabled health and fitness tracker is designed and engineered with patents held by HiCling Technology (www.hicling.com). It makes exercising and achieving your targeted fitness goals while managing your everyday health condition more rewarding. The accompanying Cling App tracks your real time exercise and health stats while providing you with fitness and general health metrics. In addition it displays your outdoor GPS positioning and travel and keeps you connected to family and friends.

20 Day battery Life

Leap utilizes ultra low power consumption technology. A single charge will support viewing of the always on Leap screen for up to 20 days of continuous use (24/7). 

Always On Colour Screen - Viewable Under Direct Sunlight

No need to tap or stroke the Leap to turn on the screen. The Leap incorporates the latest in colour screen display technology. The Reflective MIP (Memory In Pixel) screen transmits and reflects light eliminating the need for backlighting when it's being used outdoors in direct sunlight. The MIP screen also conserves battery power extend the time between battery charges to up to 20 days when the GPS is not used and for up to 7 days when using the GPS for 30 minutes per day.

Blood Pressure Fluctuation Monitoring

Leap adopts advanced optical sensor technology and vital signal processing algorithms capable of tracking your long-term blood pressure fluctuations.

Leap is NOT a medical device. To achieve optimal blood pressure fluctuation data your Leap should initially be calibrated with a medical grade blood pressure monitor. Enter your professionally taken blood pressure reading into the Leap App as a baseline for tracking your blood pressure fluctuation.

Wide Range Of Tracking Metrics

GPS - Built-in

Independent GPS; no accompanying smart phone required. GPS provides accurate distance, speed, pace and cadence measurements of your outdoor running and cycling workout.

Heart Rate Monitoring

Heart rate tracking performance is comparable to that of heart rate chest straps

Heart Rate Zone Training

Leap generates a real-time colour graph detailing 5 heart rate zones. This helps the wearer monitor their performance at a glance, enabling them to focus on targeted training goals.

Comprehensive Running And Cycling Data Collection

Once you complete your workout the Leap provides a deep analysis of your running or cycling performance, such as distance, pace, speed, cadence and average heart rate, encouraging you to discover the joy of working out.

Gym Workout Monitoring

Leap offers the wearer a variety of GYM workout activity performance tracking detailed in calories burned and real-time heart rate.

Waterproof

Leap is compatible with all your water activities

Customized Push Notifications

Leap stays connected with your smart phone and automatically notifies you of important incoming text messages, phone calls, emails, news, weather, events and alarms. 

 

Sleep Cycle Analysis

Leap has built-in automatic sleep tracking algorithms. It analyses your sleep index based on the complete spectrum of sleep cycles. 

Bluetooth Music Controls

Leap is designed with Bluetooth wireless music controls on the touch screen to help easily manage track selection and volume of your smart phone music source.

Changeable Watch Faces

Change the Leap watch face anytime and anywhere to match your mood.

Easy Magnetic Charging

Fully charge your Leap in approximately 2 hours using the easy to attach magnetic charging system.

Leap Specifications

Leap Exploded View

______________________________________________________________________________

From every Cling Leap purchased, MedTech will donate $5 to

Together, we can can create life-changing wishes for children with critical illnesses.

______________________________________________________________________________

Leap Assembly Line And Device Testing Photos:

story:
The namesake brand was founded in 2014 by a Russian born Australia based model and designer Katya Komarova and focuses on producing high-end leather accessories and basic wardrobe pieces.

In preparation for our Spring/Summer 2018 Collection Runway, we would like to enable you to pre-order some of our most favourite styles and crowd fund the upcoming collection. The production will be starting in August. The full collection will be showcased in October in Adelaide and in Moscow. Pre-orders will be sent out early November this year. Here is some more information about our available rewards to make your decision easier.

Katya Komarova stands for minimalism in life and design. All the accessories easily complement any daily outfit and make your favourite shirt or a jumper look outstanding. 

We mostly work with vegetable-tanned leather. 

Vegetable tanning is a traditional, complex and environmentally-friendly procedure. It consists of applying vegetable molecules to naturally remove the liquid from the leather, instead of using harmful chemicals that may harm the environment.

This process enhances the leather’s own unique identity, radiating rich and warm tones, whilst maintaining a natural look. 

Vegetable tanning is an intricate procedure and requires a highly-skilled craftsman. Katya Komarova’s leather pieces are handmade in our own studio in Adelaide with each product patiently moulded and crafted.

The accessory pieces can effortlessly be repaired and reused for future design; as they are produced stitch-free with the assistance of rivets and metal screws, in which they can have a longer-life-cycle. With the combination of cotton in our wardrobe pieces and bag straps, the products are created to provide comfort.

 The Corset, as worn by a NY based fashion blogger Marina Ingvarsson, during the latest NYFW.

Risks & Challenges

We hope you are as much excited about our new collection as we are! We are very looking forward to hear from you and learn more about the demand and have all the colours available in stock by the beginning of the production.

We will keep you updated the whole way through the project and are available for your questions at: info@katyakomarova.com

If you live outside of Australia, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like what we do, please share our campaign to spread the love and help us crowd fund the next collection. Thank You!

 

Special thanks for the video to Nicole Fang from thepotentialcorporate.com.

story:
Revolutionizing the sock industry! 

Solestice Socks combines the comfort of your favorite pair of socks with the support of an insole. They bring sustainable structure to the arch of your foot so you can stay active and comfortable wherever your feet take you. The stitched-in gel design is custom made to fit in your shoes or wear around the house, always providing you with the comfort you need.

 

Size Chart

 

Our Story

We created Solestice Socks because we were tired of switching our insoles from shoe to shoe and got annoyed when they wouldn’t fit! We also didn’t want to wear dirty shoes around the house to get the support we needed. We wanted something more universal and thought “Why can't the insert be in our socks?” From there we searched the web. However, we couldn’t find what we wanted anywhere. That is when we decided to design our own arch support socks! 

 

 

Foot Pain

Everyone experiences foot pain at some point in their lives. For some it is an ongoing problem. One of the biggest recommendations to combat foot pain is to wear supportive shoes. Unfortunately, most shoes don't have the support our feet need. Solestice Socks gives you that added support regardless of what shoes you are wearing. They even support your feet when you are not wearing shoes!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Are These Machine Washable?

Yes! As long as you wash our socks in cold water and dry them on low heat, it is safe to do so.

 

Patent Pending

Our patent pending, gel absorption technology combines with ergonomic sock compression to give your feet the comfort and support they need to endure the toughest conditions. Our custom gel design continuously shapes to your arch and disperses the pressure of each step by distributing it evenly and comfortably. The dual stitch pattern locks in the gel, providing non-slip, prolonged support.

 

 

Silver Fiber Thread

Silver is a natural antibacterial. For that reason, we weave our socks with silver fiber thread, which allows the silver to continuously remove bacteria and odor. We use pure silver thread so that these antimicrobial properties don't wash away and last for the lifetime of the sock. Germs and bacteria grow in dark, damp places like our shoes and socks, causing odor and irritation. Using silver fiber thread prevents the growth of these germs so you don't have to worry about your socks smelling when you take off your shoes after wearing them all day. 

​

 

 

Nonstop Arch Support

 

 

Works with All Arch Types

Everyone can benefit from wearing arch supports. With every step you take, your feet take on the weight of your body. When you walk or run, the pressure on your feet can be up to four times more than your body weight. That is why arch supports are so important. They support your feet, no matter what your arch type is, by helping distribute pressure evenly across the bottom of your foot so no one spot ever takes the full brunt of the weight.  

Our goal is to bring to life ideas that revolutionize the footwear industry. We strive to provide a new level of comfort through initiative. Our footwear unites the best qualities of your favorite socks and custom formed insoles into the perfect hybrid. Take arch support wherever you go and say goodbye to everyday foot pain! We're working each day to reach more people and introduce the innovative ideas and sustainable model of Solestice Socks to the world. Thank you for being part of our journey!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our story and new product with anyone you know who is on their feet all day: nurses, restaurant employees, athletes, construction workers, and friends and family who have foot pain. We want to get our socks on the feet of people who need them the most!

                                 

International Backers

Duties & Taxes - Please be aware that all international shipments are subject to duties and taxes by your government, and you are responsible for paying them. All Indiegogo perks will be declared “gift” however, most countries will still assess a value, and in certain cases, FedEx will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later.

story:
VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL MAS ABAJO.

STORY

Hello! We are Carolyn and Mariano the team behind Alium. We met at university 10 years ago while studying textile (Carolyn) and product (Mariano) design, and introduced Alium in 2008, a small shop in Pueblo Garzon, selling a curated collection of Uruguayan-made fashion and furnishings.

Uruguay is a fairly traditional country that has gained international attention lately. We love our traditions and materials and we saw an opportunity to show them to the world in a modern and contemporary way by re-designing our typical Ruanas, Ponchos and Blankets.

Inspired by Merino wool, one of the largest natural resources in Uruguay, we launched our own collection in 2016, a selection of ruanas, ponchos and blankets handcrafted by knitters around the country.

Our goal is to deliver a high quality product, combining contemporary design with traditional craftmanship and natural materials, and also revalue local artisans as a fundamental part of the production process, which has been set aside by mass production companies.


What we need and what you get.

After seeing the success of our first collection in 2016, we realized it was time for alium to blossom in a much bigger way. We are designing a new and bigger collection for the South American summer 2017, including Ruanas, Ponchos, Blankets, and tablewear. 

We need your help to produce our second collection for the summer 2017. In addition to the Garzon shop we are planning a small place on the square in the beach town of Jose Ignacio.

In order to make it happen we need to double our production and expand to new lines of products such as bags and ceramic tablewear.

By contributing with alium you will be helping local knitters and wool mills who work with us as outsource suppliers.

You will also help us create a strong southamerican brand which promotes and respects natural materials and local traditions.

*If we dont reach our fund goal, the money will be destined only to produce our new collection of products for this summer 2017.


Details of investment.

The money will be destined to produce your rewards, the entire collection of ruanas ponchos, blankets, ceramic tableware for next summer, and extras such as packaging, photoshoot, print catalogues, etc. 

Building a PopUp Shop in Jose Ignacio.

The rest goest to Indie gogo fees, additional costs and taxes.


The impact. 

We have a strong belief and philosophy of using local resourses in all our products. The entire manufacturing chain from raw material to finished product has been carefully selected and chosen by us.


Why Merino Wool?

Merino wool, one of URUGUAY’S biggest natural resources. Known for being one of the finest natural and renewable fiber. Its very soft, also breathable and suitable for any weather condition. It's very easy to care thanks to its natural protective layer that prevents odors and stains. Is hypoallergenic so it doesn't itch and is suitable for allergics.



Risks and Challenges  

Growing is allways a big risk, but we know we are a strong company with strong values and if we keep this path everything will be perfect!

As we work with artisans, our biggest challenge is to grow our production and be able to fulfill orders in time.

 Click here to access our secret patron area.


Who we are.

Hello! we are Carolyn and Mariano a young couple from Uruguay, we are the team behind Alium. Design is our passion and being able to combine natural fibers such as merino wool with contemporary design is what motivates us to work everyday!

We are a local brand inspired by the SLOW MOVEMENT; iniciated in Italy, this movement manifest is based in respecting the natural process of every aspect in life. Everything we sell and design is hand made with careful hands of craftmen and women.

We promote the good and simple things of life. Reading a book enjoying a tasty glass of wine, having a romantic dinner by the fireplace or a picnic with friends. Horseback riding in the countryside and enjoying a nice family “asado” .

Over the last 6 years we have selected every product, analyzed every detail to combine and create a great curated design collection from Uruguay representing its culture and values.

That’s our heritage.

If you need any further information about our project or would like to see our latest collection you can visit our website or email us at hola@alium.com.uy and we will happily answer back!

Please share our campaign with friends and consider backing us.

Thank you

Carolyn Prevett and Mariano Piñeyrua

Take a look at your rewards

Natural Ruana hand made in Merino Wool.

Measures: 130 x 120 cm.




_________________________________________________________________________

Merino blankets

Measures 140 x 180 cm




_________________________________________________________________________

Super Bulky Merino Blanket

Available Measures: Throw 140 x 180 cm| King 240 x 240 cm



 Click here to access our secret patron area.

HISTORIA

¡Hola! Somos Carolyn y Mariano el equipo detrás de Alium. Nos conocimos en la universidad hace 10 años, mientras estudiabamos diseño textil (Carolyn) y diseño de productos (Mariano), e introdujimos Alium en 2008, una pequeña tienda en Pueblo Garzón que vende una colección curada de moda y muebles hechos a Uruguay.

Uruguay es un país bastante tradicional que ha ganado atención internacional últimamente. Nos encantan nuestras tradiciones y materiales, y vimos una oportunidad para mostrar al mundo nuestras tipicas ruanas ponchos y mantas de una manera moderna y contemporánea.

Inspirado por la lana Merino, uno de los mayores recursos naturales del Uruguay, hemos lanzado nuestra propia colección en 2016, una selección de ruanas, ponchos y mantas hechas a mano por artesanas de todo el país.

Nuestro objetivo es ofrecer un producto de alta calidad, que combina el diseño contemporáneo con artesanía tradicional y materiales naturales, y también revalorizar los artesanos locales, como parte fundamental del proceso de producción, que han sido desplazados por producciones en masa.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que tu otienes

Después de ver el éxito de nuestra primera colección en 2016, nos dimos cuenta de que era hora de alium florecer de una manera mucho más grande. Estamos diseñando una nueva y más grande colección para el verano sudamericano 2017, incluyendo ruanas, ponchos, mantas y objetos de hogar.

Necesitamos su ayuda para producir nuestra segunda colección para el verano de 2017 y además de la tienda de Garzón estamos planeando abrir un pequeño local en la plazas de Jose Ignacio.

Con el fin de hacer que esto suceda tenemos que duplicar nuestra producción y expandirnos a nuevas líneas de productos tales como: bolsos y objetos para el hogar.

Al contribuir con alium usted estará ayudando a los tejedores locales y fábricas de lana que trabajan con nosotros como proveedores externos.

También nos ayudará a crear una fuerte marca sudamericana que promueve y respeta materiales naturales y las tradiciones locales.

* Si no logramos nuestro objetivo de recaudar fondos, el dinero será destinado sólo para producir nuestra nueva colección de productos para este verano de 2017.

Los detalles de la inversión.

El dinero será destinado a producir sus recompensas por haber contribuido a la causa, toda la colección de ponchos ruanas, mantas, vajilla de cerámica para el próximo verano, y extras como el embalaje, sesión de fotos, catálogos impresos, etc.

La construcción de una tienda emergente en José Ignacio.

El resto es para honorarios de la pplataforma indiegogo, costos e impuestos adicionales.

El impacto.

Tenemos una fuerte creencia y filosofía de usar recursos locales en todos nuestros productos. La cadena de producción entera desde la materia prima hasta el producto terminado ha sido cuidadosamente seleccionado y elegido por nosotros.

¿Por qué Lana Merino?

La lana merino, uno de los mayores recursos naturales del Uruguay. Conocido por ser uno de los mejores fibras naturales y renovables. Es muy suave, respira y también es apta para cualquier condición meteorológica. Es muy fácil de cuidar gracias a su capa protectora natural que evita los olores y las manchas.

Riesgos y Desafíos

Creciendo siempre se encuentra un gran riesgo, pero sabemos que somos una compañía fuerte, con valores fuertes y si seguimos este camino todo será perfecto!

A medida que trabajamos con los artesanos, nuestro mayor desafío es hacer crecer nuestra producción y ser capaces de cumplir con los pedidos tiempo y forma.

Gracias por tu tiempo!
Por favor comparte nuestra campaña con amigos y considera apoyarnos!

Carolyn y Mariano
story_txt:
VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL MAS ABAJO.
STORY
Hello! We are Carolyn and Mariano the team behind Alium. We met at university 10 years ago while studying textile (Carolyn) and product (Mariano) design, and introduced Alium in 2008, a small shop in Pueblo Garzon, selling a curated collection of Uruguayan-made fashion and furnishings.
Uruguay is a fairly traditional country that has gained international attention lately. We love our traditions and materials and we saw an opportunity to show them to the world in a modern and contemporary way by re-designing our typical Ruanas, Ponchos and Blankets.

Inspired by Merino wool, one of the largest natural resources in Uruguay, we launched our own collection in 2016, a selection of ruanas, ponchos and blankets handcrafted by knitters around the country.
Our goal is to deliver a high quality product, combining contemporary design with traditional craftmanship and natural materials, and also revalue local artisans as a fundamental part of the production process, which has been set aside by mass production companies.

What we need and what you get.

After seeing the success of our first collection in 2016, we realized it was time for alium to blossom in a much bigger way. We are designing a new and bigger collection for the South American summer 2017, including Ruanas, Ponchos, Blankets, and tablewear. 
We need your help to produce our second collection for the summer 2017. In addition to the Garzon shop we are planning a small place on the square in the beach town of Jose Ignacio.In order to make it happen we need to double our production and expand to new lines of products such as bags and ceramic tablewear.By contributing with alium you will be helping local knitters and wool mills who work with us as outsource suppliers.You will also help us create a strong southamerican brand which promotes and respects natural materials and local traditions.*If we dont reach our fund goal, the money will be destined only to produce our new collection of products for this summer 2017.
Details of investment.
The money will be destined to produce your rewards, the entire collection of ruanas ponchos, blankets, ceramic tableware for next summer, and extras such as packaging, photoshoot, print catalogues, etc. 
Building a PopUp Shop in Jose Ignacio.
The rest goest to Indie gogo fees, additional costs and taxes.

The impact. 

We have a strong belief and philosophy of using local resourses in all our products. The entire manufacturing chain from raw material to finished product has been carefully selected and chosen by us.


Why Merino Wool?
Merino wool, one of URUGUAY’S biggest natural resources. Known for being one of the finest natural and renewable fiber. Its very soft, also breathable and suitable for any weather condition. It's very easy to care thanks to its natural protective layer that prevents odors and stains. Is hypoallergenic so it doesn't itch and is suitable for allergics.



Risks and Challenges  

Growing is allways a big risk, but we know we are a strong company with strong values and if we keep this path everything will be perfect!
As we work with artisans, our biggest challenge is to grow our production and be able to fulfill orders in time.
 Click here to access our secret patron area.

Who we are.
Hello! we are Carolyn and Mariano a young couple from Uruguay, we are the team behind Alium. Design is our passion and being able to combine natural fibers such as merino wool with contemporary design is what motivates us to work everyday!

We are a local brand inspired by the SLOW MOVEMENT; iniciated in Italy, this movement manifest is based in respecting the natural process of every aspect in life. Everything we sell and design is hand made with careful hands of craftmen and women.
We promote the good and simple things of life. Reading a book enjoying a tasty glass of wine, having a romantic dinner by the fireplace or a picnic with friends. Horseback riding in the countryside and enjoying a nice family “asado” .
Over the last 6 years we have selected every product, analyzed every detail to combine and create a great curated design collection from Uruguay representing its culture and values.
That’s our heritage.


If you need any further information about our project or would like to see our latest collection you can visit our website or email us at hola@alium.com.uy and we will happily answer back!

Please share our campaign with friends and consider backing us.
Thank you


Carolyn Prevett and Mariano Piñeyrua




Take a look at your rewards

Natural Ruana hand made in Merino Wool.
Measures: 130 x 120 cm.







_________________________________________________________________________

Merino blankets
Measures 140 x 180 cm













_________________________________________________________________________



Super Bulky Merino Blanket
Available Measures: Throw 140 x 180 cm| King 240 x 240 cm


 Click here to access our secret patron area.

story:
Introducing the Infinity Handle

Infinity handle is an universal handle that fits to any travel or shopping bag. The handle's unique design will eliminate all the twisting in your wrists, caused by the fixed classic handles, and also virtually completely dampen all shocks to your arm. It's like a suspension system for your bags, only that the suspension is in your hand. 


How to install Infinity Handle

Just like in the animation below. It takes only two seconds to set-up and you will probably never get it off. 

The Infinity handle is made of three parts: a soft handle (rubber or foam), an elastic cord and a tightening disc.

The Impact

      The infinity handle acts like a suspension system for your travel or shopping bags.  Whenever your bag rotates the handle acts like a swivel and eliminations any twisting in your wrist. Because of the elastic cord any shock to your bag, due to crack and holes on the ground, are 90% dampened. When the bag bumps into something the elastic cord stretches and dampens the shock. And that make's your arm and shoulder happy. Like John here below. 

Design History

The idea, as most simple ideas, come from pain. The pain of hauling luggage through airports. I don't know about you but my arms where not made to be bumped and twisted and pulled by my nice fashion trolley. So i was often left with arm, and especially wrist pain, after my travelling. 



What We Need & What You Get

We would like to set up production for Infinity handle. It's cheaper than getting new trolleys, it can be reused in all types of existing bags and it also looks cool. And yes, you can even work out using Infinity handle (just loop it trough your foot and pull on it).

So please help us get this surprisingly simple and innovative handle to the world. We offer all kinds of nice perks. 

Support us by getting a nice T-shirt


Classic with a twist  

Get one Infinity Handle with soft rubber black handle and yellow (with black dots) cord. It's classic with a colorful cord. Nicknamed Worky Workerson.

Classic black handle 

Get your first infinity handle with classic black handle, black and yellow cord and black tension adjuster. Can be used with any trolleys or shopping bags.

Orange buddy  

Get one infinity handle, with orange soft rubber grip and blue cord. It's trendy.

Zen White 

Get one Infinity handle - with white soft rubber grip and white (with black dots) cord. It's discreet and goes on every bag.

Funky handle 

Get one Infinity Handle with soft foam grip (black with red stripes) with yellow (with black dots) elastic cord. Lot's of colors that will make your travel experience great.

By the way, here is John before using the Infinity handle.
