story:
Our Mission 

For every pair of glasses you purchase a woman will be empowered through micro financing. Some women will receive sponsorships and others Micro loans. Shantal Eyewear's style and quality can compete with most high end brands in the marketplace. We are bringing High fashion and High quality for a economical price. We are giving you the high end look and feel for a fraction of the cost; but our mission is beyond eyewear! We are here to change lives and help a group of women dreams come true. We are here to make a difference in the lives of these African Women Entrepreneurs as well as empower communities throughout the nation.

By contributing to this campaign you will be empowering 2 dreams. Myself, a woman with a fervent desire to empower her own community and transform the life of a Woman Entrepreneur in Africa. $100 equals to thousands of dollars in an developing nation. Can you imagine how many lives your contribution will change?

 

 

My Story

My name is Shantel Smith and I am a former Middle School teacher that went back to school and received a Master's Degree in Business and decided to build my own Empire. I coined myself as "The Mommy Entrepreneur". I host Empowerment Retreats and Seminars in the U.S. and also act as a Brand Ambassador for one of the leading eyewear companies in the U.S.  The time has come to build my own brand and birth my vision. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We already have prototypes of the frames and manufacturing has started. $27,000 of the Funds will go towards the completion of manufacturing the eyewear, branding and marketing. $23,000 will be allocated directly towards the Women Empowerment Fund. 50% of the $23,000 will go directly to Micro financing and the remainder to establishing our own infrastructure in Africa and travel expenses for our first several trips.  The main perks that will be given are our Elegant High Fashion eyewear. You can wear your eyewear with pride, knowing that a portion of your funds went to Empower a woman. There are also perks available for you to travel with Shantal eyewear to Africa. We also have a perk for business owners that would like to partner with us and become an official sponsor.  If we don't meet our $50,000 goal, you will still receive the perk that you chose, the date of delivery of the perk is subject to change if goal isn't met.  If we don't hit our goal, whatever amount is raised, 30% of it will go towards the Women Empowerment fund.

The Impact

The impact you will make on these women lives by contributing will be unchartered. "When you empower a Woman you empower a whole nation- Toyin Saraki".  

 

Risks & Challenges

"Whether you sport geeky chic opticals or oversized aviators, you’re advocating eyewear trends – perhaps unknowingly. True, glasses help us to see, and protect our precious eyes from the sun’s glare. But most importantly, they are everyone’s favorite accessory."-Forbes Rachel Hennessy 

Eyewear is one of the most worn accessories in fashion. Yes we utilize eyewear to see and protect our eyes from the sun but it's indeed an extension of our personality and enhances any look that you create.  Shantal Eyewear is entering a market that is trending and consumers love their eyewear!

Our team has over 25 years of experience in education, training, entrepreneurship, sales & marketing, and personal development work. My expertise as a sales rep/brand ambassador for the eyewear industry gives me a great advantage in marketing and distributing my frames all across the world. With every business opportunity there are risk. I have considered the risks and challenges and have experts and mentors on my team to assist and guide me through the pitfalls of building my business.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share us with your networks. Monetary contributions are greatly appreciated but we believe in the power of partnerships and networking. Share us on all your social media sites and share us with your email lists. We are in this together. Thank you for your support!

story:
English version down of this text.

Je suis née en Alsace, élevée par une mère célibataire employée à l’hôpital, la vie n'a pas été simple mais elle m'a fait grandir très vite. Je viens d'une génération de mères seule. J’ai très vite appris à prendre mes responsabilités et à être autonome. À 17 ans avec l'accord de ma mère je décide de prendre en main mon destin. Je pars alors vivre à Paris chez une tante que je ne connais que depuis trois mois. À 18 ans j'ai mon propre appartement et j'obtiens mon bac en alternance avec mention. Ce sera le premier diplôme dans ma famille depuis déjà plusieurs générations. J'en suis fier. La même année je signe mon CDI à la SNCF, par nécessiter. Mais 5 ans plus tard seule avec un enfant de 3 ans à charge je décide de ne pas en rester là et reprends donc la course au diplôme pour préparer un BTS en 9 mois. Septembre 2016, lors de mon stage de congé formation pour la préparation de mon BTS, j'eut une révélation. Le cosmétique bio était faite pour moi. Mais je ne voulais pas seulement en vendre, non, je voulais ouvrir ma propre boutique. Mon dicton préféré " la chance ne sourie qu'aux audacieux" 
Me voilà, après avoir murement réfléchie et potiné mon projet, je suis là pour vous proposez un nouveau style d'enseigne. Une enseigne où il fera bon vivre, je mise sur la proximité, le bien-être. Ici venez comme vous êtes ...
Je vous propose des produits locaux, made in France et de qualité supérieure (gommage, crèmes, mousse à raser, lotion visage, sérum, maquillages bio, vous y trouverez forcément votre bonheur :
- Une gamme femme;
- Une gamme Homme (les hommes aussi on droit aux produits bio de qualité)
- Une gamme pour bébé 
- Une gamme spéciale peau ébène et cheveux afro 
Le but que tout le monde se sent privilégiée et comme à la maison (The house of organic cosmetics). 
Vous vos dépayserait un esprit cocooning et chaleureux, chez nous des conseils adéquats et personnalisés, un accueil chaleureux. Le site web marchand vous permettra de personnaliser certains produits ... mais je ne vous en dis pas plus ... je mettrais les infos dès que le site sera ouvert, vous aurez l'information en avant-première.
Mes produits seront à 80% fabriqués en France, et  artisanaux. 
Vos dons m'aideront à financer ma gamme de produits , mais seront également une preuve à l'appui qu'un public attend ce type d'enseigne et de produits et renforcera la crédibilité de mon projet. Je souhaite remettre au gout du jour les produits français qui ont déjà fait preuve de qualité mais aussi pouvoir avec ma petite contribution redonner un petit grain de boost à l'économie de la France. Un petit pas pour l'homme un grand pour l'humanité ... 

I am born in Alsace, rise by a single mother employed at the hospital, life has not been easy but it has made me grow up very quickly. I come from a generation of mothers only. I very quickly learned to take my responsibilities and to be independent . To 17 Years with the agreement of my mother I decides to take in hand my destiny. I leave then live in Paris with an aunt that I do not know that since three months. To 18 years I have my own flat and I get my hightschool graduate  with mention. This will be the first degree in my family since already several generations. I am proud of it. The same year I sign my permanent contract to the SNCF, by require. But 5 years later only with a child of 3 years to charge I decided not to stay here and therefore resume the race to the diploma to prepare for a BTS in 9 months. September 2016, during my internship of leave training for the preparation of my BTS, I had a revelation. The cosmetic BIO was made for me. But I wanted not only to sell, I wanted to open my own boutique. My favorite saying "the chance does mouse that the daring"

here I am, after carefully considered and thinking my project, I am here for you propose a new style of shop. A sign where it will be good to live, I put on the proximity, the well-being. Here come as you are ...

I propose to you local products, made in France and with high quality (gumming, creams, shaving foam, Face lotion, serum, makeup bio, there you will find your happiness necessarily:

- a range for woman;

- a range for Man (men is also entitled to the bio products of quality)

- a range for your baby

- a special range ebony skin and Afro hair

the goal that everyone feels privileged and as to the home (the House of organic cosmetics).

You will travelling with a spirit cocooning and well being place, with us adequate advice and customized, a welcome. The web site  will allow you to customize certain products ... but I do you not say more ... I would put the info as soon as the site will be open, you will have the information in front-first.

My products will be at 80% manufactured in France, and crafts.

Your donations will help me to finance my range of products , because I already habe my official supplier but will also be evidence to support that a public expects this type of shop and products and will strengthen the credibility of my project. I wish to submit to the taste of the day French products which have already been evidence of quality but also power with my small contribution to restore a small grain of boost to the economy of France. One small step for man a large for humanity ...

You help is the best prouve that my product has a real interest for people and they have a real expectation. My website will also deliver in UK and not only in French so you will command as French people.

Je viens d'une génération de mères seule. J’ai très vite appris à prendre mes responsabilités et à être autonome. À 17 ans avec l'accord de ma mère je décide de prendre en main mon destin. Je pars alors vivre à Paris chez une tante que je ne connais que depuis trois mois. À 18 ans j'ai mon propre appartement et j'obtiens mon bac en alternance avec mention. Ce sera le premier diplôme dans ma famille depuis déjà plusieurs générations. J'en suis fier. La même année je signe mon CDI à la SNCF, par nécessiter. Mais 5 ans plus tard seule avec un enfant de 3 ans à charge je décide de ne pas en rester là et reprends donc la course au diplôme pour préparer un BTS en 9 mois. Septembre 2016, lors de mon stage de congé formation pour la préparation de mon BTS, j'eut une révélation. Le cosmétique bio était faite pour moi. Mais je ne voulais pas seulement en vendre, non, je voulais ouvrir ma propre boutique. Une enseigne où il fera bon vivre, je mise sur la proximité, le bien-être. story:
Story of KOJO

My name is Jana and I am mom of a 16 months old son FIlip. I am practicing contact parenting and I think breastfeeding is crucial in the early child development period. I am an active person too. My day to day life is connected with sports activity the same way as it is with food and sleep. I have always practiced running and hiking, and I love time spent outside - in nature, in any weather conditions. When Filip, my son was born, I started to carry him  in a baby-wrap. KOJO idea came up during one of my walks in nature with Filip wrapped to me. My baby was whining and I needed to breastfeed him. I found it too difficult to find and get the breast out of the tight, skinny, regular activewear I was wearing to make my newborn satisfied and calm. I started to think about combination of activewear made of perfect materials, for all kind of outdoor activities with the comfort of Tshirts designed specialy for breastfeeding mothers.

The journey from the basic idea to the final product was longer, than I expected. I had no intention to start my own brand with such a specific product. I searched the local market and later the internet, but I found nothing matching my demand.  No product did really match the design and material that I was looking for. 

After long days of struggle finally I found an ecofriendly and sustainable  family owned  local company. This company, I am partnering with is developing and manufacturing their own syntetic and wool fiber and whole production is based in Slovakia, Europe. Production process and used materials are guarantee of top quality of KOJO activewear.

All KOJO Tshirts are designed to be worn as a base layer directly on your skin. All shirts have the stretch - comfortable design similar to regular thermo activewear. They are designed to keep your back warm and cover your neck too. At that point they are available in these variations and color combinations:

KOJO POP

  • provides constant comfortable feeling during demanding physical activity
  • thanks to the low heat conductance, your body is protected against changes in temperature
  • cools down in hot conditions and warms you up during cold weather
  • convenient for all year round- general wearing as the first layer during winter or as a single layer in summer
  • I love to wear this material in gym and while jogging

KOJO MODAL

  • antibacterial,
  • reduce undesirable odor,
  • maintain biological balance on the skin during sports or recreational activities
  • smooth surface of the fiber,
  • elastic and with an amazing gloss even after repeated washings
  • available with long sleeves or short
  • I personally prefer this material in summer while hiking

KOJO MERINO WOOL

  • ability to thermoregulate,
  • air permeability,
  • ability to drain sweat,
  • antibacterial properties,
  • protection against UV radiation,
  • elasticity,
  • hypoallergenic,
  • it cools down during the summer while providing warmth in the winter
  • it keeps warmth even when wet thanks to wool

  • I highly recomend to all mothers regardless of activities they do or not. During winter is sufficient to wear only this tshirt with regular jacket and there is no need to be dressed up as an onion

Hiden idea of KOJO

There is another important idea, that KOJO as a brand represents. I would like to point on meaning and importance of breastfeeding and its benefits for babies. It  could be and should be natural and certain for every mother. KOJO eliminates all the limitations and doubts of moms in question doing sports or being full time mother.

Packaging of KOJO

If You order KOJO Tshirt You will get it in cute pouch with personal notice.

WHY is KOJO special? What mothers say about KOJO?

The Impact

KOJO is currently in state of prototype. I don’t have a team of colleagues and a proper company yet and I would not be able to move further without your help. Every donation matters to me, as this campaign determines whether or not I will continue working on other designs and products for breastfeeding active moms. Without your contributions, I cannot establish proper KOJO team and I would not be able to afford to pay for manufacturing on my own, so please donate! :-)

Goals 

  • extend the portfolio of KOJO Tshirts with new colors and materials, add complementary products (bras, legins..)
  • design limited editions of KOJO
  • keep designs and materials in local source
  • create more ready to ship items
  • KOJO eshop
  • support campaings for breastfeeding

What I Need & What You Get

With Your help I can bring KOJO to life as a real product. I would be able to get KOJO in most of the markets around the world and make lives of many mothers happier and easier. In return, you will get the first activewear T-shirt for breastfeeding mothers before anybody else for a very special price. There are super cool perks prepared for You. 

Only with Your help I can establish a real KOJO team that will assure the highest quality and help to get KOJO to every breastfeeding mother. They deserve it!

Other Ways You Can Help

If You are not mother of baby, KOJO Tshirt will be ideal present for Your friend or family. You can support us with small amount and get perfect buff-shawl as well.  Multifunctional buff- shawl with KOJO logo. Universal and versatile elastic shawl in the form of a tunnel. It is breathable, absorbs sweat, dries quickly and keeps the temperature balance. It can protect you against cold, wind or sun. SEE the Perks section- ready for You.

BUFF-SHAWL

I will apreciate if You will share this project in Your community https://www.facebook.com/KOJOactive/ .

You can support all mothers in breastfeeding because it is the best investment in to the health of their babies and don't forget to support them in practicing sport because it is the best way how to be mentaly and physicaly fit. 

Timeline

Risks & Challenges

This campaign serves as a first feedback of the real market. I am committed to deliver a great product and therefore I am open to any of your opinions on how to make KOJO even better. 

I will do my best to help my partnering factory to make sure that everything is up to the expectation if this campaign is successful. If there are any obstacles, possible delays, or limitations be sure to be informed from the first hand.

story:
Introducing: Civitas Regis Cable Hug

Are you tired of storing every single cable neat and tidy just to find it, later, shaped as a Tangela?

Well then, you're not alone!

We're Jordan and Emanuele from Civitas Regis.

We found ourselves in this situation an uncountable number of times in the past, being the cheeky little travellers that we are.

We tried using cheap, plasticky bands and other tidying mechanisms sent our way from China only to find ourselves even more frustrated than when we first started. 

We looked around us for a solution that was equally beautiful and useful. After many attempts at thinking, we realised we had a possible solution already on our hands. So we started fashioning our Civitas Regis Eco-leather into what today is the Cable Hug.

What We Need & What You Get

After months of prototyping and getting measurements, materials and final touches JUST RIGHT we are now at a point where we are ready to handcraft and ship Cable Hug to any loving owner that pledges in our campaign. 

We will be able to deliver the Cable Hug to you right at the end of this campaign. No months to wait. Pre-order everyone's favourite future Xmas gift now.

The Impact

With this campaign, we want to show Indiegogo supporters that as much as a taboo product as someone may perceive them, precious Italian exotic leather can actually be a luxurious, eco alternative to mass-produced, highly-toxic plastic cable-management systems.

Furthermore, Civitas Regis exotic leathers come only from unused scraps and clippings that other big name brands left over from their production processes. So not only will you have the pleasure of storing and tiding your cables in a stylish way; you will be able to do so in an ecological way.

BONUS: Bundle Perks

For those of you that would like to sponsor us by grabbing a full bundle of coordinated products, please look at our last 3 perks. Available for the iPhone 5/5S/SE, iPhone 6/6S and iPhone 6/6S Plus. 

Included in the Civitas Regis Bundles you will find a discounted Civitas Regis Phone Case + Coordinated Civitas Regis Cable Hug in a choice of leather type and colour of your choice (to be chosen between Lizard, Python and Ostrich).

As with every product handcrafted by the Civitas Regis team of artisans, the Phone Cases are too fashioned using only the best quality scraps of Italian exotic leather left over from other companies' production processes. 

Take a look at our Bundles preview right here as well as in the campaign's gallery:

Example of a Civitas Regis phone case in Lizard.

Example of a Civitas Regis phone case in Ostrich.

Example of a Civitas Regis phone case in Python.

Risks & Challenges

There will be no shortage-related problems as the agreements we have in place with the tanneries we are working with assure us a virtually unlimited quantity of scraps to repurpose with our company's mission.

We recognise that other tidying-bands solutions do exist out there and that, therefore, we are not creating a revolutionary, break-through product.
However, our product has many points of strength against such solutions

1. Cable Hug is made entirely using repurposed scraps of exotic leather, the most sought-after of its sector. Not only is it a precious, high-end product; it is also an ethical, ecological way to reuse the wastage of leather produced by an always-thirsty fashion market.

2. The leather we use for the Cable Hug is tanned and processed completely in Italy by families of tanners that have been doing this for many generations. The Civitas Regis Cable Hug is not only made from the highest quality leather in the world, it is also a piece of tradition and timeless history.

3. Our full range of products, of which Cable Hug represents the latest addition, is not a mass-produced, cheap plastic from China. It's uniquely crafted for you. Civitas Regis's mission to repurpose scraps and wastage of leather also makes every piece a one-of-a-kind item.

Note to Backers: We cannot be held responsible for any issues at customs which backers may experience when their prize imported into their country. Whilst we have never experienced any of our products previously being held at the customs of any country of import, and as such, it is evidently very rare, we feel it honest to remind you of this small potential risk.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't pledge, you can still help us!

Let the word out and share our campaign on your social platforms, with your family and group of friends.

 

Thanks a lot for helping us revolutionise the fashion sector!

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't pledge, you can still help us!
Let the word out and share our campaign on your social platforms, with your family and group of friends.

 
Thanks a lot for helping us revolutionise the fashion sector!

story:
The Concept

A watch is no longer just a time-displaying and measuring tool. Rather, it has become a lifestyle accessory, a “personal statement” for men, so to speak. For them, it is a major, often the only one piece of jewellery and as such, it should have a very personal touch, and express the statement of status and sophistication. The best quality materials are not enough; the watch has to have an appearance that unmistakably identities the owner as a distinct personality.

Finding none to my liking on the market, I decided to come up with my own design. As an engineer who participated in the design of complicated machinery, I knew that this task was not simple. Eventually, I came up with the one I like. More on the watch is in The Story.

 

 

 

 

Dial

Day of the month at 12 o’clock position. Luminous hands. Luminous dots at each hour above Roman numerals. GMT 24 hours time on the arc at 6 o’clock position. E and W letters indicating the bezel rotation for setting up the bezel time in a different time zone (W)est or (E)ast of your location.

Specifications:

Movement: Japan Miyota GP00 with analog display

Case: 316L Stainless Steel

Case diameter: 42.5 mm

Case thickness: 11 mm

Crown: octagon shaped, safety lock

Colour: Silver

Bezel: 316L Solid Stainless Steel

Chrystal: Sapphire Watch Chrystal, Flat

Day display aperture: Arabic numeral located under XII.

Shock resistant

Water resistant 5ATM.

Hands: SuperLuminova cover

Luminous dots at each hour on the watch face

Hours on the watch face: Roman numerals from I to XII.

Hours on bezel: Arabic numerals from 1 to 12

Bezel movement: bi-directional

Why is the choice of quartz  movement?

Even the best Swiss mechanical watches have daily variations of 7-10 seconds, or worse. If neglected for a month, this difference may accumulate to 3-5 minutes or more. We believe that constant time adjustment, winding and other maintenance chores are not for a busy professional.

Quartz movement however, does not need daily care and time adjustments. Its energy supply is a battery, which must be replaced once in a few years. In terms of accuracy, even the most expensive, high end mechanical watches are no match for quartz watches.  

We believe that everything people use, including watches, should be a blend of style, practicality and quality. That’s why La Moneta designs and produces only quartz watches, to satisfy the most demanding tastes and practical considerations.  

The Story.

My fascination with watches is decades long. In my frequent travels and business meetings, a good watch was my inseparable companion. I had a few of them, but none had all functions I desired. In my imagination, it displayed a dual time in a simple and comprehensive way, had luminous hands and marks on the dial and, above all, was beautiful, stylish, impressive and not very expensive. It seemed like too much to have in one package.

There are hundreds of watch models on the market, most of them being brand names, with extensive advertising in prominent fashion magazines and internet portals. Millions of watches are sold every year.

However, the demand for limited-edition watches is on the rise. A watch is no longer just a time-displaying and measuring tool. Rather, it has become a lifestyle accessory, a “personal statement” for men, so to speak. For them, it is a major, often the only one piece of jewellery and as such, it should have a very personal touch, and express the statement of status and sophistication. Frequent travellers may find it of particular interest. They often need to know both their local time and the time in their hometown. The difference between the two might theoretically be up to 24 hours, east or west of where they are. Although you may not travel to such exotic destinations, you still need a watch that shows multiple time zones in the most simplistic and understandable way. Our GLOBE watch gives you that and more. It will allow you to travel in comfort, knowing exactly what your local time is and the time in other locations.

Please pre-order your watch today!

Can not contribute? Please get the word out and use Indiegogo tools for discount rewards.

And, more important, have fun with our watches!

Your support.

Testing of our four pilot watches is complete. They work as expected, and there is no flaw in their appearance and performance. Now is the time for production of the first  limited edition. We need $ 45,000 to cover the remaining production expenses, delivery, taxes and duty. Your contribution will make the difference. Hopefully, you will benefit from this venture too! Don’t miss the chance to get the Globe watch at a pre-order price!

TIMELINE

Warranty.

La Moneta offers a limited manufacturer's warranty against defects in materials and workmanship for a period of one year following the original purchase date from an authorised retailer or delivery from La Moneta. If you encounter any of these issues with your watch, we will repair or replace it, subject to our inspection of the watch. The warranty does not cover normal wear and tear. Please study the warranty for details.

The warranty will be voided if you open the case back, pull the crown or rotate the bezel under water or forget to push the crown back to its closed position, thereby exposing your watch to moisture.

Cannot support us with funds? You still can help! Please share our watch with your friends on social media. And, we have created a great referral program!

$30 additional discount for each backer. It will be applied either to your next watch purchase, or money refunded via PayPal.
story_txt: The ConceptA watch is no longer just a time-displaying and measuring tool. Rather, it has become a lifestyle accessory, a “personal statement” for men, so to speak. For them, it is a major, often the only one piece of jewellery and as such, it should have a very personal touch, and express the statement of status and sophistication. The best quality materials are not enough; the watch has to have an appearance that unmistakably identities the owner as a distinct personality.Finding none to my liking on the market, I decided to come up with my own design. As an engineer who participated in the design of complicated machinery, I knew that this task was not simple. Eventually, I came up with the one I like. More on the watch is in The Story.    DialDay of the month at 12 o’clock position. Luminous hands. Luminous dots at each hour above Roman numerals. GMT 24 hours time on the arc at 6 o’clock position. E and W letters indicating the bezel rotation for setting up the bezel time in a different time zone (W)est or (E)ast of your location.Specifications:Movement: Japan Miyota GP00 with analog displayCase: 316L Stainless SteelCase diameter: 42.5 mmCase thickness: 11 mmCrown: octagon shaped, safety lockColour: SilverBezel: 316L Solid Stainless SteelChrystal: Sapphire Watch Chrystal, FlatDay display aperture: Arabic numeral located under XII.Shock resistantWater resistant 5ATM.Hands: SuperLuminova coverLuminous dots at each hour on the watch faceHours on the watch face: Roman numerals from I to XII.Hours on bezel: Arabic numerals from 1 to 12Bezel movement: bi-directionalWhy is the choice of quartz  movement?Even the best Swiss mechanical watches have daily variations of 7-10 seconds, or worse. If neglected for a month, this difference may accumulate to 3-5 minutes or more. We believe that constant time adjustment, winding and other maintenance chores are not for a busy professional.Quartz movement however, does not need daily care and time adjustments. Its energy supply is a battery, which must be replaced once in a few years. In terms of accuracy, even the most expensive, high end mechanical watches are no match for quartz watches.  We believe that everything people use, including watches, should be a blend of style, practicality and quality. That’s why La Moneta designs and produces only quartz watches, to satisfy the most demanding tastes and practical considerations.  The Story.My fascination with watches is decades long. In my frequent travels and business meetings, a good watch was my inseparable companion. I had a few of them, but none had all functions I desired. In my imagination, it displayed a dual time in a simple and comprehensive way, had luminous hands and marks on the dial and, above all, was beautiful, stylish, impressive and not very expensive. It seemed like too much to have in one package.There are hundreds of watch models on the market, most of them being brand names, with extensive advertising in prominent fashion magazines and internet portals. Millions of watches are sold every year.However, the demand for limited-edition watches is on the rise. A watch is no longer just a time-displaying and measuring tool. Rather, it has become a lifestyle accessory, a “personal statement” for men, so to speak. For them, it is a major, often the only one piece of jewellery and as such, it should have a very personal touch, and express the statement of status and sophistication. Frequent travellers may find it of particular interest. They often need to know both their local time and the time in their hometown. The difference between the two might theoretically be up to 24 hours, east or west of where they are. Although you may not travel to such exotic destinations, you still need a watch that shows multiple time zones in the most simplistic and understandable way. Our GLOBE watch gives you that and more. It will allow you to travel in comfort, knowing exactly what your local time is and the time in other locations.Please pre-order your watch today!Can not contribute? Please get the word out and use Indiegogo tools for discount rewards.And, more important, have fun with our watches!Your support. Testing of our four pilot watches is complete. They work as expected, and there is no flaw in their appearance and performance. Now is the time for production of the first  limited edition. We need $ 45,000 to cover the remaining production expenses, delivery, taxes and duty. Your contribution will make the difference. Hopefully, you will benefit from this venture too! Don’t miss the chance to get the Globe watch at a pre-order price!TIMELINEWarranty.La Moneta offers a limited manufacturer's warranty against defects in materials and workmanship for a period of one year following the original purchase date from an authorised retailer or delivery from La Moneta. If you encounter any of these issues with your watch, we will repair or replace it, subject to our inspection of the watch. The warranty does not cover normal wear and tear. Please study the warranty for details.The warranty will be voided if you open the case back, pull the crown or rotate the bezel under water or forget to push the crown back to its closed position, thereby exposing your watch to moisture.Cannot support us with funds? You still can help! Please share our watch with your friends on social media. And, we have created a great referral program!$30 additional discount for each backer. It will be applied either to your next watch purchase, or money refunded via PayPal.

story:
Elements Watch Company is a product with purpose...

 

A stylish luxury minimalist style watch that not only looks good but makes you feel good. A donation of 10% of sales go towards a charity to make a change, from Animals Cruelty, Cancer and Education. This is your chance to make a difference and look good doing it....

We are looking for funding to get the word out about the brand, gain additional funding for marketing and funding to introduce new colors for 2018 by creating new products for alzheimer's disease and supporting our troops. The goal is to have a total of 12 colors and causes by 2018 and have additional styling options.

story:
Summary

My Name is Chad Nicholas (thats me in the front of the car on my wedding day!) and I started Zerofux street wear just over 12 months ago with about $200 and not much else! I knew I wanted to do a streetwear brand and it all kind started from there, Started with 15 caps/hats which sold out, moved on to more hats and then a full summer range in December 2016 which just sold out. Now on to bigger and better things and a chance to represent NZ at Vancouver fashion week. I have also donated tees to "Unity within the community" an organisation that helps with depression and youth suicide and gave a portion of all tees sold the another mental health Charity. The more Zerofux succeeds the more I can give back and help others. I still work full time in retail along with trying to grow the brand. 

  • My Campaign is to get Zerofux Streetwear to Vancouver fashion week in march 2018 and represent New Zealand fashion. To show that you do not need a lot of money to do what you love and make things happen, and if you help people along the way it makes a big difference. 
  • To make it to Vancouver fashion week would be an amazing stepping stone to growing Zerofux and my ultimate goal of running the brand full time. I would love to be able to give funds and clothing to any charities etc for them to help those in need as well. the bigger zerofux gets the more that can happen 

 

  • I am looking for $2500 USD  each round of fundraising which in NZD is just over $11000 all up this is to go towards flights, accomodation and the entrance fee to show at Vancouver fashion week, Alot of new product will need to be made for this to make sure we show the best of the best what NZ streetwear is all about! Any money left over will go to a chosen charity. 

There are so many amazing perks up for grabs. Anybody who donates will get something for there generosity, starting at stickers and going up to limited edition numbered prints which are also framed! theres even a pack to get 12 months worth of ZF shirts! 

There will be 4 rounds of funding with a goal of $3000 each round. 

The Impact

 

  • Heading to Fashion week would absolutely launch ZF to the world stage and show off New Zealands edgy feel for streetwear, I still can not understand why Zerofux was selected but im very proud and overwhelmed. 

 

  • Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a position to contribute to contribute Do not worry! you can help. :

Share the campaign! Facebook, Instagram or twitter. anywhere! 

Don't forget to use Indiegogos share tools to help get the word out. 

Lets get Zerofux streetwear from New Zealand to Canada!

story:
Full Customisation. Sunglasses like no others. There is no reason why technical eyewear have to be ugly and cost a fortune. You can do anything with our BÆNDIT. Just lock the UNSHAKEABLE™ to your ear by bending the sides to your comfort or activity. 

      

       

1 year of prototyping, 2 years and 4 generations of BÆNDIT Sunglasses and we are ready to introduce the UNSHAKEABLE™. We perfected materials, streamlined our operations and production to come out with the only sunglasses you will ever need. 

    

Each  pair of sunglasses comprised of 5 interchangeable parts that allow for extreme flexibility. The shades can be worn loosely with ease, until they need to be transformed for a kite surfing or beach volleyball session, in which case they can be instantly moulded into any shape for maximum stability and protection.  When it’s time to store the glasses you have the option to fold them to protect the lenses and store in any small compartment, or wrap them to fit comfortably around your wrist, belt loop or anywhere. BÆNDIT’s exclusive metal and TPEE polymer core allows the glasses to take and maintain any desired shape without sacrificing quality or care. 

           

 

All BÆNDIT pieces are interchangeable and work with all BÆNDIT models, creating a customisable collection with endless combinations. You can mix and match pieces to create a completely distinct pair of sunglasses that speak to your personal needs in both fashion and function. With the collection’s patent pending structure, the glasses can be deconstructed to fit in the tightest of spaces.  In addition to this market changing design, the glasses contain the best 100% UVA and UVB protection lenses available.

 

      

One pair of BÆNDITs is made of 5 interchangeable modules, 3 fully flexible sections, 2 adjustable parts, 7 different materials, the best.

        

How strong are our lens? Not only sun protection, full impact protection too.

                

Last generation of thermoplastics materials. TR90 for the frame, TPE-EE for the skeleton cover, indestructible Polycarbonate for the lens and a core of plastic annealed Stainless Steal composite . No other sunglasses uses as many blends and materials and no other required all this effort. 

                

 

 

              

Get an extra UNSHAKEABLE™ temples and nose set for 19 USD.

    

          

     

BÆNDIT CAN MIX THROUGHOUT OUR FULL COLLECTION

              

 


All ideas start with a disappointment. For us it was “foldable sunglasses”, while the concept of reducing in size an item that needs to be carried around all day is fantastic, there was a flaw. They fold leaving the lens on the outside, unprotected, effectively rendering the whole process futile. They cannot be carried in pockets or bags without having to bring an extra case to avoid annoying scratches. For normal sunglasses is even worse, lens are unprotected, they are space consuming and get in the way when not needed. 

This got us thinking, what if the whole structure could transform at will to protect the delicate parts and adapt to various situations and needs? How could we make them them useful also when they are not on your face? Fully flexible and bendable eyewear structure was born, BÆND IT.

We then went a step further: could it be possible to make them modular too? 

A revolutionary composite structure was conceptualised so that our eyewear can be separated and recombined in 5 pieces. 3 parts to allow the flexibility and 2 to carry the best lens in the market. After a year of engineering and testing BÆNDIT was finally born. Forward another 2 years and 4 generations and we have the UNSHAKEABLE™ .

The modularity allows users to change colours and shapes to best fit your mood and style without having to buy multiple expensive sunglasses and the bendability keeps them right where you need them to be. Bændit, Revolution by Design. 

Finally the elephant in the room, how were we able to drop the prices from 120 to the current ones. 

1 Reengineering of the sunglasses. 

The first 3 generations of Bandit eyewear used a metal core with a silicon casing. This meant that the links (where the temples and nose piece attached to the solid TR90 lens frames) needed a hand welded 4 pins anchor for the temples and a hand welded 8 pins anchor for the nose piece, this costed a fortune and also was not effective as with use the silicon casing connection would wear off or worse in case of hard pressure rip, exposing the metal structure.

For the UNSHAKABLE™ we developed a TPEE composite of Polytetra-methylene glycol and Crystalline Polybutylene Terephthalate, basically hard and soft fully plastic materials so the casing for the connection provides for the anchorage system, making them 100 times stronger and resistant to wear and tear as well as a lot more cost effective to make.

 

2 Discounting development costs, engineering and material studies as well as moulds.

All of this reengineering and development costs are not embedded in the price of the sunglasses and we believe we will recoup the investment in the long run with plenty of happy customers. 

 

3 Streamlining operations focusing on direct sales.

We now have 3 production facilities and have 7 different suppliers for the “ingredients” of the sunglasses. They all work independently and the product is quality controlled assembled and packaged at the end of the chain, avoiding sourcing agents and external supply chain management companies we work directly with the factories so to avoid all extra costs added no by non production related entities. We follow the sunglasses directly from the raw materials.

 

4 Marketing.

Starting up in an environment dominated by few deep pocketed groups means that 60% of the price you pay is actually spent on  marketing.. We decided to go the opposite way and have our product speak for itself. 

 

Sincerely, 

Alessandro Schueli

story:
Where It All Started...

 

Hi! I'm Dirma and I love nature. Privasack  was born out of my love for the outdoors. The beach, the lake, the mountains... outside is where I've always loved to be! I also happen tothink that everyone should spend as much time in nature as possible; it's good for the soul! So I never miss an opportunity to feed my spirit, by taking in as much of this beautiful world at every chance I get. But all that outdoor playing left me very disappointed with options to change out of my play clothes.  That's why I created Privasack: to provide quick, portable privacy for all of us!

This crowdfunding campaign is for the purpose of creating a new and improved version of Privasack. I want to also increase production so we can have a major re-launch of the new Privasack 2.0 just in time for Spring/Summer 2018.

 

 

 

 

 

Privasack is...

Privasack is made of colorful, durable Nylon, flexible stainless steel (the key to it keeping its shape while in use) and an elastic opening at the top for ease of entry and exit. There are no zippers, no pockets, no buttons, no strings or pulleys...just a simple enclosed sack with an opening at the top for you to get in, get changed, get out, and get on with it!

The images you are seeing are of the original prototype. With the new design, you will get a wider, roomier base with lots of extra space to change, giving you comfort and confidence. Our Patent Pending design is the only one with an completely enclosed base, which ensures that your change of clothes remain clean and dry inside the sack.

Privasack can be enjoyed by men and women of all ages...we are even working on a design for parents to assist small children who can't change themselves.

 

This Is Why We Launched This Campaign:

As happy as we are with the current version of our product, we have identified the areas where we can make Privasack even better: 

1. Mass Production: If we produce a massive amount of product, our production cost will go down and we will gladly pass down that savings to you! More product + Lower Price = More people can enjoy Privasack everywhere! Note: By joining our campaign, you are guaranteed to pay an even lower price than the reduced price we are hoping to achieve; so get your Privasack TODAY at the lowest price possible!

2. New, roomy design: We think that by expanding the base and body, more people will feel comfortable using Privasack for all their public changing needs. We will also introduce new colors: our customers let us know that they prefer simple, darker colors to ensure even more privacy as they changed. We will keep the popular Hot Pink and Deep Blue Sea, and add Black Onyx and Forest Green. We love to listen to our awesome customers to give you what you want!

3. Increase outreach: With the funds we acquire, we will also be able to use social media in a more powerful way to spread the word about Privasack. Every time folks hear about Privasack they get excited and often say "I've been needing this my whole life!" With social media, not only can  we reach out to the people who would most enjoy this product, but we can engage with you in a more personal way by getting to know our customer and finding ways to make Privasack even more of what you want! We want to reach more people so everyone, everywhere, can say "I've been needing this my whole life!"

By contributing to this campaign not only will you get to own this amazing product which gives you the freedom to change anywhere (If you contribute at the purchase levels), but you will also have the satisfaction of knowing that you made it possible for Privasack to reach more people!

What We Are Asking and What We Will Do With the Funds:

We are asking for a total of US $20,000. This, in the simplest of terms, will be distributed as such:

  • 12,000: To increase production of the new and improved Privasack.
  •  8,000: Improved social media engagement and an outreach campaign to identify a production or licensing partner. This will allow us to go above and beyond our current expansion goals.

If we were so lucky as to exceed our requested amount, we could expand production even further and go on to hire a small staff to make the process even more efficient. The more we raise, the more we can achieve! NOTE: WE GUARANTEE WE WILL DELIVER YOUR ORDER, REGARDLESS OF HOW MUCH WE RAISE. PROMISE!!!!

 

Here Are The Perks:

Currently, we have 4 Perk levels:

  1. The Benefactor ($10): Anyone who, instead of making a purchase, would rather give $10 to our campaign, will receive a shoutout on our "Benefactors Wall" in the new and improved website, which will launch no later than April, 2018.
  2. The Nature Lover ($25): At this level you will receive one (1) of the brand new re-designed Privasacks, complete with its knapsack and packaging, at a savings of 28%.
  3. The Friendly Adventurer ($35): At this level you will receive two (2) of the brand new re-designed Privasacks, complete with their knapsacks and packaging, at a savings of 35%.
  4. The Generous Adventurer (45): At this level you will receive three (3) of the brand new re-designed Privasacks, complete with their knapsacks and packaging, at a savings of 42%.

 

Project "Love-A-Sack"

 

At one of our promotional events, we were approached by a very nice lady who informed us that she was homeless. She said "Privasack would be perfect for homeless people, because we are always looking for a private place to change clothes." That conversation lit a spark within us and gave us a grand mission: The Love-A-Sack Project, where we will partner with and share part of our proceeds with organizations that assist and seek to house people in need of shelter. We are honored to have this mission! Think about it: Privasack is a solution for what is very much a First World Problem. I started this company because I love the outdoors and figured it would be awesome to make a living doing something I love. But now, with this project, this is more than a fun job: there is real passion and purpose behind it now, and we are all really blessed to do this. We will keep you informed about the strides we make with this project. Stay tuned!

 

Help Us Reach Our Goal!!

Here is something everyone who is reading this can do: SHARE! SHARE! SHARE! Please share this campaign with your friends, family, contacts, ANYONE! Not only will you help our little company grow to its lofty goals, but you will be making a real difference in the lives of many people!

Thanks, from the bottom of our hearts!

We want to reach more people so everyone, everywhere, can say "I've been needing this my whole life!"
By contributing to this campaign not only will you get to own this amazing product which gives you the freedom to change anywhere (If you contribute at the purchase levels), but you will also have the satisfaction of knowing that you made it possible for Privasack to reach more people!
What We Are Asking and What We Will Do With the Funds:
We are asking for a total of US $20,000. This, in the simplest of terms, will be distributed as such:

12,000: To increase production of the new and improved Privasack.
 8,000: Improved social media engagement and an outreach campaign to identify a production or licensing partner. This will allow us to go above and beyond our current expansion goals.

If we were so lucky as to exceed our requested amount, we could expand production even further and go on to hire a small staff to make the process even more efficient. The more we raise, the more we can achieve! NOTE: WE GUARANTEE WE WILL DELIVER YOUR ORDER, REGARDLESS OF HOW MUCH WE RAISE. PROMISE!!!!
 
Here Are The Perks:
Currently, we have 4 Perk levels:


The Benefactor ($10): Anyone who, instead of making a purchase, would rather give $10 to our campaign, will receive a shoutout on our "Benefactors Wall" in the new and improved website, which will launch no later than April, 2018.

The Nature Lover ($25): At this level you will receive one (1) of the brand new re-designed Privasacks, complete with its knapsack and packaging, at a savings of 28%.

The Friendly Adventurer ($35): At this level you will receive two (2) of the brand new re-designed Privasacks, complete with their knapsacks and packaging, at a savings of 35%.

The Generous Adventurer (45): At this level you will receive three (3) of the brand new re-designed Privasacks, complete with their knapsacks and packaging, at a savings of 42%.

 

Project "Love-A-Sack"
 
At one of our promotional events, we were approached by a very nice lady who informed us that she was homeless. She said "Privasack would be perfect for homeless people, because we are always looking for a private place to change clothes." That conversation lit a spark within us and gave us a grand mission: The Love-A-Sack Project, where we will partner with and share part of our proceeds with organizations that assist and seek to house people in need of shelter. We are honored to have this mission! Think about it: Privasack is a solution for what is very much a First World Problem. I started this company because I love the outdoors and figured it would be awesome to make a living doing something I love. But now, with this project, this is more than a fun job: there is real passion and purpose behind it now, and we are all really blessed to do this. We will keep you informed about the strides we make with this project. Stay tuned!
 

Help Us Reach Our Goal!!
Here is something everyone who is reading this can do: SHARE! SHARE! SHARE! Please share this campaign with your friends, family, contacts, ANYONE! Not only will you help our little company grow to its lofty goals, but you will be making a real difference in the lives of many people!
Thanks, from the bottom of our hearts!

story:
THE I AM KREYOL WOMAN IS FREE.
 

I Am Kreyol is a fashion brand with a focus on quality and superior design. Our goal is to make you feel empowered and beautiful through our garments, while empowering artisans in Haiti (where we draw our inspiration) with a means of sustainability and creativity through fashion production.

THE I AM KREYOL WOMAN IS STRONG.

 

 

 

 

The Lotus Collection represents the lotus flower and its audacity to grow in unfavorable environments. It illustrates a woman’s tenacity to be strong, resilient and powerful in the midst of adversity. It represents YOU!

ITEMS AVAILABLE FOR PRE-ORDER:

 

  

           

 

                                         

 

 

 

 

 

 

My mother, Yolette Fontaine,  and I left a beautiful life in Haiti in the midst of political unrest in the late 80s when her fashion boutique was burned down. She lost everything and had to begin again. 

Over these past few years, we have been creating, with a goal to maximize and grow the I Am Kreyol fashion brand. Our mission is simple. We seek to empower women to change their narrative and create the life they envision. I Am Kreyol is a fashion brand with a purpose- a movement. Our garments are made to enhance our customer's inner beauty and sense of confidence while impacting the lives of women back home. We are seeking to produce our garments in Haiti to work with skilled artisans to provide the opportunity for sustainable income and creativity in the workforce.

In the past, Haiti was known for their expertise in garment production, embroidery, and accessory design. There has been a great deal of progress in the country in the past eight years after the earthquake. Haiti has transitioned from a post-disaster era to a period of reconstruction and development, slowly closing the 70% unemployment gap. Thousands of needed jobs have been created in the growing export apparel sector. With the HOPE Act (Haitian Hemispheric Opportunity through Partnership Encouragement Act), I Am Kreyol will be able to take advantage of duty-free treatment of select apparel imports from now until September 30th, 2025, which would cut down costs tremendously. Working with our production partner, Tribes of Joseph, this would allow us to work with Haitian artisans at a fair working wage, providing the best quality garments for our customers and continuous income for sustainable living for our workers.

 

YOU are Kreyol! Kreyol is anyone who embodies boldness, color, and authenticity. It is for any and everyone with a story of overcoming- a story of resilience. When you wear our garments, it not only makes you feel powerful but also reminds you of your inner warrior.

What is YOUR story? How did YOU overcome? What makes YOU Strong? Resilient? Free?

What makes you Kreyol?

 

I Am Kreyol is dedicated to bringing you the best quality product in a timely fashion. But, with any project, there is always a possibility of mishaps or delays. The funds raised via this pre-order campaign will go toward manufacturing expenses, production, and associated costs. But, there may be some surprises along the way.  If this happens, the I Am Kreyol team is committed to remaining completely transparent and keeping you in the loop of any developments- good and/or bad. We have a great relationship with our manufacturing partner and have complete faith in the process. But, our overall goal is to deliver a superior, quality product that will not only represent our brand but also enhance your core values.

 

We completely understand that not everyone will be able to contribute monetarily to the campaign. Not a problem. We Thank You and appreciate you taking the time to check out I Am Kreyol. Please consider helping in these alternative ways:

  • Share the campaign with your friends, colleagues, and affiliates via your social media
  • Go a step further and create a short clip on social media about YOUR story? How did YOU overcome? What makes YOU Strong? Resilient? Free? What makes YOU Kreyol? Then tag us at #IAmKreyolCampaign for a chance to be featured on our social media platforms.

 

Thank you so much for your time and your contribution!

Share the campaign with your friends, colleagues, and affiliates via your social media
Go a step further and create a short clip on social media about YOUR story? How did YOU overcome? What makes YOU Strong? Resilient? Free? What makes YOU Kreyol? Then tag us at #IAmKreyolCampaign for a chance to be featured on our social media platforms.

story:
The Problem

With increasing prices in men's clothing, buying high quality apparel through a respected brand is becoming more and more difficult today for the average man. Popular Surf, Skate, and Athletic brands hold a monopoly on Mens clothing; and because there is such a high demand, companies raise their prices without creating better products.

Our Solution

Aarose offers a business model that gives the consumer a brand that they can love and wear every day; as well as sell independently with reasonable margins. We focus on the consumer which in this case is both the buyer and the seller. The easier it is to help the consumer wholesell our clothes, the more in turn he will be able to buy himself. This creates a win-win partnership as well as a culture centered around self-sufficiency and unity

Why Help Us

Backing this project will:

  • Jump-start an opportunity to disrupt the way mens apparel is bought and sold
  • Create thousands of jobs
  • Push mens apparel to become more innovative and quality oriented rather than brand oriented

Mutually Beneficial 

We need $4000 to start up phase one of the operation. Starting at custom designed T-shirts, Shorts, and Hats we can then begin to bring on individual whole-sellers (regular people) to market, sell, and advertise the product itself. All who contribute will receive a personal thank you, as well as email updates explaining the progress of the first and later phases. They will also be the first to be offered wholeselling positions, and some may participate in decision making activities and corporate level positions. 

Risks & Challenges

Though the ultimate goal is to create new jobs and improve the American economy as a whole, there is no guarantee that it will be a success. In order for this to happen Aarose must transition from a novice indie type company into a full cooperation. We plan on doing this by scaling our business one step at a time, through hard work and determination, and by placing all equity and profit back into the company and it's representitives in order to reach our big picture.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share

 

 

 

My name is Tanner Behrens, I am 21 years old, currently a student studying at Brigham Young University - Hawaii, majoring in business. I am an athlete, an entrepreneur, a salesman, and an enthusiast. I believe in change and welcome it.

Cost Breakdown

It is projected that about 50% of the funds created through this campaign will go toward the materials, shipping, and miscellaneous costs of the rewards. We want backers for life. The rest will go towards the cause, further explained below.

Rewards:

35% of the money contributed to this campaign will go towards the rewards that will be made and distributed. All of these rewards will be well-made and of good material for the satisfaction of our backers.

Shipping:

Our rewards will be shipped all throughout the US in a timely matter. Shipping costs will vary with each individual order and product; but roughly 10% of the money raised will go towards shipping.

Miscellaneous:

Miscellaneous items include: Airfare and AirBnb stay for the trip to Hawaii perk, miscellaneous fabrics, tape, markers, advertising, and other items of little significance that will effect the overall net gain.  

Investments: 

All of the money that is not spent in rewards, shipping, and Miscellaneous items will go towards the company in materials cost, graphic design, advertising, and the overall basic investment to scale the company. No amount of money will go towards the salary of any individual. Anyone who adds to our email list will get live updates on how the money raised is used as well as the profits and losses.

Rewards Timeline:

All rewards will be shipped during the month of April 2018, the trip to Hawaii for surfing lessons for three lucky supporters will be done during the month of September in 2018, more details on the trip will be announced privately through email.

Project Timeline:

Launch Wednesday February 28th 2018

Launch Ends Wednesday March 31st 2018

Orders Ship Monday April 2nd 2018

Trip to Hawaii Surf Lessons begin September 2018

story:
"Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced." 

-James Baldwin

Black Beasts is a reality-based narrative where black people exist as the animals racists believe us to be, as a metaphor for how we’re still seen as the “other". It is a world where black people can exist as emotional beings, embodying centuries of mental, physical, and emotional abuse as well as our resilience and strength. 

THEMES

  • Construct of Race
  • Grotesque Black Body
  • Primitive Savagery vs Civilized Humanity
  • Folk Belief

The Black Beasts installation will display the following deliverables: 

  • 6-8 Wearables, 2-4 Looks
  • Shoe Prototype
  • Fashion Product: Shifting 2.0 Wig
  • Scent
  • Black Beasts Soundtrack/ Playlist
  • Giant Narrative Lookbook
  • Presentation Set

Money raised will fund the following materials needed for full Black Beasts production:

  • Human/Blend hair
  • Reused furs + leathers
  • Silicone molding supplies
  • Misc. Sewing supplies 
  • Printing + Publishing
  • Shoe prototype production
  • Presentation set fabrication
  • Paying talented collaborators + production staff (videographers, photographers, colorists, editors, publishers, makeup artists, etc)

THE IMPACT

So far I've been able to create my visions with quality production with the help of my talented and generous friends. What you've seen is only scratching the surface! By achieving my fundraising goal, I'll be able to bring my ambitious ideas to life and bring my audience an outstanding and memorable experience. If backed, this project has the power to become something even bigger post-graduation. If I'm unable to complete all of my ideas by my thesis presentation deadline, I will continue to develop them after. I have hopes that its power will inspire others to use their talents and imagination to demand change. 

HELP ME WIN!

Some risks and challenges that exist with the production of this project are:  because it is about race, which is the elephant in the room in America, some companies and individuals are apprehensive when it comes to sponsoring/supporting me. With your help, we can overcome this fear of addressing the race issues that exist so heavily in our society. 

ANYTHING HELPS

Any and all expressions of support are greatly appreciated! Even just sharing this project is helping me out. Accepting resource + material donations. Please don't hesitate to contact me about more ways to support!

story:
20 years of watch collecting opened our eyes to the amazing varied world of watches. For our first watch, Jump Over The Moon, we looked back at our collections and set out to create an exciting classic design. We're proud to be able to be able to add Jump Over The Moon to the world of watches.

 

As seen on

 

__________________________________

Got a question?? We ove to talk

Send us an email to sales@maals.co.uk 

 

Risks and challenges 
Delivery time: In manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfil orders on time. We're working closely with a manufacturer that is very professional and organised, to make sure production goes smoothly. In any case, we will do what we can to deliver before the expected delivery dates! 

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster. 

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!

story:
The Positivity Bracelet Story

I want to talk about an issue that is not getting enough attention. I want to talk about mental health. It seems that today, mental health is more stigmatized than ever despite the rise in teens who have mental health disorders. Today, 1 in 5 teenagers have a diagnosable mental health disorder. Only HALF of those teens ever receive the treatment they need. Suicide is now the THIRD leading cause of death in teenagers behind car accidents and homicide. Something has to change.

 

Why the sudden rise? What’s different today that is causing this dramatic rise in mental illness?

 

This sudden rise in mental illness can be attributed to a couple of causes. The most recognizable of these causes is the stigmatization of mental health in general. Let me elaborate on that. It seems that today more than ever, we think of mental health in a negative light. When somebody mentions mental illness, we automatically associate it with a serious illness. We often dehumanize people who are actively admitting their disorder and are reaching out for help. What kind of position does this put 20% of our youth in? The result is a vicious cycle. Suicides rise, we cast mental health into an even darker light, and the stigma grows deeper. More teens are looked at as mental cases instead of human beings. This NEEDS to change.

 

How can you join the cause?

 

I will be donating 2 dollars out of every bracelet sale to Mental Health America, an organization dedicated to raising awareness for mental health. That’s over 10% of each sale. The biggest impact my brand is going to have is reducing the stigma on mental health. I want to make anxiety and depression something that we can openly talk about with our friends and family so that if someone needs help, they can find it easier. As the problem stands today, young adults feel as though they can’t talk about how they’re feeling. They’re afraid of being cast out and looked down upon and they should not have to be.

 

When you wear a Positivity Bracelet, you’re joining our cause. You’re actively standing up against the stigma on mental health and teen suicide. Pat yourself on the back, you’re helping fight an issue that has gone unnoticed for far too long. The teenagers of today are the FUTURE of our nation and society is not doing enough to help them.

 

Together, we are going to change how we think of mental health.

 

Join the movement.

Why do I need the support?

I want to grow this brand to radically change the way our society talks about mental health. If I hit my goal, I'll be able to expand this message and continue raising money so that those who need treatment can receive it.

The Impact

Together, we are going to CHANGE the way people discuss their personal mental health. Teenagers should be able to discuss their feelings openly without feeling like they're being dehumanized or judged.

Risks & Challenges

Designing this bracelet has proven incredibly difficult. I went through countless prototype phases before I found a design that was unique and minimalist, yet modern. I wanted to design a bracelet that was not loud and obnoxious, but provided a simple positive reminder to anyone who wears it. Aside from the design struggles I went through, I spend a good amount on the prototyping and the logo. I have been pouring everything I have into the Positivity Bracelet project, spending as much time as possible, every day, for many months. Funding this project has been a goal of mine since I began.

 

All bracelets will be handmade by myself in the USA.

Sizing: Our sizes range from XS to XL. Our XS fits a 6 in circumference wrist and our XL fits a 10 in circumference wrist. Our sizes increase incrementally by 1 in circumference (ex. 7 in for S , 8 in for M)

 

Video Production:

All filming and production was done by Nick Reuter

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuCDwnL0xZayBu...

Instagram: @_nickreuter_

Twitter: @_nickreuter_

Designing this bracelet has proven incredibly difficult. I went through countless prototype phases before I found a design that was unique and minimalist, yet modern. I wanted to design a bracelet that was not loud and obnoxious, but provided a simple positive reminder to anyone who wears it. Aside from the design struggles I went through, I spend a good amount on the prototyping and the logo. I have been pouring everything I have into the Positivity Bracelet project, spending as much time as possible, every day, for many months. Funding this project has been a goal of mine since I began.
 
All bracelets will be handmade by myself in the USA.
Sizing: Our sizes range from XS to XL. Our XS fits a 6 in circumference wrist and our XL fits a 10 in circumference wrist. Our sizes increase incrementally by 1 in circumference (ex. 7 in for S , 8 in for M)
 

Video Production:
All filming and production was done by Nick Reuter
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuCDwnL0xZayBu...
Instagram: @_nickreuter_
Twitter: @_nickreuter_

story:
What is ORAMA?

Our story begins when Nicholas Metropulos received news of his mother’s diagnosis of terminal cancer. After noticing the effects of the illness and eventually the inevitable, he realized that everyone has a limited amount of time in their life. He then decided to embark on a mission... A mission that would inspire thousands and give to millions. His mission was to support as many causes as possible within his lifetime. At the time he was a typical college student with little time nor resources to give substantially to these causes. So, he decided to develop a product that empowers individuals to support their favorite causes and remind them to always live in the moment. Thus, ORAMA Watches was born.

ORAMA meaning “vision” in Greek, is a social watch brand founded on sole purpose of living in the moment and giving back. For every watch sold, we empower you to make one donation to a cause of your choice at no extra cost.

#jointhevision


 

Our Vision

We have spent the past couple of months working with leaders in the industry to come up with an affordable, stylish, and charitable watch collection that everyone will love.

When designing this collection, we made sure of four details:

  • A MINIMALIST look that could be worn in a casual or professional setting.
  • The HIGHEST QUALITY materials.
  • Offering the watches at a price LESS THAN HALF of what our competitor's sell at.
  • And most importantly, providing the power to MAKE A DIFFERENCE.

 

 

The VISIONARY Collection

For our first collection, we are offering FOUR different models to choose from:

 

 

This limited-edition collection will support GlobalGiving, a nonprofit organization that provides smaller nonprofits from Afghanistan to Zimbabwe (and hundreds of places in between) access to the tools, training, and support they need to be more effective and make our world a better place.

 

Backed with a Warranty

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we urge you to send it back to us. Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

Warranty does not cover:  

  • The life of the battery 
  • Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of nonmetallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) 
  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 

 

 

Where are we headed?

We want a create full line of different types and styled watches that stay at an affordable price while giving back to the causes that you love. So, join with us to make this vision into a reality. We will send out several updates throughout the entire production process to make sure our supporters are properly informed on any vital information. In the future we hope to expand our collections to included various cause areas that will coincide with the color of the face of the watch such as:

(WHITE)

 

 (GREEN)

 

(RED)

 

 (BLUE)

 

 (BLACK)

 

Become a VISIONARY Today!

In order to turn this vision of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our amazing watches but sharing the story with a friend. We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal. If you could do something as simple as liking us on Facebook or tweeting about us, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top ^ of the page, right next to the video.

 

 

Watch Specifications

For Him

  • Case Material: Zinc Alloy, Stainless steel back case
  • Case Diameter: 45mm
  • Face Diameter: 40 mm
  • Band Material: Genuine Leather
  • Band Width: 22.5 mm
  • Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
  • Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass
  • Display: Analog
  • Movement: Japanese Miyota Precision Quartz Movement
  • Water Resistance: 3 ATM

 

 

For Her

  • Case Material: Zinc Alloy, Stainless steel back case
  • Case Diameter: 40mm
  • Face Diameter: 35mm
  • Band Material: Stainless Steel
  • Band Width: 20mm
  • Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
  • Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass
  • Display: Analog
  • Movement: Japanese Miyota Precision Quartz Movement
  • Water Resistance: 3 ATM

 

 

If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

We've tweaked the initial prototype, finalized our design, purchased the molds and selected an exemplary manufacturer in the industry. Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production. Production time takes roughly 30 days depending on the quantity of the order. Our team will then ship the orders directly to you, the visionaries! We have past experience with shipping other fashion accessories which should make for a very smooth process. 

 

 

Our Business Model

Our business model consists of the selling our high-quality watches, without charging a luxury markup. By skipping the traditional channels of distribution and making efficiency improvements, we are able to re-invest part of our profits in the creation of a more sustainable supply chain. In order to reduce the environmental impact of our high-quality watches, we will require certificates of social and environmental sustainability from our suppliers.

 

 

 

Meet the Team

We are a team of students from Boston, Massachusetts who share common values and interests: fashion, design, and most importantly giving back.

 

 

IT’S TIME TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE

From all of us here at Orama Watches, Welcome to the Vision!

story:
World population is on increase, but land doesn't. Local communities are thus forced to encroach steep slopes for farming.

RESULTS? high soil erosion.River pollution both by siltation and leaching. Steep Slopes are not sustainably productive and this leads to poor yields and thus the farmers end up incurring losses.

Green Nettle Textile team chose to see an opportunity where others saw a challenge. Demand for clothing increases with the high population growth in the continent. Producing these in a conservative way is a gateway to a sustainable future. Our solution is simple yet groundbreaking: work with Mother Earth, not against her.

 

Stinging nettle which is native in these areas is a true survivor, requiring just a bit of sun, a little amount of water, and whatever soil already exists. In return, the plant grows stalks that can be transformed into quality eco-fabric. Better still, process leftovers can be converted into different commercial products. This revolutionary approach will provide jobs and nutrients to over 200,000 smallholder farmers across Kenya. The project is also easily scalable.

 

 

Nettle is an exciting alternative to conventional fabric, and it’s avant-garde in spirit: while the name suggests itchiness or stickiness, it is actually smooth, luxurious, and very elegant. Take the sting out of sustainability...support the forward-thinking creatives of “Green Nettle Textile” today.

 

 

Apart from environmental conservation {growing stinging nettle on the steep slopes offer cover crop preventing erosion)and livelihood improvement,the initiative offers more benefits. Stinging nettle conserves biodiversity by habitating different insects and animals with endangered Aberdare Chameleon being important in our beachhead region
Stinging nettle is a multipurpose plant, the green nettle textile concentrates on stalks for fibre extraction, nettle leaves and the shoots are directed for use in cosmetics and alternative nutrition industries.

 

 

Our project has benefits beyond the current generation. With the success in nettle eco-fiber production, we will reduce the need for conventional fibre and in turn the amount of greenhouse gases produced during conventional fiber production. Our eco-fiber is dyed using natural plant dyes.

We go beyond fashion, Nettle leaves can be processed to extract organic fungicides and fertilizers.

We contribute to a healthy population. Nettle is a hardy crop and the only remaining vegetable during an extended dry spell. This helps in fighting micro starvation during this period.

Nettle is high in iron. Dry nettle shoots can be used as part of relief food as an iron supplement. With the high concentration of beneficial phytochemicals, nettle for long has been used in animal and human alternative prophylactic medicine.
