story:
ABOUT ALIK & CO.

In an age of cliché fashion, our goal is to stand out and be known for our truly minimal design.

Our watches are uniquely crafted to pioneer a change in the fashion industry. We sought to design a masterpiece that would redefine minimalist and affordable watch fashion. Each watch is equipped with interchangeable straps, a limited two-year warranty, and a sapphire crystal glass. Our clean and contemporary design is suitable for any occasion and lifestyle.

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP US!

With your contribution, we will be able to grow our product supply and increase our advertisements. Advertising is a critical aspect in generating brand awareness. With your help, we can become a globally-recognized brand!

Your contribution is not free, which is why we will gift you one of our luxurious timepieces of your choice at a fraction of our retail price. Unlike other brands, we already have our products in stock and your shipment will arrive to you after the completion of this campaign! 

We will divide your contribution into 3 parts:

1. Marketing: This is our weakest point in our current model. We are restricted in advertising due to limited funds and this hinders our product visibility globally. By increasing our marketing, we are confident that we will be able to establish a larger following and interest in our products.

2. Resupplying: Maintaining a a supply of each watch design is critical to maintaining customer satisfaction. With some watches generating more interest, these models will go out of stock before other models. Restocking one model is difficult at our current production rate. We want to use your contribution to help us resupply our models so that we never have to say no to our customers!

3. Attending New York Fashion Week: ALIK & CO. has been given an opportunity of a lifetime! We have been invited to walk the runway at New York Fashion Week (NYFW) this September. However, as an emerging brand, we do not have sufficient funding for the trip, which includes runway participation fee, airfare, hotel, and extra tickets to the shows for our team. The purpose of attending NYFW is to raise brand awareness and establish critical industry connections.

To become a recognizable brand, we need to invest a minimum of $10,000 annually into marketing.

Restocking our products will cost $15,000.

Attending New York Fashion Week will cost $5,000.

 

Our ultimate goal is to raise $30,000. However, through our Indiegogo campaign, we are hoping to raise at least $15,000, which we will distribute accordingly between our three above mentioned objectives.

 

WATCH SPECIFICATIONS

Case Material:  Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 41 mm
Face Diameter: 40 mm
Bezel Width: 2.5 mm
Band Material: Stainless Steel or Leather
Band Width: 24 mm
Clasp: Tang Buckle
Clasp Material: Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal Glass
Display: Analog
Movement: Japanese Quartz
Interchangeable Strap: Yes

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

If our Indiegogo campaign experiences a greater than expected demand for products, we will need to restock our products. In this case, we will need between 3-5 months to restock and process orders.

In some cases, our watches may sell out, and we might not raise enough funds to restock, but we will have another one of our products in stock which we will offer you in exchange for your pledge. If you do not like any of our other models that are available, we can discuss alternative options such as refunds.

The main idea is that once our funding is at an adequate level, we will have the ability to produce larger quantities of our products. Although this may take time, it will happen and we ask that you have faith in us and our good intentions.

Unlike other brands, we have a trusted and long-time relationship with our manufacturer who we have been working with for over a year! Resupplying will be easy as we have already worked with and maintain contact with our supplier!

Thank you for taking the time to read about our campaign and our goals.

story:
Lucy Fragrances

 

Something old, something new. Our perfume connects the past and the present so we can move into the future.

In the ancient world, people used plants to extract different scents and wear them. Wearing these scents was a sign of cleanliness and beauty. It was also believed that there were medicinal values of putting on perfume. For instance, Lavender was used to reduce anxiety and Frankincense was used as an antiseptic. Now, the science supports what our ancestors have known for thousands of years. 

Made from 100% natural and organic ingredients, Lucy is made from blends of fresh citrus, oriental warm notes and tropical flowers to create the perfect harmony. Our carefully curated blends of natural fragrances will have you smelling naturally beautiful.

About Us

We are a couple of young women who are deeply passionate about creating an authentic product that represents the place we call home, Ethiopia.  Edom is a Biochemistry graduate shifting gears into the world of business. Senait is a Marketing and Management graduate with experience working with several businesses in Ethiopia. Together we make a strong team that is able to take on diverse challenges and successfully overcome them. 

Why you should fund Lucy

We plan on manufacturing our perfumes from start to finish in Ethiopia. We will use the profits we earn from this phase to start our long term goal of locally producing all the ingredients we require to create our perfumes. Ethiopia is rich in land and resources that are used in the cosmetic industry. However, the country mainly exports these raw materials for a small price and imports perfumes for a much higher price. If we can add value by processing the raw materials we can decrease the amount of imports and hence foreign currency spent outside. 

Our perfume will be one of the few perfumes made in Africa and the first natural perfume made in Ethiopia. So let’s make history together!

 

What the funds will pay for

We have already made several different scents and we are loving them, and can’t wait to share them with all of you. In order to start making more, we need more supplies like perfume bottles, different ingredients, mixer machines, and packaging materials. 

In funding this project, you will get the first whiff of our perfume before it hits the market. And at the $200 level you'll even get to provide input that will be incorporated into the final scent and have your name engraved on the bottle you receive. Even if we don't reach our intended funding goal of $2,000, what we do raise will bring us closer to being able to get started.

 

OTHER WAYS TO CONTRIBUTE

Even if you can't contribute, you can still help:

By getting the word out on Twitter, Facebook, and email blasts.

There are also Indie go go share tools to help you out!

Thank you so much for all the help you give us!

story:
Where'd You Get That Tee?

Hello, future IndieGoGo backers!

We're a new garment company that reflects the voice of a great American subculture. Observing some of the influencers that have paved the way for Hip Hops lasting impression on the world. From rap, break dancing and graffiti, to tv, movies and fashion. We hope to provide "statement" t-shirts with the flyest designs, committed to quality for everyday wear. 

We are here to raise money to get started. Well, continue growth in the foundation already laid. Building a brand that reflects where we're from and how far we've come to bring you a fresh take on active wear. By backing this campaign you will be helping to fulfill the dream of three brothers who love designing new, objective, good looking gear.

 

What We're Working To Accomplish

The whole reason we're starting this campaign is to ask for your help in obtaining the necessary equipment for this venture. Let's start with the basics.

The initial challenge we face is the procurement of the DTG (Direct To Garment) digital printer, one we hope to invest in that will allow us to be able to produce top quality shirts using the latest and best equipment. A DTG Curing Heat Press, Sublimation printer, as well as other applicable supplies such as inks, papers, etc. We are still working with textile companies and t-shirt makers to buy the best quality shirts for the best price. Initially we will buy our shirts from a third party. While being able to get a good wholesale price, we really want to be able to make the product from start to finish. Not having to go through a printing service would help us immediately in the areas of lowering the cost of production per shirt, as well as helping the speed of distribution.

RICOH Ri 1000 Direct to Garment Printer - High production DTG printer - This is the most important piece of equipment to our business. Having this machine will alleviate outsourcing to printers - Retail $16k 

ST3042 Sublimation 3D Vacuum Heat Press - Sublimation printer - Used to transfer dye on to plastics/ceramics/papers to generate graphics/photos - Retail $800 

HPN Craftpro 12x15 Heat Press - High pressure heat press - Needed to transfer/seal images for labels, tags and graphics - Retail $450

What gets generated from this campaign will go towards these items and other materials that we have vendors in place to fulfill, i.e. shirts, inks, papers, etc. 

Tupac Hip Hop Royalty Tee

What's In It For You?

These tees are comfortable, soft and fashionable. When you pledge you will receive quality, preshrunk, 100% cotton tees with graphics designed by Fareed.

All Hoodies are 80/20 cotton blend, ringspun preshrunk fleece with the Fly Rags logo embroidered on the front. 

All hats are a wool blend. MLB on field dimensions.  Fitted sizes 6 7/8 - 8. Fly Rags logo on the front of hat. 

Once you pledge, you will be added to our email list to keep you up to date on our website launch and discounts for being an early contributor. 

DJ Kool Herc Hip Hop Royalty Tee

Kanye Woke Tee

That's That Fly S***

Here it is!  The lifestyle brand that has a finger on the pulse of our culture.  What culture, you may ask?  The culture that reflects the struggle, courage and commitment it takes to level up.  Taking all that life has to throw at you and turning the bleak into laughable afterthoughts.  Of course with a bit of satire and social commentary, we want to create streetwear with a voice.  Having the approach that "We all we got!"  We, meaning the people.  Let's get it!

His and Hers Fly Rags Statement Tee

Fly Rags Circle Logo Tee

Embroidered Fly Rags Logo Hoodie (Red)

Embroidered Fly Rags Logo Hoodie (Navy)

What We're About

The company will be an ode to Art, an ode to album covers and concert posters of the 70's. It will be a political view or satirical observation, such as the Nixon "toilet" poster, or the humor of everyday life. What we have is a plan to start this t-shirt company because of a couple reasons, one being the love of art and its placement. T-shirts are that perfect form for what we are going to do, create amazing thought on shirts.

This company has been put together by 3 brothers, whose vision is to bring something fresh to t-shirt art, urban in nature, stylish, under and overstated in message. The art and illustrations will hammer home the intellectual, silly, and often sarcastic world we live in. Drawing emotions as well as thought, we want to make people think, not just sell them t-shirts. On top of it all, we are making the products ourselves, a home grown American textile company.

Fitted Embroidered Fly Rags Logo Hat

Be The Face Of Fashion!

Limited perk for backers who want to be part of the brand. A one of a kind, Fly Rags logo tee with your face illustrated by Fareed. This tier will only be limited to 25 backers, but if we reach our goal, we'll reopen it for another limited run! Back it and send us a picture or two of your mug and show people you were with us from the bottom. (This will not be available to purchase after campaign ends)

We understand not everyone will be able to contribute, but you can still help us out!  Please share and tell your friends about us. We appreciate all the support and we look forward to growing and taking part in this experience with you!

Thank You & Stay Fly!

Stretch goals: (We're figuring out some fun stuff for you!!! They will be posted soon)

 

$800 - ALL BACKERS WILL RECEIVE A FLY RAGS STICKER DECAL!!! 

"You on a shirt" backers have sent in their photo's and I will be posting the illustrations for these shirts shortly!  

 

$21k - 

 

$23k - 

 

$25k -
story_txt:
Where'd You Get That Tee?
Hello, future IndieGoGo backers!
We're a new garment company that reflects the voice of a great American subculture. Observing some of the influencers that have paved the way for Hip Hops lasting impression on the world. From rap, break dancing and graffiti, to tv, movies and fashion. We hope to provide "statement" t-shirts with the flyest designs, committed to quality for everyday wear. 
We are here to raise money to get started. Well, continue growth in the foundation already laid. Building a brand that reflects where we're from and how far we've come to bring you a fresh take on active wear. By backing this campaign you will be helping to fulfill the dream of three brothers who love designing new, objective, good looking gear.

 

What We're Working To Accomplish
The whole reason we're starting this campaign is to ask for your help in obtaining the necessary equipment for this venture. Let's start with the basics.
The initial challenge we face is the procurement of the DTG (Direct To Garment) digital printer, one we hope to invest in that will allow us to be able to produce top quality shirts using the latest and best equipment. A DTG Curing Heat Press, Sublimation printer, as well as other applicable supplies such as inks, papers, etc. We are still working with textile companies and t-shirt makers to buy the best quality shirts for the best price. Initially we will buy our shirts from a third party. While being able to get a good wholesale price, we really want to be able to make the product from start to finish. Not having to go through a printing service would help us immediately in the areas of lowering the cost of production per shirt, as well as helping the speed of distribution.
RICOH Ri 1000 Direct to Garment Printer - High production DTG printer - This is the most important piece of equipment to our business. Having this machine will alleviate outsourcing to printers - Retail $16k 
ST3042 Sublimation 3D Vacuum Heat Press - Sublimation printer - Used to transfer dye on to plastics/ceramics/papers to generate graphics/photos - Retail $800 
HPN Craftpro 12x15 Heat Press - High pressure heat press - Needed to transfer/seal images for labels, tags and graphics - Retail $450
What gets generated from this campaign will go towards these items and other materials that we have vendors in place to fulfill, i.e. shirts, inks, papers, etc. 
Tupac Hip Hop Royalty Tee

What's In It For You?
These tees are comfortable, soft and fashionable. When you pledge you will receive quality, preshrunk, 100% cotton tees with graphics designed by Fareed.

All hats are a wool blend. MLB on field dimensions.  Fitted sizes 6 7/8 - 8. Fly Rags logo on the front of hat.

story:
As humans, we are brought to action through stories. Stories resonate with our emotions, far more than the latest facts and figures ever will.

As a motivated person, I have recently made redundant because of Covid-19. I used to be a flight attendant working for a prestigious airline that allowed me to explore the world and enjoy its luxury.

Now finding myself in a challenging situation as I'm the only sponsor for my family, I have decided to sell what I have been purchasing during my working years.

It's tough to let go of a part of what you have deserved after working long, hard hours.

So please help me fund this website that I'm creating to support my family and myself.

Counting on your kind heart and compassion.

story:
INFINITY II is now available on

www.olto-8.com and www.watchshopin.com 

   

 

Featuring a special 5-layer dial construction and multi-hand array, INFINITY Ⅱ  mechanical automatic offers a new way to read time and impresses at first sight with a stunning motorsports-inspired design.

INFINITY II is available in 2 different versions (Roman Numeral Version & Arabic Numeral Version) in a 44*44 MM uni-body shell, INFINITY Ⅱ uses the latest Swiss Luminova and 5ATM waterproof technology that lets your style shine through anywhere and anytime. 

To fit with your unique personality, we designed INFINITY Ⅱ  as a Limited Edition, each version of INFINITY Ⅱ  is limited to just 500 watches. Get yours now to be one of the exclusive INFINITY Members!

 

 

 

Telling the time on INFINITY Ⅱ  is different from all other automatics. It uses a 5-layer dial layout that indicates hours (inner upper index), minutes (outer whole-circle index), and seconds (inner lower index). 

Combined with a multi-hand system - 2 hour-hands in a 180°arrangement, 1 minute-hand in a special triangle shape, and 3 second-hands in a 120° layout, INFINITY Ⅱ  presents one of the most distinctive time displays that has ever been created and one that is an instant conversation starter!

 

 

Have no fear of the dark, and let your style shine bright in the night! INFINITY Ⅱ uses the latest Swiss Super-LumiNova coating on both Index and Hand surfaces that enable you to read the time even in a very dark environment, adding modern convenience to a watch with a classic soul inside! 

Compared to the other 3 versions, the White version features a dedicated Night Vision design that delivers a friendly user experience!

 

 

With a unique concept in mind, INFINITY Ⅱ is designed to stand out and impress at first sight. From its intricate mechanical details to its bold stylish aesthetics, it is a true one-of-a-kind.

A great mechanical automatic relies on superior design and thoughtful craftsmanship. INFINITY Ⅱ  is crafted with the latest cutting-edge technology and sophisticated processing, ensuring that perfection is expressed from any angle.

 

 


 

INFINITY Ⅱ’s case is designed with 44 individual facets and one sophisticated crown that are all hand-polished with dedicated tools and specially coated with Ceracote Ceramic Coating*, a thin-film protective ceramic coating widely used in military weapon manufacturing. This ultra-durable finish greatly improves the rigidity, heat, and scratch-resistance of INFINITY Ⅱ  for an enduring look that lasts for years.

*(Ceracote coating is exclusive for the White & Green Case versions, Blue & Black Case versions are coated with PVD)

 

INFINITY Ⅱ’s easy-change strap is made of Fluoro rubber, which is a superior polymer material that is waterproof and highly resistant to oils, temperature changes, and harsh environments. These vividly colored straps are durable, colorfast, and comfortable on the skin.

Note: you can purchase the extra strap in the add-on section, choose your color to add them to your pledge in check out. You can refer to the picture below for different color combinations:

 

INFINITY Ⅱ is made with an anti-reflection Sapphire Crystal that protects the inner workings of the watch. Compared to traditional Mineral Crystal, it’s more scratch and smudge resistant, ultra-protective, and lasts longer.

 

OLTO-8 has an experienced in-house R&D team dedicated to optimizing the Infinity II movement. They begin with a Japanese Miyota 82S5 Movement and customize it for INFINITY  Ⅱ, to work perfectly with its 180° semi-circular time display. 

The movement and the watch include a 2-year International Warranty and are designed for years of maintenance-free operation.

 

Born with a classic soul, INFINITY Ⅱ also encourages a bold heart to explore! It features a 5 ATM waterproof rating, which can withstand a pressure of 5 bar or a depth of 50 meters.

 

HANDSON FROM OUR BACKERS

Last year, OLTO-8 launched the first-gen INFINITY on Kickstarter and has raised over $80k from 260backers. With adventurous lifestyles in mind, OLTO-8 returns with a bold new design that aims to refresh the classic style and superior performance of high-end automatics. We are honored to present the new Limited Edition INFINITY Ⅱ. For now, we are thrilled to present the new Limited Edition INFINITY Ⅱ to you all,  hope you can enjoy it on your wrist!

We received many excellent reviews from our BACKERS and YouTubers, and this time around we want to inspire more watch enthusiasts to put a unique new style on their wrist. OLTO-8 is not just a watch brand, it’s a movement, with a unique attitude!

 

No matter whether you are into vintage style or follow the modern path, INFINITY Ⅱ  gives you the freedom to customize! With 2 different numeral display versions: Roman Numerals or Arabic Numerals, you can choose either one to fit your style and needs.

 

 

 

 

 

 

OLTO-8 is a watch company that engages in the research and development of watch movements, design, development, production, and sales of watch accessories and finished products. We create watches mostly for the people who are chasing a UNIQUE attitude and fashion-oriented consumers. Matching innovation with a fresh design approach to watches, and underlining "My Time is Unique" as the key idea behind the new watch series, OLTO-8 aims to offer watches that celebrate and the sense of people’s individuality.

*The campaign is fully managed and presented by NEW WAVES.

Risks & Challenges

Olto-8 has years of experience of designing and manufacturing mechanical automatics and has long-time partnership with many international top-brand watch brands. We have reliable suppliers that work along with us. We are quite confident that we can deliver our product in superior quality. However, we understand that unexpected challenges can occur even with a well-prepared and executed campaign. If any problems arise we will keep our backers updated and informed about how we are solving them. Contact us for any questions or concerns.

story:
Hello, we’re Zwuits, a team of leather making professionals here to present our first product: the Versatile Leather Bag- a combination of authentic leather and modern design. Our focus is on creating sustainable, ethically sourced, and naturally tanned premium leather goods that are both beautiful and functional.

 

Choose from our four beautiful patinas: Black, Brown, Midnight Blue or Beige.

 

Introducing our Versatile Leather Bag. We designed this multifunctional waterproof bag to be all you need for your daily carry. It easily transforms from a briefcase to a backpack or a crossbody messenger depending on your changing needs throughout the day. Our bags are made with modern machinery but hold the old-world charisma and durability that you would look for in an elegant leather bag.

 

 

 

Read Full Review On: 

Detail view of all the Features- all of these features are included.

 

 

Never get lost in the abyss, as everything has its place in this thought-out multi-pocketed design.

 

A Place for Everything​

The front panel can be fully unzipped for easy access to your commonly used items.

 

 

 

 

We found four problems when looking into leather products and how the big name brands are operating.

  • Hazardous chemicals are used to cut down production time
  • Top-quality materials cost too much money
  • Most of the time animals are killed for only leather
  • Workers are not treated correctly and not getting paid enough

 

We solved the problem by:

  • Eliminating the use of Hazardous Chemicals (Chromium, Lead, Azo-dyes) and by adapting the vegetable tanning process
  • Providing premium quality (Full-grain/Top-grain) in a fraction of the price
  • Sourcing organically, means we are using leathers that are the by-products of human meat consumption. The leathers could go to waste and harm the environment if they were not processed and used. We made sure zero animal killing only for leather
  • Making sure that we address the issue seriously and everyone gets fair pay, benefits and proper training

 

 

 

Zwuits is a peoples company first and we have creatively structured our business model to benefit our workers’ needs. We strongly believe happy healthy employees, foster a happier healthier workforce. With your support, we can continue to produce beautiful, functional, cost-effective products and offer great benefits to enhance the quality of life of our employees in Bangladesh. 

 

 

 

 

 

All our products are manufactured in Bangladesh, which is home to many large USA brands. In order to ensure our products are made with the highest standards, we want to help our workers as they help us grow. Regardless of skill or position in the company, all employees get the same benefits package.

 

 

 

We rely on the centuries-old condensed/catechol method of vegetable tanning with the use of modern equipment. It includes extracts of Gambier, Mimosa Bark, and Quebracho Wood. Due to the lack of strong chemicals, this method takes up to 35 days depending on the season. 

The result -- a beautiful item with rich, warm tones that looks entirely natural and smells just the way you think leather should.

 

 

 

 

We began our journey with one thing in mind, quality goods that are affordable. However, as we dug deeper into leather manufacturing, it quickly became apparent that there was a major problem in the industry - most chrome oil-tanned leather is produced with highly toxic chemicals that cause allergic and asthmatic reactions - not to mention leads to a risk of lung cancer.

Not only an issue for the consumers who buy leather products, but this hazardous manufacturing process also affects the lives of those who make the products. The products can cause:

  • Many skin diseases such as "Chrome Holes"
  • Respiratory problems
  • Infertility
  • Congenital disabilities
  • Drinking water pollution

 

The health risks of the chrome tanning method are high and that was something the team at Zwuits is not willing to be part of. We adopted a hazardous chemical-free, vegetable tanning method that is safe for the users of our products as well as those who make them. 

 

 

 

Founded by Habib Ferdous a lifelong learner, successful accountant, and serial entrepreneur.

Habib came a long way from selling newspapers in front of Canning Town station in London to becoming a successful accountant and business owner in New York. Apart from running his ventures, Habib is involved with many voluntary and humanitarian causes where he spends his free time.

He grew up in the capital of Bangladesh, growing up he learned about the prospering leather industry and observed the problems very closely. He met with Md Khayruzzaman back in 2000, they shared a passion to do something better for the working class of Bangladesh. Fast forward, 18 years later he met with Ruhul Amin, a friend of Khayruzzaman, and three of them together started together to bring life to a long lost childhood dream.

Now in his early 30’s, Habib emerged as the owner and founder of Zwuits Inc. and looks after the overall operation of the business. Ruhul and Khayruzzaman look after production and employee management respectively.

 

 

Help Out By Sharing Versatile Bag With Your Friends! (#zwuits)

Like what you're seeing? Great! Don't be shy about sharing Versatile Bag with your friends. We've made it super easy. Just hit one of the buttons below (or at the top of the page).

The more people who know about Versatile Bag, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make our bags!

We can't do this without you!

Don't be shy about sharing Versatile Bag with your friends. We've made it super easy. Just hit one of the buttons below (or at the top of the page).The more people who know about Versatile Bag, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make our bags!We can't do this without you!

story:
Luumi Life mask is a 100% pure platinum silicone mask with ePTFE filters that's simple to clean.

 

the mask

Platinum Silicone is a soft, durable, non-porous, and hypoallergenic material that is soft and easy on the skin (won't give you a rash like some plastic-based masks). Platinum silicone can be boiled or heated in the oven to 350°F without compromising its strength. Our pure platinum silicone is odor-free and is the same silicone we use for creating our line of food containers and straws.

The unibody construction and outer flared edge, make for a good seal around your face and nose, making foggy glasses a thing of the past, and the under the chin design, along with no valves or vents, conform with airline use standards.

 

 

 

We have added as many wearing options as we can. The mask started with ear straps that are soft and flexible, as the design was based on the traditional KN95 design, and we have two options for length for the most comfortable fit.

We have also added fully adjustable, around the head straps, which we feel are the superior design as ear fatigue never becomes an issue.

the filters

Our ePTFE Filters do not absorb moisture and filter >99% of .1 micron particulate. The ePTFE has .1 micron holes in it, which keeps all particulate outside the filter, instead of absorbing into the filter material, like the melt-blown plastic filters, making our filters reusable and easy to clean. 

 

Our ePTFE filter media is made by Trinity Technology Group in the USA and tested by Nelson Labs.

TTG has rated the filter media as being cleanable  25x. Used filters can be returned to luumi for a 50% rebate on new filters, or anything else in our luumi shop.

 

 

the cleaning

Cleaning the mask and filters is easy, and can be done assembled or taken apart. It is most effective if you spritz the mask with a hand sanitizer spray before you begin. We recommend cleaning in the following ways:

dishwasher 

oven at 150°F (minimum 20 minutes)

dryer on high cycle for 1 hour

washing machine (hot water setting with soap)

food dehydrator (minimum 145°F for 30 mins)

near-boiling water (minimum 20 mins)

boiling water (5 mins max)

 

 each Luumi Life Mask Includes: 

2 ePTFE filters 

100% Pure Platinum Silicone body

2 Adjustable Ear Straps

2 Adjustable Head Straps

Your Luumi Life Mask is...

Easy to Clean (dryer, washing machine, dishwasher, hot water)

Fog Proof

Reusable 

Sustainably repurposed

Perfect for rainy days

please note: although our filter media has been tested to the standards listed above, the Luumi Life mask is not a medical device, and does not imply, guarantee or warrant against the wearer getting an illness.

 

Our Mission

 

The Luumi Life mask was developed to keep our families, communities, and the world safe from the scourge of single-use masks. Saving the environment can start with wearing a highly-functional, protective, and convenient mask.

Why Invest In Luumi Life? 

 

The Single-Use Plastic Problem

According to National Geographic 91% of plastic doesn't get recycled. Over 300 million tons of plastic waste are dumped into oceans and landfills every year. The 9% that does get recycled requires extra carbon-emissions to get broken down and reproduced. Single-use plastics are plaguing our planet and our communities.

 

 

The Platinum Silicone Solution

Pure platinum silicone is different. It's a durable, washable, hypoallergenic material that can be cleaned and reused with ease. The best part? If your platinum silicone products ever break, we can grind them up into a rubbery aggregate, to be used again as a composite in a new silicone product, with minimal use of energy or water. we call this process Infini-repurposing and give a rebate to all customers returning end of life cycle Luumi products for this purpose.

story:
Pocketbands are high-performance silicone wristbands with a pocket for stashing keys, cash and other small items. Originally designed as a place to put your key while going for a run, Pocketbands can be used for a lot more! 

 

 

 

 

Due to popular demand and based on your suggestions, we are proudly presenting Pocketbands 3.0! Our new Pocketbands are made from a flexible, 100% high-performance silicone. The high tensile strength material is durable, water-proof, and feels comfortable on your skin. There's also a new anti-dust coating on the surface of the band that prevents lint and other particles from adhering.

Additionally, we have added an adjustable sports band that enables you to quickly choose from 7 different sizing options. The inside of the strap has also been redesigned and now features a recessed channel allowing for air flow against the wrist. Last, but not least, the newly tapered strap creates a sleek, more sporty look.

 

 

 
 
 
 
 

Pocketbands hold many types of keys, folded bills, activity trackers like the Fitbit One, Qualcomm Gimbal, bPay Visa/Mastercard, RFID chips, ioProx Keytags, barcode tags, many smart keys and valet keys for cars, usb memory cards, coins, LED inserts and more!

The pocket dimensions are approximately 2 ¼ inches long (5.72cm) x 1 inch wide (25.4mm) x 0.2 inch thick (5mm). In terms of storage, this translates to roughly 2 keys or 2 folded bills or a combination of the two. The pocket can also stretch to accommodate a shape slightly outside of these dimensions. For example, Pocketbands securely hold the Fitbit One which is 9mm thick.

 

 

 

Pocketbands are great for running, biking, swimming, hiking - even walking the dog! No more knotting keys to shoelaces and drawstrings, hiding things in bushes, or stuffing folded bills down in your socks. Pocketbands is the perfect solution to securely hold your items during all sorts of activities and situations.

 

 

 

Pocketbands are available in 9 different colors. Each band comes standard with a chrome-finish metal clasp. The Black Pocketband is also available with an optional matte black metal clasp.

 

 

Select the perk that you want and sending us a message with your order details. You can choose any mix of colors with your order. We can help you with any questions you might have.

 

glow in the dark band

 

 

 

 

1. Click "Get This Perk" Under The Reward You Want:

Select the reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page.

2. Payment: 

Enter your payment information and shipping details.

3. Order Details & Shipping Information: 

Please message us on Indiegogo or email us your color selection and order details. info@pocketbands.com 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

Our new model features a one-size-fits-all adjustable band. Choose between 7 sizes to find the fit that is just right for you.

Wrist Size: Small 5.5 inches (140mm) to X-Large 8.3 inches (210mm).

 

Adjustable Size Range

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are trying to leave the smallest ecological footprint possible. Our products are minimally packaged and shipped in Polybags made of 100% recyclable material. Shipping is FREE to the USA and FREE worldwide shipping for all international backers who pledge for 6x bands or more!

 

 

 

PocketBands® have one or more U.S. and/or foreign patents pending. Pocketbands are not affiliated with Fitbit, bPay, Qualcomm, Visa/Mastercard or any other company. For ages 14+

story:
Update 11 April 2015 :                                                                                                              Set of 2 smooth funnels now available for €7euro (includes postage).

Hi, I am Chrysanthos Therapontos, an architect\transportation designer from Nicosia, Cyprus. One priority routine in my kitchen is to transfer mountain spring water or homemade wine from larger containers to bottles. There is usually a degree of blockage of the funnel, as the liquid entering the bottle blocks air exiting  and some liquid overflows from the top of the funnel. This inconvenience has motivated me to design my own version of a blockage-free funnel.

The main feature of the Smooth Flow Funnel is a single groove through which air is displaced as liquid is poured, ensuring smooth flow of liquid. It is a practical design object of smooth lines, sculptural volume and nice proportions that aspires to blend harmoniously with other utensils and fittings of a modern kitchen.

The funnel has been 3D printed. Very slight corrections of the prototype design may be carried out to get the proportions and thickness of material right. Your support is needed in order to mass manufacture this practical and designer household utensil.


PERKS:

Perk 1: Thank you! Since we are on the subject of liquids,all contributions for this perk will go towards an international charity or charities that work to supply clean running water to remote parts of Africa. The details of this effort, where exactly the money will go, will be announced on the campaign blog before the end of the campaign  . All contributors will receive a special thank you email for their support.

Perk 2: The main perk is a set of two of our funnels, one small and one regular sized funnel (dimensions(in mm) in drawing above/slight variatons may occur) including a printed thank you note.

Perk 3: The third perk is 2 sets of the 2 funnels at a special price including a printed thank you note.

Perk 4: The last perk is a carbon fiber stand for a tablet or smartphone (based on the Design of the Smooth Flow Funnel) plus a set of Smooth Flow Funnels. Includes a printed thank you note.

 Carbon Fiber Stand - CAD drawings and First Test Model.  Fine quality is guaranteed for the final product.


MANUFACTURING:
Competitive estimates have been obtained from manufacturers and service providers. The money will be spent for the preparation of molds for the process of injection molding, for manufacturing quantities of the product for perks and distribution to retailers, health certification of the product and for transport, packaging and postage costs.
If the campaign goes well, that will enable us to approach retailers and try to make the funnels available in the market. If the entire goal is not reached we will do our best to at least provide all contributors with the promised perks, by ordering a smaller production line and reducing package and transport costs to a minimum.
We have tried to set plausible goals and deadlines that we can adhere to. We do not anticipate any serious setbacks.

If you do not want to contribute financially you can still help to get us started on this project, by believing in us and spreading the word about us. Use Indiegogo share tools!
 
We are delighted that Indiegogo is providing us with this great opportunity to raise funds and have access to manufacturing services for our project. We look forward to share with you the procedure of manufacturing this piece of design. Thank you for your time!
